[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#//dkon brtseT nga pa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D60}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu drug pa ste/_'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba de kho na nges par bstan pa/_bam 
[\[1b.2\]]po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pi tA pu tra sa mA ga man nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 
[\[1b.3\]]'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_
[\[1b.4\]]zhi ba zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_rgal ba rgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_thang la phyin pa thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i 
[\[1b.5\]]'khor dang ldan pa/_dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/_nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/_sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dang ldan pa/_tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_sdig bsal ba'i chos can sdig bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/_rig pa can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/_khrus byas pa khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_sgrogs pa po sgrogs pa 
[\[2a.2\]]po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_yid rnam par 
[\[2a.3\]]dang ba yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_dran pa'i 
[\[2a.4\]]sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_btsal ba spangs pa btsal ba spangs 
[\[2a.5\]]pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa 
[\[2a.6\]]med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_yal ga 
[\[2b.2\]]dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_lcug ma dang /_shun phrags kyi skyon dang bral ba/_dag pa/_snying po la gnas pa/_shAkya'i yul na ser skya'i gnas/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na lnga sde dang /_grags byin dang /_'char ka dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_ga ya 'od srung dang /_
[\[2b.3\]]chu klung 'od srung dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par 
[\[2b.4\]]gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_
[\[2b.5\]]sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/_de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/_bla gab med pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[2b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad 
[\[2b.7\]]par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau Di n+ya khyod ni bla ma bla 
[\[3a.2\]]mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/_de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags byin dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga ya 'od srung dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[3a.3\]]pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_maud 
[\[3a.4\]]gal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[3a.5\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/_de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes 
[\[3a.6\]]dgongs pa mthong ste 'di lta ste/_dper na khang pa brtsegs pa'am/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/_nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[3a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar cing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis/_
[\[3b.2\]]khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar dad pa skyed cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan maud gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bar shin tu dka' 
[\[3b.3\]]ste/_rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na shing khur bcu 'am/_nyi shu'am/_sum cu 'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_
[\[3b.4\]]lnga bcu 'am/_shing khur brgya yang rung ste/_gsher bag med cing skam la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la de la mi la la zhig gis me btang na me'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/_'bru mar zhig gis gtor na me'i phung po de bas ches 
[\[3b.5\]]che bar 'bar te/_de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na glang po che 
[\[3b.6\]]mche ba can kha gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[3b.7\]]'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/_'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed par dgongs sam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do zhes dgongs so/_/
[\[4a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la bka' stsal pa/_'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni yang na ngas dad par bya yi/_yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o/_/'char ka nga'i nyan 
[\[4a.3\]]thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos/_/khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin 
[\[4a.4\]]gyis/_/shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa yi/_/rgyal po'i dam pa myur du dad par byos/_/rgyal po'i rab de dad par byas na ni/_/rigs bu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la/_/mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis/_/mi yi dam pa myur du dad par byos/_/da lta na ni 
[\[4a.5\]]shAkya'i bdag po de/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams/_/ri yi ngos nas rbab 'dril ji bzhin du/_/brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas/_/dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas/_/yid la gnod gyur sems dang yid kyang stor/_/
[\[4a.6\]]dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag_/rjes su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin/_/lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing /_/lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing /_/rgyal po bde nyams snying rje smre 
[\[4a.7\]]sngags 'don/_/nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang /_/mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang /_/longs spyod dag ni rjes su dran byed cing /_/sa bdag de ni snying rjer smre sngags 'don/_/mdangs 'phrog byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis/_/ji ltar mi zhig yongs su 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]non gyur na/_/bdag kyang mi shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar/_/sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no/_/ti se'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs gyur na/_/ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba/_/de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na/_/rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo /_/gnyid kyis 
[\[4b.2\]]log gam shi bas myos 'gyur ba'i/_/mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te/_/de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/_/rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so/_/dper na khyim thab shi bas myos pa yi/_/bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa/_/de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos 
[\[4b.3\]]myos gyur pas/_/rgyal po de yang snying rjer smre sngags 'don/_/de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa/_/khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis/_/nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis/_/'char ka khyod ma gtogs par 
[\[4b.4\]]srid pa yi/_/'gro ba dag na skal 'thun spyad med pas/_/rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya bar/_/gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med/_/'char ka sngon gyi dus na byung ba ni/_/'das pa'i dus na sa yi bdag po zhig_/ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste/_/sa skyong byed pa 
[\[4b.5\]]rnam par grags pa byung /_/de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/_/rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/_/chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/_/grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing /_/bza' shing 'bras bu me 
[\[4b.6\]]tog rgyas pas gang /_/'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes/_/sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang /_/dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste/_/sdong du mtsher ma rtswa shing ngan pa med/_/'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras/_/chu klung 'bab stegs bde 
[\[4b.7\]]bas rab tu brgyan/_/drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste/_/skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrubs/_/ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad/_/de nas sems can thams cad lha gnas 'dod/_/rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ba ste/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can/_/yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan/_/ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/_/'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can/_/mi bdag khyim na gnas 
[\[5a.2\]]kyang dben la dga'/_/rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des/_/lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir/_/na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te/_/'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras/_/bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang 
[\[5a.3\]]ma byas/_/'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir/_/ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smros/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas gyis te/_bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed/_/bud med rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs gyis te/_/yul la dga' zhing mos pa bskyed 
[\[5a.4\]]par gyis/_/dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag_/de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na/_/dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/_/'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs/_de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod/_/nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang 'thun/_/
[\[5a.5\]]rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi/_/gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod/_/'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing /_/lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa/_/rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas/_/bsnyen bkur snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog_/
[\[5a.6\]]mig ni pad ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste/_/bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong /_/so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang /_/dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug_/brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra/_/phrag so shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan/_/lag dang 
[\[5a.7\]]rkang ba'i mthil na zangs kyi mdog_/sor mo byin pa phra bar legs dang ldan/_/lce ni zangs mdog 'dra ba srab cing dag_/tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan/_/so ni thags bzang so rnams rad rod med/_/mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan/_/lto ba phyang nger 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]'dug cing lte ba sdug_/sta zur yangs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra/_/byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing /_/mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin_/dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan/_/gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta/_/rtse ba 'dod 
[\[5b.2\]]cing dar la bab dang ldan/_/gzhon nu snying rje ltos la brtse bar byos/_/bu cig khyod dang bud med 'di dag gi_/mdog bzang ba dang dar la bab pa yang /_/shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis/_/nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis/_/blo gros snying po ldan 
[\[5b.3\]]des smre ba yi/_/pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad smras/_/yab cig khyod ni mad par gsung ba lags/_/gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad mad/_/yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig_/bsams te gtan la bab la rgyal po gson/_/ji ltar rmi lam 
[\[5b.4\]]na yang 'dod la bdag_/sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson/_/sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni/_/mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te/_/mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad/_/long ba 
[\[5b.5\]]ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis/_/long ba'i tshig gis lam gol 'dzin par bgyid/_/thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na/_/mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed/_/grol ba ji lta bur na bcings pa yi/_/tshig gis btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid/_/sa mnyam gnas 
[\[5b.6\]]shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na/_/nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/_/sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing /_/'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba/_/long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang /_/nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam 
[\[5b.7\]]bgyid/_/mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin/_/bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags/_/khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags/_/bdag ni 'dod pa rnams las rnam par smod/_/'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin/_/sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ste/_/rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/_/me yi phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin/_/blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du/_/smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras/_/rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par/_/rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu 
[\[6a.2\]]byung /_/sbrul gyi lpags rnying rjes pa ci 'dra dang /_/ngar snabs rngus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te/_/blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par/_/sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung /_/gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/_/blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba/_/ming 
[\[6a.3\]]ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste/_/blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung /_/gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni/_/grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga/_/ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur/_/'dod pa 
[\[6a.4\]]rnams la skyon du lta bas na/_/mi yi seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das/_/tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas/_/de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na/_/pha de bu la ma dad gyur pa dang /_/zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas/_/legs 
[\[6a.5\]]par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga' bar byas/_/'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/_/de tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam 'am/_/nga nyid de yi tshe na der gyur te/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med/_/'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/_/bden pa 'phel ba gzhan 
[\[6a.6\]]zhig yin snyam 'am/_/mi bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi tshe/_/rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur/_/'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems/_/rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyam 'am/_/khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni/_/bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin/_/
[\[6a.7\]]de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir/_/rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig_/sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyur na/_/skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]zhag de 'das nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te/_ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya stong tsam zhig dang /_dgos pa zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do/_/
[\[6b.2\]]rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing /_/ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so/_/
[\[6b.3\]]gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di dag ste/_'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_
[\[6b.4\]]rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no/_/de la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur 
[\[6b.5\]]ba zhig/_des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la mnyam ste/_mi mnyam pa med cing chos dang 'thun pas legs par phab nas bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/_de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los 
[\[6b.6\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing rim gro byas pa dang /_bkur sti byas pa dang /_bsti stang du byas pa dang /_mchod par byas pa dang /_dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na da ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi 
[\[6b.7\]]dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo/_/des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/_nga'i bu de la blta ba'am/_bsnyen bkur byed par su yang ma 'gro shig_/la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas bcad 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]do/_/de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/_shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag
[\[7a.2\]]par mgu bar byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar bzhugs 
[\[7a.3\]]sam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/_bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/_shin tu ma mnyel tam/_bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad 
[\[7a.4\]]ces smras so/_/dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/_/stobs dang ldan no/_/bde bar bzhugs so/_/mi bde ba mi mnga'o/_/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/_/bde bar byon to/_/mnyel ba med do/_/bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba 
[\[7a.5\]]med do/_/shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas byung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/_tshe dang 
[\[7a.6\]]ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar bzhugs sam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_
[\[7a.7\]]de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/_bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/_shin tu ma mnyel tam/_bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shin tu legs par 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sad de de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/_/stobs dang ldan no/_/bde bar bzhugs so/_/mi bde ba mi mnga'o/_/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/_/bde bar byon to/_/mnyel ba med do/_/bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do/_/shAkya'i bu mya ngan med 
[\[7b.2\]]dang /_mya ngan bral gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang /_shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang /_shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/_
[\[7b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde bar bzhugs sam/_mi bde ba mi 
[\[7b.4\]]mnga' 'am/_de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/_bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/_shin tu ma mnyel tam/_bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang /_mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces 
[\[7b.5\]]smras so/_/mya ngan med dang /_mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'o/_/stobs dang ldan no/_/bde bar bzhugs so/_/mi bde ba mi mnga'o/_/de la nyam nga ba ci yang mi mnga'o/_/bde bar byon to/_/mnyel ba med do/_/bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med 
[\[7b.6\]]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di 
[\[7b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas nga'i bu la blta ba'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir su yang ma 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]'gro shig_/la la zhig de la blta ba'am/_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'am bsnyen 
[\[8a.2\]]bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/'on tang bdag gis nam 
[\[8a.3\]]mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa 
[\[8a.4\]]des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo /_/rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang la skyil mo 
[\[8a.5\]]krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/_tshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/_/khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos/_/khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin/_/brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin tu dka'/_/de skad ces 
[\[8a.6\]]smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu/_/bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te/_/bde bar gshegs pa skyob 
[\[8a.7\]]pa'i bshos bskur ro/_/yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba/_/khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob/_/gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar/_/ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra/_/ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni/_/phyogs rnams kun tu 'od 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]byed mngon par 'bar/_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/_/ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang /_/ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na/_/srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang /_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/_/mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom 
[\[8b.2\]]lam mer bzhugs/_/ji ltar nyi mas zil non skar ma rnams/_/nyin par 'od stong lam mer mi rung ba/_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis/_/zil gyis mnan pas mu stegs gzhan mi snang /_/ji ltar nyi mas zil non zla ba ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'od stong nyid mi 
[\[8b.3\]]snang /_/de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams/_/nyi mas zil non zla bzhin gsal ba med/_/seng ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams/_/shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/ri sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas/_/stag gi nga ro gzhan gyis bzod par 
[\[8b.4\]]dka'/_/de bzhin rgyal po drang srong chen po'i gsung /_/bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos nas/_/shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang /_/gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la/_/spyan dang ldan pa des ni 
[\[8b.5\]]mig kyang stsal/_/snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs/_/ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar/_/bde dang mi bde'i lam gnyis rab tu bstan/_/lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan/_/lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud/_/'dam du bying 
[\[8b.6\]]ba rnams kyang thang la bton/_/ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni/_/sgang dang gshong bcas char gyis ngoms par byed/_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/_/'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad/_/ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri sul nags/_/rtswa dang 
[\[8b.7\]]gel pa nags tshal shing rnams dang /_/'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang /_/me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa/_/de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang /_/ma 'dres [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang /_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'bras bus spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri/_/lha yi gnas gyur mi sgul rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/_/dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes/_bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin 
[\[9a.2\]]lha dbang po/_/lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar/_/de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras/_/dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes/_byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te/_/thugs rje chen po'i glog phreng rir ldan pas/_/dran pa nyer gzhag char 
[\[9a.3\]]rgyun 'dab 'khrigs te/_/rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs/_/yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi gzer/_ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'joms shing /_/ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems/_/rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[9a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin dang tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i nor bu rin chen tshogs/_/byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs/_/thar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya/_/tshul khrims rnam dag rtsa ba brtan 
[\[9a.5\]]bar zug_/ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa yal ga 'dab/_/byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong /_/bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po sten/_/tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa'i stobs chen po/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod phug na gnas/_/stong pa mtshan med smon 
[\[9a.6\]]med spyod yul can/_/rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi sras/_/thub pa mi gnas gnas pa rnam par ston/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas/_/byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te/_/khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin/_/tshul 
[\[9a.7\]]khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan/_/bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs/_/ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can/_/rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad/_/dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdig bcom ste/_/nyon mongs zhi mdzad 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]dge bsten bka' stsol pas/_/lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes/_tshul khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog 'byin cing /_/yan lag brgyad lam char chen rlan gyis sbengs/_/thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol/_/
[\[9b.2\]]khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang zag mchog de bde bar 'ongs sam ci/_/bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam/_/de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam/_/thang gnas ud pa la bzhin ma rnyis sam/_/'char kas smras pa/_
[\[9b.3\]]rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can/_/dgyes shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te/_/thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas/_/gser gyi pad ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing /_/gling 
[\[9b.4\]]bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te/_/bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang nas/_/da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam/_/'char kas smras pa/_/bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can/_/ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/_/mnal tam 
[\[9b.5\]]bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na/_/sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la/_/me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te/_/bud med tshogs kyis bskor cing nyal nyal na/_/da ltar 
[\[9b.6\]]mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs/_/'char kas smras pa/_thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni/_/byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs/_/dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na/_/srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'/_/rgyal 
[\[9b.7\]]pos smras pa/_shAkya dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar/_/bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te/_/gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na/_/nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'/_/'char kas smras pa/_/chos kyis byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyis/_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar/_/zhi ba'i dgon par zhi ba bsten mdzad pas/_/ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_/sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/_/yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te/_/
[\[10a.2\]]rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na/_/nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru/_/'char kas smras pa/_khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste/_/thub pa des bkrus gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad/_/sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog_/rang yang 
[\[10a.3\]]rgal la skye bo phal cher sgrol/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyan/_/rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzang po gyon/_/tsan dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris/_/nags chen de gseb thub pa su yis brgyan/_/'char kas smras 
[\[10a.4\]]pa/_tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan/_/khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan rgyan/_/mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku/_/rnam grol gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri 
[\[10a.5\]]mtshon thogs pa'i/_/dpa' bo g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te/_/bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu dgab dgab pa/_/gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung /_/'char kas smras pa/_byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te/_/de dpung ye shes 
[\[10a.6\]]nyan thos zhabs 'bring g.yog_/yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jigs mi mnga'/_/stobs bcu dgyes pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nga yi bu yi yon tan khyod kyis smras/_/chos legs spyod cing dub med brjod pa thos/_/khyod kyang 
[\[10a.7\]]zan zo bsod snyoms bkur bar gyis/_/bdag kyang mi yi dbang po ltar 'gro 'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon/_tshogs kyi 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]mchog_/dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/_drang srong chen po ste/_dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na dge sbyong gi rgyal po lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na/_zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la zla ba nya ste yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe 
[\[10b.2\]]skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma ni ston ka'i dus na shin tu lam me lhan ne 
[\[10b.3\]]lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na shin tu lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong 
[\[10b.4\]]gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta 
[\[10b.5\]]ste/_dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /_lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang /_lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs 
[\[10b.6\]]na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[10b.7\]]mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/_bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg/_kun tu rab tu ldeg/_chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_
[\[11a.2\]]'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos/_btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa la gom pa bdun bor ba dang /_steng gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/_de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang /_
[\[11a.3\]]de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang /_steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta ci smos/_btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang /_gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul 
[\[11a.4\]]pa med pa/_rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/_ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/_rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa/_yang dag par smra ba/_slu ba med pa lta ci smos/_gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rgal 
[\[11a.5\]]nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/_des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig bltam ma thag_/nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de/_/gang zhig la ni 
[\[11a.6\]]bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang zhig bltam par gyur ma thag nyid du/_/'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes/_/mgon pos mnyam pa med pa'i gsung brjod pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/su zhig rmang lam rmi 
[\[11a.7\]]ba'i dus na yang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te/_/ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis/_/gang zhig chags par bya bar ma nus shing /_/gang zhig chags las rnam par 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]'das gyur pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis/_/gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing /_/zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab 'das pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang 
[\[11b.2\]]rmongs 'gyur bas/_/gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te/_/shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang /_/longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis/_/gang zhig bcing bar nus 
[\[11b.3\]]par ma gyur pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgyad dag gis/_/ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te/_/dpal stug ldan zhing rtag tu mi ngam pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i 
[\[11b.4\]]tshig snyan pa/_/rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang /_/gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa/_/de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/_/don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang /_/chos dad 'dod la nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/gang zhig bcing bar nus par 
[\[11b.5\]]ma gyur pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa/_/gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe/_/dpung rnams kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed 
[\[11b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su/_/'chi med rgyu phyir [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]spyod mdzad pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/_/zhen pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis/_/lo drug bar du dka' thub drag spyad pa/_/de yi 
[\[11b.7\]]gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na/_/lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod khu gsol/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang la lo drug bar du bdud kyis ni/_/rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brongs te glags btsal kyang /_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing /_/su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la/_/'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang zhig 
[\[12a.2\]]gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par/_/rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi/_/byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te/_/nyid kyis 
[\[12a.3\]]chos ni rab tu bshad pa na/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir/_/shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byon gyur te/_/shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[12a.4\]]gis/_/sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de/_/bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad na/_/de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/de dus da bab de ltar dus mkhyen pas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi dus mkhyen te/_/'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po/_/de yi 
[\[12a.5\]]gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/_/mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la/_/blta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes/_/rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su/_/de snyam du ni rjes su bsam pa byas/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bsams nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[12a.6\]]'char ka la smras pa/_dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_rgyal po khyod kyi don du bsam byas te/_/khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs/_/stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i 
[\[12a.7\]]sems bskyed na/_/skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong /_/stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad med ldan/_/drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa/_/'dir byon rgyal po thugs dad skyed cig dang /_/khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung /_/khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]pa ste/_/stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che mnga' ba/_/chu khrod pad ma ji bzhin chags med par/_/stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad/_/srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal gyur nas/_/'gro ba mang po chu bo che las sgrol/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 
[\[12b.2\]]'don gyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te/_/sman pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin/_/gso ba byed pa mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de/_/nag 
[\[12b.3\]]po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas/_/mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur gyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/'gro ba dgrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang /_/'chi med zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes/_/mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol 'debs kyis/_/'dren pa 
[\[12b.4\]]mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te/_/ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/rnam dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag_/mun pa rab 
[\[12b.5\]]rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi/_/mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la/_/rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing /_/'chi med gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis/_/'dren 
[\[12b.6\]]pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/me chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di/_/mes tshig sa la sprin chen char pa bzhin/_/bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/dri gsum dri ma spangs shing skyon bsal te/_/dri 
[\[12b.7\]]ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing /_/stobs bcu rnam par snang ba skyed mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/skye dgu kun la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas/_/stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs/_/thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grol 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/bcom ldan de ni ma dul sems can 'dul/_/thugs rje mnga' ba ma zhi zhi mdzad cing /_/rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/skye bo rnams kyi srid 
[\[13a.2\]]pa'i rgya mtsho skems/_/rgya mtsho las ni lha bus ji lta bar/_/stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/_/thugs rje chen po dad pa'i thugs kyis spyod/_/yun ring 'khrugs 
[\[13a.3\]]pa'i skye bo dad mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin/_/rgyal ba skye bo dang bar spyod mdzad cing /_/mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yongs 
[\[13a.4\]]dag pa/_/mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/_/rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs/_/mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed/_/'jig rten gtso la dad pa thob gyur na/_/lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor/_/srid pa'i rgyud spangs zhi ba mchog 
[\[13a.5\]]tu 'dod/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te/_/bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan mthar phyin min/_/'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 
[\[13a.6\]]mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong /_sngon bdag rgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o/_/zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes 
[\[13a.7\]]su dran nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to/_/de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na/_khyod bdag zan zo la bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song shig_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]nga yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[13b.2\]]dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/_deng skye bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[13b.3\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_'char ka legs so legs so/_/de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[13b.4\]]dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la/_gal te gzugs shig yod na ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang bsod nams kyi phung po de 
[\[13b.5\]]mi shong ste/_bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas phyag bcabs lhung bzed bkrus te/_mtshan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do/_/mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu 
[\[13b.6\]]mdzad pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang pa las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi 
[\[13b.7\]]bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/_steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/_des 
[\[14a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs logs su brten te/_steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang 
[\[14a.3\]]grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs logs su brten te/_steng gi bar snang la grul bum 
[\[14a.4\]]gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing /_mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[14a.5\]]kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas nub phyogs logs su brten te/_steng gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/lha'i 
[\[14a.6\]]dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de bzhin du 
[\[14a.7\]]lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dga' dang /_lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu 
[\[14b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyang lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang 
[\[14b.3\]]ba las bskum pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 
[\[14b.4\]]'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/bya'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 
[\[14b.5\]]'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khams tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 'dus par gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du/_/ma 
[\[14b.6\]]lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis/_/skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/nam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes/_/zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba/_/mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'joms/_/rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas 
[\[14b.7\]]ni/_/mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes/_/nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa/_/ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing /_/lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/nyi ma de ni pad ma'i kha yang 'byed/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas/_/
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]stong gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing /_/nyan thos pad ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed/_/lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni/_/mdun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba/_/lha yi 'khor 
[\[15a.2\]]rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes/_/rkang gnyis dbang po dpal stug stobs bcu yang /_/dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na/_/rtog ge'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/dge sbyong tshogs kyi 
[\[15a.3\]]dbus na rnam par mdzes/_/lha yi dbang po 'thab bral dbang byed pa/_/'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa/_/'thab bral bzang po lha tshogs nang zhugs te/_/'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes/_/gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba 
[\[15a.4\]]yang /_/lam ngan ngan 'gror 'dong pa zil mnan nas/_/yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing /_/stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes/_/lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de/_/dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor/_/lha 
[\[15a.5\]]tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes/_/de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang /_/lha dang lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas/_/'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes/_/lha 
[\[15a.6\]]yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni/_/lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su/_/rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na/_/gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes/_/de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing /_/stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po/_/
[\[15a.7\]]ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang /_/skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/_/lha yi rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni/_/lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te/_/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/_/rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag_/sngon chad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te/_/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/_/rgyal po de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang /_/tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te/_/
[\[15b.2\]]shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag_/yongs su rjod par byed cing mngon du mdzes/_/de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa/_/dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis/_/mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing /_/'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon 
[\[15b.3\]]par mdzes/_/nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang /_/lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas/_/skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi/_/gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston par mdzad/_/bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid/_/rgya mtsho bum pas 
[\[15b.4\]]gzhal du rung yang srid/_/ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so/_/rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka song nas ring po ma lon par 
[\[15b.5\]]rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/_grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di dmar ring 'char ba'o/_/dmar ring shar na nyi ma 'char bar shes so/_/grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15b.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/_dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no/_/grogs pa dag de lta bas na bzhon pa'i mchog rnams stong de sta gon gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ring kho na bdag cag bcom 
[\[15b.7\]]ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de lta zhing 'dong ngo /_/lha legs so zhes gsol nas shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/_theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bstad do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing bye ma gtsang ma bdal du bcug ste/_nyams dga' ba dang /_me tog sil mas gang ba dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/_skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang /_
[\[16a.2\]]glu mkhan dang /_gyad dang /_bum rnga thogs pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo dang /_glu'i cha spyad dang /_yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa rnams dang /_bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon 
[\[16a.3\]]te/_ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/_'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngo la rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing /_rgyan rnams kyang sngo la dril 
[\[16a.4\]]bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/_'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang /_thod dang /_nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang /_lham rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/_kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon zhing rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta ba 
[\[16a.5\]]rnams zhal ta byed pa/_rgyan sngon po can gyi lcag thogs pa dang /_khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/_rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/_shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to/_/shAkya la la'i bzhon pa rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/_'di 
[\[16a.6\]]ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du ser ba nas thams cad du dmar ba dang /_thams cad du dkar ba dang /_thams cad du bkra ba dang /_shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du yang 
[\[16a.7\]]glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/_glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang ba brtsegs pa bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bar gyur to/_/glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka brgyus pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_
[\[16b.2\]]shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis shAkya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge 
[\[16b.3\]]slong dag shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas/_/rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de/_/'khor dang bcas te 
[\[16b.4\]]ji ltar 'ong gyur pa/_/de ltar bstan gyis khyed rnams de nyon cig_/shing rta brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag_/legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas/_/mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur/_/shing rta sngo 
[\[16b.5\]]zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang /_/rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang sngo ba ste/_/de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo/_/lcag kyang sngo zhing thag srad rnams kyang sngo/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/_/mi rnams kyang ni sngon 
[\[16b.6\]]po'i gos can te/_/rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/_/shing rta ser zhing rgyan kyang ser ba dang /_/rta yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang ser po ste/_/de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser/_/lcag kyang ser 
[\[16b.7\]]zhing thag srad rnams kyang ser/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/_/mi rnams kyang ni ser po'i gos can te/_/rgyal mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/_/shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang /_/rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bcas/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste/_/de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dmar/_/lcag kyang dmar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/_/mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te/_/rgyal 
[\[17a.2\]]mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/_/shing rta dkar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang /_/rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste/_/de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar/_/lcag kyang dkar zhing thag 
[\[17a.3\]]srad rnams kyang dkar/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/_/mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te/_/rgyal mtshan dkar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas/_/shing rta bkra zhing rgyan kyang bkra ba dang /_/rta yang bkra zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang 
[\[17a.4\]]bcas/_/mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste/_/de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra/_/lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srad rnams kyang bkra/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/_/mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te/_/rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes 
[\[17a.5\]]par byas/_/shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/_/glang po brgyad khri tshang bar bshams pa ni/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan/_/glang chen rnams ni gser gyis tshal par brgyan/_/de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi/_/khang pa 
[\[17a.6\]]brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/_/shing rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams/_/de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang /_/rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan/_/rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 
[\[17a.7\]]'cham stabs can/_/glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang /_/rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi/_/me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram/_/dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres/_/bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/_/glu mkhan gar mkhan 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rnams dang gyad rnams dang /_/bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas/_/rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang /_/rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang /_/rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po zas 
[\[17b.2\]]gtsang ma dang /_shAkya rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma nga 
[\[17b.3\]]rgyal che bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[17b.4\]]pa zhabs 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/_/g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhabs 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zhabs 'bring du lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_rab 'phrul dga' dang /_
[\[17b.5\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis g.yob par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma 
[\[17b.6\]]la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi 
[\[17b.7\]]bzang gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi 
[\[18a.2\]]bar snang la gnas te/_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mud dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_lha'i man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_lha'i spos kyi phye ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo sil 
[\[18a.3\]]snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i nga ro yang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to/_/sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang 
[\[18a.4\]]bab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong /_
[\[18a.5\]]lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang ba brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/_sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du nga la ni gling chen po 
[\[18a.6\]]bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/_ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/_bdag ni mi'i 
[\[18a.7\]]'khor can du zad/_bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces smras 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bltam ma thag tu sus kyang ma brten par sa chen po la gom pa bdun bzhud de/_phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/_nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/_nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo/_nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/_ngas skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi 
[\[18b.2\]]ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib 
[\[18b.3\]]mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma btang ste/_lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so/_/da yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[18b.4\]]su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/_/sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de/_/nga ni 'jig rten na ni mchog ces gsungs/_/de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gang tshe thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud tshe/_/'dzam bu'i grib 
[\[18b.5\]]mas bzhugs pa ma btang zhing /_/lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa/_/de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/nga yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du/_/thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso/_/khyod 'dra 
[\[18b.6\]]'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos/_/mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa/_/pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags/_/khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na/_/don grub lags par bdag gis da gdod 'tshal/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod 
[\[18b.7\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bus yog par bting ngo /_/steng du yang 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla res bres so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/_gang na khri bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[19a.2\]]bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/ser skya zhes 
[\[19a.3\]]bya grong khyer dam pa yi/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi ra ba nyams dga' bar/_/rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang gi tshe/_/'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe/_/skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te/_/lha ma yin dang mkha' lding dbang po dang /_/klu tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum 
[\[19a.4\]]dang /_/dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/_/de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te/_/mi'am ci'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang /_/de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha/_/rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur/_/de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs 
[\[19a.5\]]pa yi/_/tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang /_/'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang /_/'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus/_/dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang /_/spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyu dag dang /_/gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang 
[\[19a.6\]]po/_/log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis/_/rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems/_/yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir/_/de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur/_/sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad 
[\[19a.7\]]pa'i/_/tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad/_/da ni rgyal ba rgyal po zas gtsang la/_/rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed/_/bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis/_/gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yi/_/rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]lung bstan gyis/_/khab nas ma byung shig ces sngon gsol pa/_/gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/_/rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur/_/'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur/_/chos la gnas shing 
[\[19b.2\]]sa yang skyong ba ste/_/gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur/_/mi yi bdag dang mi yi mchod par 'ong /_/lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab/_/de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas/_/bdag ni 
[\[19b.3\]]rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smras kyis/_/rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs/_/'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis/_/bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed pas na/_/de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod/_/bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re/_/rgyal po 
[\[19b.4\]]chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis ru sbal gcig cig 'phangs/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dang /_/ru sbal de ni khron pa'i nang du ltung /_/de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis/_/rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gang nas 'dir 'ongs kwa'e/_/nga yi the tshom skyes 
[\[19b.5\]]pa bcad pa'i phyir/_/myur du nga la smros zhes de skad smras/_/khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal de nyid la/_/rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo chen des smras pa/_/nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te/_/khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de ni phyir log song /_/
[\[19b.6\]]nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te/_/nga ni rlabs dang bral bar gyur pas na/_/ru sbal khyod kyi khron par gnas 'cha'o/_/de la khron pa'i nang gi ru sbal gyis/_/rgya mtsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam 'am/_/'on te khron pa 'di bas che ba zhig_/dris lan nga la myur du smros zhes smras/_/
[\[19b.7\]]rgya mtsho'i ru sbal blo rgya chen po des/_/khron pa'i ru sbal de la tshig smras pa/_/khron pa'i ru sbal khyod ni byis pa ste/_/blo rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu zhan/_/nga ni lan tshwa can gyi chu der btsas/_/yun ring dus na de na skye skye yang /_/rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma nus na/_/dbus 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]lta shes pa ga la nus zhes smras/_/de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang /_/bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de/_/gling bzhi pa yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni/_/khyod kyis bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed/_/bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/chad 
[\[20a.2\]]pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par/_/stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa thob par 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas/_/de phyir 
[\[20a.3\]]'khor chen po ni de dag dang /_/sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgongs pa mdzad/_/rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir/_/thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang /_/'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par/_/de yi tshe na der ni 'dus par gyur/_/rgyal 
[\[20a.4\]]po 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris lha 
[\[20a.5\]]ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/_de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che'i rin thang yod pa dang /_rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 
[\[20a.6\]]bya ba'i phyir phul lo/_/rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/_/shing rta de dag re re zhing yang rta cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon 
[\[20a.7\]]par sprul te/_rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba can la rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i 'phyar 'dab can/_gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go_/rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to/_/shing rta de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/_shing rta de dag 'dong na 
[\[20b.2\]]ni rjes su 'dong /_shing rta de dag sdod na ni sdod pa sha stag go_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag la yang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sbyangs so/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang ldan 
[\[20b.3\]]par mngon par sprul to/_/shing rta'i rgyan dang /_rta'i rgyan dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas sgra phyung 
[\[20b.4\]]na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang /_mnyan na bde bar 'byung ba de bzhin du shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang /_rta'i rgyan de dag dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur to/_/shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang 
[\[20b.5\]]la dpag tshad drug cu bsgribs te 'khod par gyur to/_/shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/_/shing rta de dag thams cad la yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[20b.6\]]phyir la la ni rol mo byed/_la la ni sil snyan dkrol/_la la ni glu len/_la la ni gar byed/_la la ni tsan dan dang ud pa la'i phye mas 'thor/_la la ni a ga ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/_la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye mas 'thor/_la la ni gser dngul gyi phye 
[\[20b.7\]]mas 'thor/_la la ni man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man ju Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dang /_skya snar dang /_skya snar chen po dang /_skya snar khra bo dang /_skya snar bkra chen gyi me 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]tog mngon par sprul cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/_/la la ni gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog dang /_shel gyi me tog dang /_bai dUr+ya'i me tog dang /_sbug gi me tog dang /_mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang /_rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon 
[\[21a.2\]]par 'thor ro/_/la la ni rin po che sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/_/la la ni na bza' dang /_rgyan 'bul lo/_/la la ni sku rags dang /_zhabs kyi rgyan dang /_phyag gi rgyan dang /_sor gdub dang /_gdu bu dang /_gdu bu tham pa dang /_
[\[21a.3\]]dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi do shal dang /_nor bu'i do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_gya do dang /_mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar gyur to/_/la la ni tsong tsong gshibs pa/_la la ni mgo rgyan/_la la ni rna cha gdub kor/_
[\[21a.4\]]la la ni gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa/_la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spras pa/_la la ni gser gyi dra ba/_la la ni gser gyi phreng ba dang /_nor bu'i phreng ba dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba thogs so/_/la la ni gser gyi gdugs dang /_dngul gyi gdugs dang /_bai dUr+ya'i gdugs dang /_
[\[21a.5\]]shel gyi gdugs dang /_spug gi gdugs dang /_rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang /_mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /_tshon sna tshogs can mang po 
[\[21a.6\]]thogs so/_/la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to/_/la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to/_/mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod la do zla 
[\[21a.7\]]yong ma mchis/_/'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/_/le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'/_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid//nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag 
[\[21b.2\]]khrig phrag drug cu drug cu yang mngon par sprul te/_rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu yang mngon par sprul to/_/bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu 
[\[21b.3\]]mngon par sprul to/_/ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag 
[\[21b.4\]]khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/_/de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni dngul/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dUr+ya/_them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/_ka ba ni spug_/ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/_sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/dngul gyi khyams 
[\[21b.5\]]rnams kyi gdung phyam ni gser/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai dUr+ya/_them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/_ka ba ni spug_/ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/_sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni shel/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/_
[\[21b.6\]]them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/_ka ba ni spug_/ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po/_sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni bai dUr+ya/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni sbug_/them pa dang kha khyer ni rdo'i snying po/_ka ba ni gser/_ka zhu ni dngul/_
[\[21b.7\]]sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni rdo'i snying po/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni mu tig dmar po/_them pa dang kha khyer ni gser/_ka ba ni dngul/_ka zhu ni shel/_sa gzhi ni bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/mu tig dmar 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni spug/_gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni rdo'i snying po/_them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/_ka ba ni gser/_ka zhu ni bai dUr+ya/_sa gzhi ni ke ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni mu tig dmar po/_/
[\[22a.2\]]gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/_them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/_ka ba ni bai dUr+ya/_ka zhu ni ke ke ru/_sa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha stag go_/khyams de dag tu yang seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/_ka tsa lin di'i
