[\[22a.3\]]steng g.yogs can/_mtha' gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/_/seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la ras bcos bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /_srin bal las 
[\[22a.4\]]byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /_zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /_shun phrags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /_ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to/_/seng ge'i khri de dag re re'i ngos gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams 
[\[22a.5\]]cad kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/_seng ge'i khri de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu mo gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo/_/khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag 
[\[22a.6\]]drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/_/khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to/_/de la gser gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/_dngul gyi khyams rnams su 
[\[22a.7\]]ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/_bai dUr+ya'i khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/_shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai dUr+ya gser gyis spras pa dag btsugs/_
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai dUr+yas spras pa dag btsugs so/_/de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po/_rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po/_rgyal mtshan dkar po 
[\[22b.2\]]rnams ni tog dmar po/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go_/rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur to/_/de 'di lta ste/_dper na sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[22b.3\]]gyi lha rnams kyi glang po che sa srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal yongs 'dus brtol du nye bar 'jog go_/de bzhin du pho brang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed do/_/
[\[22b.4\]]rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang /_ba gam de dag dang /_bzhugs sa de dag dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /_khyams de dag dang /_seng ge'i khri de dag dang /_gdugs de dag dang /_rgyal mtshan de dag dang /_ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang /_ud pa la dang /_a 
[\[22b.5\]]ga ru'i phye ma'i char bab par gyur to/_/me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dang /_skya snar dang /_skya snar chen po dang /_skya snar khra bo dang /_
[\[22b.6\]]skya snar bkra chen gyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/_/gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par bab 
[\[22b.7\]]par gyur to/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang dang gang gi char 'bab par 'dod pa de dang de dag las mngon bar bab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po 
[\[23a.2\]]yang mi 'greng bdun tsam du me tog man dA ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[23a.3\]]'di'i sems can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs 
[\[23a.4\]]ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par gtor te/_tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_byang chub dam pa don du gnyer slad du/_/skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi sgul ba/_/lhar 
[\[23a.5\]]bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po/_/khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na/_/log ltung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/_/'khor ba'i 
[\[23a.6\]]sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing /_/mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la/_/'dren pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/_/khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/rga dang 'chi bas nyen par gyur pa yi/_/lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das/_/gang la skyabs 
[\[23a.7\]]song phyis kyang mi skye ba/_/khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe rta'i rgyan de dag dang /_shing rta'i rgyan de dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang /_bla re dang dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_'di ltar dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no/_/de ltar 
[\[23b.2\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang /_ud pa la dang /_a ga ru dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[23b.3\]]du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dang /_skya snar dang /_skya snar chen po dang /_
[\[23b.4\]]skya snar khra bo dang /_skya snar bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang /_sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab bo/_/steng gi bar snang las gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rin po che thams cad 
[\[23b.5\]]kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab bo/_/spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chu'i rdzab tu gyur to/_/spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum 
[\[23b.6\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom 
[\[23b.7\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed pa'i tshe/_bar snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo /_/sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to/_/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya 
[\[24a.2\]]stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu len/_la la ni sil snyan byed/_la la ni gar byed/_la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/_la la ni tsan dan dang /_ud pa la dang /_a ga ru 
[\[24a.3\]]dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/_la la ni lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dang /_skya snar dang /_skya snar 
[\[24a.4\]]chen po dang /_skya snar khra bo dang /_skya snar bkra chen dang /_sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_sbug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang rin po che thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[24a.5\]]'thor ro/_/la la ni na bza' dang /_rkang gdub dang /_sku rags dang /_phyag gi rgyan dang /_sor gdub dang /_gdu bu dang /_gdu bu tham pa dang /_dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_nor bu'i do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_
[\[24a.6\]]gya do dang /_mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang /_rna cha dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_tshong tshong gshibs pa dang /_mgo rgyan dang /_phreng ba'i lda ldi dang /_spos kyi lda ldi dang /_nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang /_spos kyi bla re dang /_nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so/_/la la ni spos 
[\[24a.7\]]chu'i char 'bebs so/_/la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so/_/la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/_/la la ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang /_la la ni gser gyis snyim pa bkang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/_/tshigs su 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bcad pa 'di yang smras so/_/gang brten gang la gnas bcas nas/_/gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang /_/rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim 
[\[24b.2\]]gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi 'jigs 
[\[24b.3\]]'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po/_/'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba bying 
[\[24b.4\]]ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing /_/'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te/_/pad ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba bo/_/blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid mkhyen/_/rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams 
[\[24b.5\]]cad bshig_/khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'/_/mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun 
[\[24b.6\]]gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing gser phye dag gis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_sa dang bar snang dang ni lha'i yul na'ang /_/bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis/_/
[\[24b.7\]]mtshan mar gzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i/_/'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen/_/'di na byed pa tshor ba sems can med/_/gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med/_/chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben/_/rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan/_/su zhig 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te/_/chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba/_/de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste/_/ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod/_/rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nams gang skyes de/_/ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen 
[\[25a.2\]]pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir/_/'gro la stsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas grub par shog/_//bam po gsum pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs 
[\[25a.3\]]ldan gyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/_tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chu las pha 
[\[25a.4\]]rol rnams rgal ba/_/rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing /_/bde gshegs pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa med 'jog pa/_/spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs/_/blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen/_/phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhen 
[\[25a.5\]]blo ldan te/_/'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad/_/mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma dang /_/smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs zhes rab tu bstan/_/thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi 
[\[25a.6\]]sras mchog bskyed/_/srid pa gsum po dag ni mi chags spyad pa spyod/_/dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang /_/gzhan gyi dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen/_/byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bur/_/mi dbang khyod kyis sras kyis tshal na spyad pa spyod/_/
[\[25a.7\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil mnan/_/ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang /_/rgya mtshos ba rjes chu bzhin no/_/gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/_/gzugs kyis 
[\[25b.2\]]gzugs kyi dam pa dang /_/gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis mnan/_/dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin/_/gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis/_/sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan/_/zil mnan de dag lam me min/_/nyi mas me khyer zil brlag 
[\[25b.3\]]bzhin/_/ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/_/'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan/_/zil mnan de dag lam me min/_/nyi mas zla 'od zil brlag bzhin/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis 
[\[25b.4\]]kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing me tog skya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_/'dren pa blo gros 
[\[25b.5\]]zhi ba bo/_/zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi/_/'dod sdang gti mug rdul zhi mdzad/_/char pas rdul rnams zhi bgyid bzhin/_/'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad/_/blugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no/_/nags btang nags mes shing sreg ltar/_/de bzhin nyon 
[\[25b.6\]]mongs dra ba sreg_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/_/dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin/_/nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad de/_/bdud rtsis lus byugs dug bzhin no/_/mun pa mun nag sel mdzad de/_/mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/_/chos kyi tshul yang ston 
[\[25b.7\]]mdzad de/_/nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis btul/_/g.yul la dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo 
[\[26a.2\]]bzhin/_/shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad/_/thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom/_/gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes/_/khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs/_/rnam 
[\[26a.3\]]pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom/_/mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te/_/khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam/_/thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig_/'gro ba kun du khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'/_/shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i sred pa 
[\[26a.4\]]bskams/_/shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag_/chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/_/thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[26a.5\]]mig [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po yang phul nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod 
[\[26a.6\]]pa/_dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni/_/chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen/_/gang 'di chos zhes brjod pa yang /_/de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad/_chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis/_/rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so/_/gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang /_/
[\[26a.7\]]de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs/_/ming ni ming gis dben pa ste/_/mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste/_/ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad/_/rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang /_/bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te/_/gang gis kyang ni 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ma bshad cing /_/su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so/_/khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams/_/chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni/_/chos rnams la yang mi chags par/_/rnam par spyad do thub pa che/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ji ltar byas pa de 
[\[26b.2\]]bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas tshigs 
[\[26b.3\]]su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do/_/tshul khrims dang ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs/_/de ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/_/de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis/_/khyod 
[\[26b.4\]]kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na/_/gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan/_/sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/dpe byad phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag_/tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi bskyod do/_/skye bo 
[\[26b.5\]]mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang /_/khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag_/mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor/_/shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis/_/de na mi bsnyengs 'jig rten gsum btul nas/_/'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra 
[\[26b.6\]]bsgrags te/_/rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la 
[\[26b.7\]]zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_thub pa chen po skye bo'i tshogs pa 'di/_/dang ba'i yid kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/kun gyis rgyal ba 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]mdun na bzhugs par mthong /_/de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/_/skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal/_/thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung /_/de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 
[\[27a.2\]]'dres mtshan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la/_/'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing /_/'gro bas rang don ci lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal/_/de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/_/gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni/_/gcig la 
[\[27a.3\]]'jog gi gzhan ni dgag par mdzad/_/'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtog par mdzad/_/de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[27a.4\]]mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang /_/
[\[27a.5\]]yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi/_/blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te/_/mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras/_/chos rnams 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te/_/rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra/_/
[\[27a.6\]]rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis/_/de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/_/ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra/_/byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyi/_/gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo 
[\[27a.7\]]mnga' ba/_/mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs mi bgyid/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang /_/mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yod mi mchi/_/chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas/_/yang dag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]thob par gyur/_/de nas thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te thal mo 
[\[27b.2\]]sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/_lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa 
[\[27b.3\]]mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_
[\[27b.4\]]shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang ste phyir log nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las 
[\[27b.5\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/_'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par/_/
[\[27b.6\]]mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad/_/skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/_/lha min mchod pa rgya chen gzigs gyur nas/_/'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na/_/lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal 
[\[27b.7\]]gsol/_/de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems/_/'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/_/mi yi seng ge 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/_/de ring yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]yid kyis su/_/mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis bskyed/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen te/_/yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/_/bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/_/'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 
[\[28a.2\]]'di/_/su yi dpung bcas bdud ni deng bcom zhes/_/'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/_/drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal/_/the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi bcad du gsol/_/mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi/_/the tshom smyur te legs par bcad du gsol/_/de 
[\[28a.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/_/'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa/_/de yis 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya/_/bstan pa de ni rtse 
[\[28a.4\]]gcig yid kyis nyon/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/_/lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te/_/de dag sems ni ci la'ang chags med pas/_/nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin/_/lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te/_/de dag nga la mchod pa 'di 
[\[28a.5\]]byas pas/_/blo can de dag lha min ris bor te/_/mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/_/de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba snyed/_/bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la/_/de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de tshe bde 
[\[28a.6\]]gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i rnams/_/'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste/_/de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing /_/shin tu yangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[28a.7\]]khrag khrig drug cur tshangs pa yi/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur/_/de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad/_/de dag zhing der dga' bar spyod par 'gyur/_/brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong /_/bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur/_/de dag tshe yi 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]tshad du gyur pa ni/_/bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang /_/rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad/_/thub pa de dag mya ngan 'das gyur te/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu zhi gyur nas/_/bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni/_/
[\[28b.2\]]rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul/_/dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur/_/zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun/_/bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi/_/
[\[28b.3\]]skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de/_/bla na med pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin/_/rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa/_/'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsungs/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas/_/yi 
[\[28b.4\]]rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skye bar gyur/_/lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 
[\[28b.5\]]spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzad na 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/_de'i tshe sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pas bskal pa grangs med pa yang rjes su dran zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang der 'chi 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 
[\[28b.6\]]dag mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag 
[\[28b.7\]]go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na de'i thugs [(]bskyod [,]bskyed [)]pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur te/_lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gi thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi 
[\[29a.2\]]nus so snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/_thub pa byang chub gzhol ba yi/_/thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang /_/lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 
[\[29a.3\]]'dis/_/cha tsam mi spyod mi'i seng ge_/de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te/_/lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa/_/tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam/_/mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os/_/mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/_/gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/_/rgya mtsho rab tu bkang ba yi/_/spos chu dag gi 
[\[29a.4\]]mchod par 'os/_/yon tan chen po mnga' ba la/_/gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/_/me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog_/khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os/_/rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba/_/mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam/_/'bru mar rgya mtsho'i chu snyed kyi/_/mar me rnams kyis mchod par 
[\[29a.5\]]'os/_/mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur/_/yon tan pha rol phyin gyur ba/_/gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/_/me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os/_/mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba/_/rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis/_/bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang /_/sems can mchog 
[\[29a.6\]]la mchod par 'os/_/yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod/_/rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste/_/bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os/_/mi yi seng ge khyod la ni/_/bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par/_/gang gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i/_/
[\[29a.7\]]ba dan tshogs kyis mchod par 'os/_/drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag_/lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang /_/gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa/_/brtag bzung dpe la gsan du gsol/_/gal te gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/_/sems can thams 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]cad sangs rgyas su/_/mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la/_/de dag re re'i mgo bo yang /_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te/_/mgo bo de dag re re zhing /_/de snyed kha dang ldan gyur la/_/kha rnams de dag re re zhing /_/lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/
[\[29b.2\]]bskal par bstod par bgyis kyang ni/_/rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas/_/khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin/_/rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi/_/pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/nga'i 
[\[29b.3\]]nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa/_ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/_chos su gyur pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/_de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang 
[\[29b.4\]]ldan pa ste/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin 
[\[29b.5\]]gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/_sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang gA'i 
[\[29b.6\]]klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyi tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/_bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji 
[\[29b.7\]]snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de/_sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo /_/sems can gyi khams 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]ni mi zad pa ste/_sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo /_/sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du skyes pas sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan 
[\[30a.2\]]lon par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol 
[\[30a.3\]]bar 'gyur zhes te zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/_bgrang du 
[\[30a.4\]]med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[30a.5\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[30a.6\]]rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te don kyang mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/_yongs su dag cing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/_
[\[30a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to/_lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par gyur to/_/lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pa dang 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]ldan pa'i sems can yong med par gyur to/_/ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing btams te rjes su bstan cing bslabs 
[\[30b.2\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/_'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde 
[\[30b.3\]]ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/_de dag bde ba de la yang spyod la/_bde ba de dag la yang 
[\[30b.4\]]mngon par zhen pa med par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la 
[\[30b.5\]]yang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med 
[\[30b.6\]]rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/_gzhan du na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba sha stag la yongs su spyod de/_de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 
[\[30b.7\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste/_dge ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med de/_de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'byung ngo /_/de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams la sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'du ma byas te/_de ma bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal 
[\[31a.2\]]yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa de mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro/_/rlung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo /_/char 
[\[31a.3\]]nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can de dag la lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas sems can de dag gis 
[\[31a.4\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas las de'i rnam par smin pas de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba'am yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do/_rmongs 
[\[31a.5\]]pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do/_/de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa yang med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i 
[\[31a.6\]]sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des btams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/_chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 
[\[31a.7\]]mi 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du 'greng pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_sad pa dang /_spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la ya nga ba ma spangs pa med de/_de'i phyir ya nga ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]ngo /_/yang dag pa'i spang ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med de/_de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/_/sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/_de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[31b.2\]]de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/_de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag chos thams 
[\[31b.3\]]cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/_de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/_/sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/_'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba 
[\[31b.4\]]med pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe des 
[\[31b.5\]]gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/_de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/_dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /_dma' ba dang /_zhum pa dang /_chung 
[\[31b.6\]]ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_nyes par bsams pa dang /_nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig don bya ba'am/_de 
[\[31b.7\]]dag la phan par bsams pa'am/_bde ba bsgrub pa'am/_sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/_de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/_sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/_sems zhan pa dang /_sems dma' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba 'am/_de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/_bde bar bsgrub pa'am/_sdug bsngal 
[\[32a.2\]]bsal ba'am/_de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/_sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/_dad pa zhan pa nas 
[\[32a.3\]]nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang /_tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang /_thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i bar dang /_brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang /_dran pa zhan pa nas nyes 
[\[32a.4\]]bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang /_shes rab zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am/_de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/_bde bsgrub pa'am/_
[\[32a.5\]]sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/_de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/_sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/_gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag legs so legs 
[\[32a.6\]]so/_/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang /_sems zhan pa dang /_dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab zhan pa dang /_dma' ba dang /_zhum pa dang /_chung ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis yongs su 
[\[32a.7\]]bsgrubs pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_nyes par bsams pa dang /_nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba'am/_de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/_bde bar 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]bsgrubs pa'am/_sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/_de ltar tha gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/_sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so/_/dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 
[\[32b.2\]]byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod do/_de na de 
[\[32b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32b.4\]]gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston gyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[32b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[32b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi 
[\[32b.7\]]khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga 'dir gnas par gyur to/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni bcom ldan 
[\[33a.2\]]'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi 
[\[33a.3\]]mnga'/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/_sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/_la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/_rgyal ba gtso bo/_rgyal ba dam pa/_
[\[33a.4\]]rgyal ba mchog_/rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do/_/de skad ces smras nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/_/
[\[33a.5\]]sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing /_/sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/_/dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul/_/bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang /_/da dung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/_/byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug_/stong 
[\[33a.6\]]gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas/_/ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa/_/rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal/_/da dung dang po thugs bskyed par/_/de dang der ni yongs bstan te/_/da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod/_/sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad/_/
[\[33a.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis/_/gang zag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad/_/chos kyi dbyings la chags mi mnga'/_/khyod kyi gang yang mkhyen mdzad de/_/brgya byin tshangs pa'i cha byad dang /_/la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis/_/sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/_/'jig rten 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]rnams kyis rtogs mi nus/_/bud med cha byad spyod pa mdzad/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'/_/'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/_/pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/_/'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi/_/'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad/_/des na skye dgu 'di 
[\[33b.2\]]dag rnams/_/gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod/_/la lar bltam pa yongs su bstan/_/la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan/_/la la na ni 'khor lo skor/_/la lar spyad pa spyod pa mdzad/_/sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du/_/dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad/_/
[\[33b.3\]]bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad/_/sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal/_/'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul/_/'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar/_/sems can rnam par gdul don du/_/'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/_/rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan 
[\[33b.4\]]te/_/byis pa ma lags byis tshul gyis/_/sems can rnam par gdul slad du/_/'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/_/smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul/_/zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar/_/rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis/_/sems can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad/_/de ltar 
[\[33b.5\]]bsam yas mgon po khyod/_/dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig_/sngon byung ba 'od srung chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma 
[\[33b.6\]]yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu bkra ba 
[\[33b.7\]]blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to/_/lha'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ris bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/_/rin po che sna bzhi ni 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel lo/_gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang /_gdang bu rnams ni gser/_shar ba rnams ni dngul/_dngul 
[\[34a.2\]]gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngul/_shar ba rnams ni gser/_bai dUr+ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu ni bai dUr+ya/_shar ba rnams ni shel/_shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/_shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o/_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[34a.3\]]pa de dag dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/_/de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang bdun no/_/khang pa 
[\[34a.4\]]brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa 'di lta ste/_gser gyi dra ba dang /_dngul gyi dra ba dang /_bai dUr+ya'i dra ba dang /_shel gyi dra ba dang /_mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dang /_spug gi dra ba dang /_rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to/_/gdugs bkra ba/_blta na 
[\[34a.5\]]sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul te/_de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go_/rgyal mtshan bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/_rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[34a.6\]]bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/_rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po can/_rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/_rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can sha stag mngon par sprul to/_/ba dan kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[34a.7\]]can bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to/_/bla re bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur te/_bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang /_dngul skud kyi bla re dang /_bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang /_shel gyi bla re dang /_mu tig 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]dmar po'i bla re dang /_spug gi bla re dang /_rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/_rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go_/de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /_gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /_rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong 
[\[34b.2\]]po de dag dang /_ba dan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /_bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ni sum 
[\[34b.3\]]cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste/_yongs 'dus brtol du gzhog go_/de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /_gdugs de dag dang /_rgyal mtshan de dag dang /_ba dan de dag dang /_bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[34b.4\]]gsum skor ba byed par gyur to/_/de nas 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brgyad khri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[34b.5\]]mngon par bstod pa/_rga dang 'chi las rnam bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rga dang 'chi las rnam 'grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so/_/bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus 
[\[34b.6\]]ldan zhing /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar gyur par shog_/bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing /_/mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te/_/spyod 
[\[34b.7\]]lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing /_/'gro ba rnams sbyong mya ngan zlo bar shog_/bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing /_/shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog_/de ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur/_/skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub par shog_/'dren pa 'jig rten mkhas pa 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]khyod lta bur/_/bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang /_/ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing /_/'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog_/bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos med dang /_/rmi 'dra sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang /_/brag ca nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing /_/
[\[35a.2\]]ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas rnams/_/
[\[35a.3\]]rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_/'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/_/'jig rten phan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs/_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te/_/bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed/_/rkang gnyis 
[\[35a.4\]]dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/_/'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing /_/dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod/_/mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal/_/rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol/_/mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni/_/'gro ba thams cad the 
[\[35a.5\]]tshom med 'gyur zhing /_/the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur/_/'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi/_/'khor 'dir 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal nas/_/rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mngon dga' ste/_/slob ma mchog la bla 
[\[35a.6\]]mas bstan pa bzhin/_/the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol/_/rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su smon pa mdzod/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'di 'dus gyur gyis/_/rang byung mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' 
[\[35a.7\]]stsal pa/_thams cad zil gnon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden/_/rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs/_/'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyangs kyis/_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa/_/rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/_/'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa/_/de yi 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon/_/the tshom sol la rab tu dga' ba skyed/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub zhi tshol zhing /_/stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis/_/'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir/_/'dab chags dbang pos nga la mchod legs byas/_/ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi/_/
[\[35b.2\]]sred med bu lus shin tu mkhregs pa dang /_/sum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams/_/yongs su btsal phyir nga la mchod pa byas/_/rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang /_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang /_/phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnam dgrol ba/_/'di dag kun btsal don 
[\[35b.3\]]du mchod pa byas/_/de dag nga la dga' bas mchod byas pas/_/dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas/_/lha dang brtul zhugs 'thun par de dag 'dong /_/'di ni ngan song srid pa'i tha ma yin/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing /_/rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' 
[\[35b.4\]]yas mchod byas nas/_/de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de dag zhing du ngan song mi 'byung ste/_/mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med/_/rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes/_/ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal la rang byung 'gyur/_/lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par/_/'jig rten phan phyir 
[\[35b.5\]]'dren pa de dag bzhugs/_/'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas/_/lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur/_/skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi_/'dus pa nga rgyal spangs pa brgyad cur 'gyur/_/de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi/_/shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung /_/'dren pa 
[\[35b.6\]]de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur/_/mi dag de ltar 'di rnams nga rgyal che/_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lus su gyur nas stobs po che/_/'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na/_/drang srong dka' thub drag po'i tshogs can gyur/_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshang ba ste/_/dka' thub spyod 
[\[35b.7\]]de rdzu 'phrul phun sum btsal/_/de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis/_/dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur/_/tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu/_/tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig_/nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes/_/tshul 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad/_/nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed/_/nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de 
[\[36a.2\]]dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/_de dag dga' mgu yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bai dUr+ya'i dra ba lda ldir 
[\[36a.3\]]bkye ba mu tig dmar po'i dra bas bskor ba/_gser gyi yu ba can/_bai dUr+ya'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/_rin po che chun po sbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/_/rta sngon po kha dog sngon po/_sngon po lta bur ston pa/_'od sngon po 'byung ba/_rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/_bai dUr+ya'i srab kyis bsrabs 
[\[36a.4\]]pa/_bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/_/nor bu skar mdog gi bla re kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod la/_des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa cig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to/_/de la rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bkra ba mig tu mdzes pa blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 
[\[36a.5\]]bres par mngon par sprul to/_/bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sprul te bres so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang dag mngon par sprul to/_/klu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/_/de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rta sngon po de dag la zhon nas 
[\[36a.6\]]rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te/_nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag dkrol cing /_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed pa lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/_lha'i a ga ru dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_
[\[36a.7\]]ud pa la'i phye ma dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/_me tog ud pa la dang /_tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/_spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/_lha ma yin gyis ji 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa rgya cher byas so/_/de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/_sems can gang dag gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na 
[\[36b.2\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_nor bu skar mdog gi bla re dag dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi de dag dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag dang /_khrung khrung rkang de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las 'di lta ste/_dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 
[\[36b.3\]]mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur snyan la de lta bur yid du 'ong zhing mnyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to/_/sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/_sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang 
[\[36b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang /_spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur te/_me tog gi char de bab pa'i tshe spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngad byung ste/_'gro zhing ldog go_/spos chu'i char de bab pas 
[\[36b.5\]]kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chu'i rdzab tu gyur te/_spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to/_/sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa 
[\[36b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /_rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang /_rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rgyan thams 
[\[36b.7\]]cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su/_/byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas/_/rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchod cing rab tu 
[\[37a.2\]]dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral/_/rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te/_/kha dog sngo zhing rgyan yang sngo ba'i rta la rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan/_/de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis mchod pa byed/_/klu yi bu mo 
[\[37a.3\]]de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas klu yi sil snyan gyis/_/mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas/_/sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum 
[\[37a.4\]]grag_/sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs/_/de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha' la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur/_/phyogs bcu'i dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur/_/nor bu rin chen skar ma'i 
[\[37a.5\]]mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal/_/klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod pa byas/_/gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing /_/'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa 
[\[37a.6\]]grub par shog_/ji ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grol ba ltar/_/chos kyang bstan te sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol/_/chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyam chung la/_/char rgyun chu 
[\[37a.7\]]la phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med/_/me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni/_/'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi_/sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa/_/byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legs par gzigs/_/de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan/_/ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'khrigs gyur na ri 
[\[37b.2\]]ltar gda' ba yang /_/yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis/_/de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid/_/shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/_/yang dag tu na 'gro ba 
[\[37b.3\]]thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas/_/des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur/_/khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su tshim nas rdzab la zam pa 'dra/_/'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang /_/de lta 
[\[37b.4\]]lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon/_/skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod/_/sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 
[\[37b.5\]]'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_/'jig rten na ni 'jig rten 
[\[37b.6\]]mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad/_/dpal stug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yongs ma mthong /_/mi yi dbang po dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs/_/de thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa/_/dri 
[\[37b.7\]]za rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen/_/rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yong ma mchis/_/de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs/_/de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dogs pa chad par 'gyur/_/thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi/_/'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38a.2\]]kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung /_/'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/_/sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos 
[\[38a.3\]]la som nyi gang 'tshal ba/_/de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol/_/drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsal the tshom khum/_/rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul/_/su zhig yid rab tshim nas 
[\[38a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/_/'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol/_/thos nas bdag cag yi rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/_/'dzum 
[\[38a.5\]]rgyu dga' ba skyed pa bka' stsol thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol/_/de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs 
[\[38a.6\]]su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris/_/klu yi bu mos mchod tshe 'jig rten phan phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan/_/de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon/_/gang gi 
[\[38a.7\]]don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon/_/klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs/_/'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam bshig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas/_/'di na byed med tshor med gang zag med cing skye ba po yang med/_/
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]chos rnams 'di dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing smig rgyu mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po med mthong legs/_/mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod 
[\[38b.2\]]pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra/_/byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong /_/nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong shes pas/_/klu las shi 'phos nas ni lha gnas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lha 
[\[38b.3\]]yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas/_/ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'thab bral lha nang gnas te lha yi gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod/_/lhar gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de ni tshe yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[38b.4\]]sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang /_/dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod/_/pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas/_/
[\[38b.5\]]'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur/_/skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams/_/de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyod nas ni/_/tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 
[\[38b.6\]]'gyur/_/bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te/_/mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshad bar tu gnas na gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni/_/mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa chos 
[\[38b.7\]]kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas/_/'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can/_/chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur/_/bde gshegs 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid zhi bar rtogs/_/bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 
[\[39a.2\]]'bras bu spyad gyur nas/_/der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal par gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang /_/thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed/_/mkhas thub de dag de na bsam 
[\[39a.3\]]gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med/_/bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi/_/kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan/_/mya ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po 
[\[39a.4\]]byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba/_/tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas/_/kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir/_/rang 'byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston/_/tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro 
[\[39a.5\]]ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa nges 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni/_/bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la/_/ci nas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston/_/de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten 
[\[39a.6\]]dag la byang chub phyir/_/phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod/_/rgyal ba kun la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur/_/lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag dang lha min bcas pa 
[\[39a.7\]]dang /_/dri za grul bum mi'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs sbyangs chos kyis stobs rnyed pa/_/de dag thams cad yi rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos/_yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing bcom 
[\[39b.2\]]ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/_ma gzigs pa'am/_ma gsan pa'am/_mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_yang dag par mthong ba/_rims nad med pa/_dus chad pa med pa/_nye bar gtod pa/_'di mthong ba la don yod pa/_mkhas pa rnams 
[\[39b.3\]]kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o/_/'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/_rgod pa/_mi brten pa/_mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang /_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[39b.4\]]slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/_drang por zhugs pa/_rigs par zhugs pa/_'thun par zhugs pa/_'di ltar bud med du gyur pa 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/_ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis 
[\[39b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ri'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyi ngad kyis khyab par byas so/_/spos kyi dri'i ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/_
[\[39b.6\]]sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub 
[\[39b.7\]]tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so/_/n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches chal par bkang ngo /_/klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu yod pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to/_/klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]mngon par sprul te sgra phyung ngo /_/klu'i me tog gi 'dun khang de la yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi phye ba phrag dgu bcu bres so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to/_/'dun khang de'i gzhi yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas par gyur 
[\[40a.2\]]to/_/'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/_ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/_nyams dga' ba/_sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/_mi 
[\[40a.3\]]dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba lta bu'o/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas nor bu la la las ni me 'byung /_la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/_de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung /_la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung /_la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung /_la la las ni chu kha dog dkar 
[\[40a.4\]]po 'byung /_la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo /_nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung /_nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsam pa bzhin du 'byung /_la la ni snum gyi bya ba byed/_la la ni me long gi bya ba byed de 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i 
[\[40a.5\]]nang du snang bar gyur to/_/ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[40a.6\]]yang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/_/'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'i mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to/_/rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna 
[\[40a.7\]]tshogs dang /_rin po che'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' la sogs pa klu 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bye ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du dkri ste rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_nor bu rin po che ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 
[\[40b.2\]]'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to/_/klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[40b.3\]]bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/_cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par lta la/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par 
[\[40b.4\]]gyur to/_/de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la yan 
[\[40b.5\]]lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_/mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa/_/dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can/_/rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te/_bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung /_/lo drug bar du 
[\[40b.6\]]dka' thub dka' mdzad de/_/rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang /_/bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur/_/thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad/_/ji ltar 'dren pa lha mi'i bla ma khyod/_/'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de/_/'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal [(]btar [,]btang [)]gyur pa/_/
[\[40b.7\]]de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/_/thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba dang /_/byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa/_/bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na/_/de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur/_/gang tshe ka ling rgyal pos bzod smra ba'i/_/zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]gyur te/_/de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/_/de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/_/phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma btang ste/_/gang tshe 'dren khyod srang la gcal gyur pa/_/rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste/_/bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che/_/bdag cag mi 'tshal 
[\[41a.2\]]ma lags ci zhe na/_/bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyid pa/_/ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi/_/sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags/_/ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang /_/bde gshegs spyod pa mi 'tshe blor gyur dang /_/sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa/_/'jig rten 'dren pa spyod 
[\[41a.3\]]bde bka' stsal gsol/_/mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la/_/thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson/_/ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur ba/_/de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol/_/rga shi ma mchis go 'phang 'thob 'tshal zhing /_/klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa skom par gnas/_/
[\[41a.4\]]'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i/_/brtul zhugs spyod bde bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/_lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni chos nyid de sangs 
[\[41a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe kha dog sna tshogs dang /_kha dog du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i 
[\[41a.6\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa'i rnams/_/rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba/_/mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol/_/tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni/_/'dzum rgyu nyan 
[\[41a.7\]]'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis/_/mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol/_/'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/_/de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dga'/_/gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te/_/rmongs par bgyis nas yid mi dga' bar bgyis/_/tshogs kyi 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis/_/bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/_/shAkya seng ge bka' stsol the tshom khum/_/sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor bzhag cing /_/'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lta/_/tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal 
[\[41b.2\]]du gsol/_/'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/_/de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar gyur te/_/rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na/_/gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta
