[\[41b.3\]]thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis/_/tshangs 'dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis/_/rta thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/_/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis/_/klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te/_/'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas 
[\[41b.4\]]mchod pa byas/_/skye bo bde bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol/_/snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi/_/'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten/_/'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la/_/'dren pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur/_/zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes 
[\[41b.5\]]stobs ldan stobs/_/mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa/_/rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su/_/shin tu yongs dag yid can bde bar 'gro/_/'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te/_/gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas/_/mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang 
[\[41b.6\]]snying rje thob/_/'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/_/snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can/_/'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas/_/de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/_/rtag tu bdag med tshig ni nyan byed cing /_/'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste/_/de 
[\[41b.7\]]dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/_/de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med/_/'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/_/rgyal ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed/_/bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang /_/bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur/_/srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]spyod cing /_/rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur/_/mtshungs med thob pa bde bar myur du yang /_/yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur/_/thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur/_/skye bo kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan/_/'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi_/dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur/_/
[\[42a.2\]]phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag_/rang byung dgongs min cung zad byed mi 'gyur/_/de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan/_/bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med 'thob par 'gyur/_/de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni/_/bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba med/_/bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi/_/'gro ba 'chi med yang dag 
[\[42a.3\]]thob par 'gyur/_/de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs/_/rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang /_/mya ngan smre sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol/_/tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur/_/klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la/_/yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams/_/gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyi/_/ye shes 'jug 
[\[42a.4\]]'gyur de skad sras la bstan/_/klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste/_/de la yid ni rab tu zhi gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song /_/klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas grul bum bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam 
[\[42a.5\]]mkha' lding rnams dang /_klu'i bu mo rnams dang /_klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' chen po mnga' zhing /_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[42a.6\]]mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/_'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[42a.7\]]shes yangs pa mnga' bas mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhes kyang mtho ba'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin du che'o snyam mo/_/de nas grul bum bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]par sprul te/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang /_dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang /_bai dUr+ya'i bla re dang /_shel gyi bla re dang /_mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang /_spug gi bla re dang /_rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go_/rin po che'i bla re de dag la yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/_gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni dngul gyi me 
[\[42b.2\]]tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_/dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_bai dUr+ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_shel gyi bla re rnams la ni bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_spug gi bla re rnams 
[\[42b.3\]]la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/_rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to/_/shing rta bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/_de dag kyang gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o/_/shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs 
[\[42b.4\]]thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang /_bai dUr+ya'i yu ba can dang /_shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par sprul to/_/gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lda ldi mngon par sprul te/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /_dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /_bai dUr+ya'i me tog gi lda ldi dang /_shel 
[\[42b.5\]]gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang /_mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lda ldi dang /_klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lda ldi sha stag go_/mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/_de dag gis gdugs de dag dang /_me tog gi phreng ba de dag gi gzungs byas so/_/grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to/_/shing rta de dag re 
[\[42b.6\]]re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /_bla re dang /_me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to/_/
[\[42b.7\](]bskod [,]bskor [)]nas shing rta de dag las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can/_/thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste/_/ri yi rgyal po lhun po'i 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ri 'dra ba/_/mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_/'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang /_/tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'/_/'dren pa khyod kyi ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas/_/shes rab ldan la dregs pa yong mi mnga'/_/rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen/_/rang bzhin 
[\[43a.2\]]stong ste rmi lam dga' 'dra dang /_/chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni/_/bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs/_/dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang /_/grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med/_/gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste/_/de bzhin bde bar gshegs pas 'gro 'di gzigs/_/mchod pa 'di kun brag 
[\[43a.3\]]ca ji bzhin te/_/shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang /_/me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/_/brag ca ji bzhin de dag de ltar gda'/_/'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang /_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog_/rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis/_/rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin 
[\[43a.4\]]bstan par bgyi/_/na dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i/_/skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang /_/byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas/_/gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan par bgyi/_/bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas/_/sems can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi/_/thub pa 'khrugs med 
[\[43a.5\]]chos rnams rab ston pa/_/mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_/rnam 'dren 
[\[43a.6\]]'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'/_/ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na/_/'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsol nyan par 'tshal/_/rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas/_/'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal/_/the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum/_/mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs/_/
[\[43a.7\]]gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur/_/de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong /_/deng dus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis/_/mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas/_/gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid gcig bcom/_/gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]g.yo gnas/_/rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/_/de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/_/thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes bar bgyis/_/'dren pa su zhig de ring gting rnyed gyur/_/the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal/_/'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan slad du/_/'gro ba kun kyang thal 
[\[43b.2\]]mo sbyar cing gnas/_/'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom sol/_/rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/_'dzum pa'i rgyu 'di yongs su dris pas na/_/'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis 
[\[43b.3\]]byas par gyur/_/de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis/_/grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te/_/zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag_/mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngom gyur te/_/zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag_/de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de/_/zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang /_/lam stor skye bo 
[\[43b.4\]]rnams la snying brtse zhing /_/bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed/_/snying rje bas na nga la mchod pa byas/_/rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams/_/mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na/_/grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzang /_/brgya byin lha yi drung du 'dong bar 'gyur/_/thugs rje byams don mdzad skyob 
[\[43b.5\]]drung du'ang 'dong /_/de ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te/_/phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur/_/de dag bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing /_/bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed/_go cha chen po rab tu bgos yid kyis/_/de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams/_/khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam 
[\[43b.6\]]par spyod par 'gyur/_/skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te/_/ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/_/der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba byung bar shes/_/de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na/_/ngo mtshar med par skyo bo rnam grol byed/_rgyal ba ngo mtshar med par zhing sbyong zhing /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[43b.7\]]bla med zhi ba tshol/_/de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te/_/'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro/_/de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing /_/bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te/_/grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas/_/'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar gyur/_/grul bum 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_klu'i bu mo rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_grul bum rnams kyis mchod 
[\[44a.2\]]pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med par yang yang dag par bka' stsal/_bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/_
[\[44a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba yang bstan la/_chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[44a.4\]]byang chub tu mos par gyur te/_rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur te/_glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/_/glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa 
[\[44a.5\]]drug drug mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/_so re re la yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/_rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad ma bdun bdun/_pad ma re re zhing 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong /_'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/_lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[44a.6\]]brgyan pa lha'i bdug spos thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pad ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to/_/glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag gi mgo bo re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs nas rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun 
[\[44a.7\]]gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to/_/glang po che'i mgo thams cad la yang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul te/_de nas dri za de dag glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]zhon te/_lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing nam mkha' las rgyu ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas lha'i tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma 
[\[44b.2\]]dang /_ud pa la'i phye ma dang /_lha'i gser phye dang /_lha'i me tog mAn dA ra ba dang /_mAn dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[44b.3\]]la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang /_sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_
[\[44b.4\]]mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/spos kyi bla re de dag las spos kyi ngad 'byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go_/lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo/_/spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug 
[\[44b.5\]]cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/_spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang /_rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na 
[\[44b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir glang po che sa srung gi bu mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang /_gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun 
[\[44b.7\]]par byas so/_/lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/_la la ni tsan dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/_la la ni me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]chen po nas/_skya snar khra bo dang /_skya snar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang /_sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/_la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_rin po che snyim pas blangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[45a.2\]]'das la mngon par 'thor/_la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/_la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang /_sku rags dang /_gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo/_/la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin/_la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i ba 
[\[45a.3\]]dan kha dog sna tshogs dang /_tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/_la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/_lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu de dag 
[\[45a.4\]]la zhon nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag las babs te/_yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad 
[\[45a.5\]]pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_bcom ldan bde gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa/_/srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad/_/khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'/_/mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du/_/
[\[45a.6\]]grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan/_/'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la/_/dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod/_/bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/_/brjed pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis/_/tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma 
[\[45a.7\]]mchis/_/'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyang /_/bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ong med dang /_/gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang /_/chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan/_/rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan/_/chos rnams gang yang bya ba 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]byed ma mchis/_/'jig rten gtso bos bya ba'ang yongs su bstan/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan/_/shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang /_/shing rta'i bgyi 
[\[45b.2\]]ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/_/de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/chos ni chos la yongs su skul mi bgyid/_/chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis/_/chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te/_/chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis/_/'gro 
[\[45b.3\]]ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs/_/kun rdzob de yang de na ma mchis te/_/'gro ba 'di kun kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes/_/tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs/_/mig gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la/_/bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par 
[\[45b.4\]]gzhag_/chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na/_/'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad/_/de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te/_/nor ba'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams/_/chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te/_/zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi 
[\[45b.5\]]med thob par bgyi/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyed ni ci 'dra bar/_/'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/_/thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas/_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog_/ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/_/
[\[45b.6\]]nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba/_/'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba/_/mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgyad ldan yongs su dgrol/_/ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/_/g.yo yi zhags pas zin 
[\[45b.7\]]cing mu ma mthong /_/yongs 'thom spre'u ltar rgod pa yongs su dgrol/_/ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis/_/'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi/_/lha tshogs yongs skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing /_/bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chud gzon dgrol/_/de nas 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum 
[\[46a.2\]]pa mdzad/_/'dren pa rgyu ma mchis par mi 'dzum na/_/bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs/_/nem nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas/_/skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur/_/'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan 
[\[46a.3\]]par 'tshal/_/thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/_/bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs/_/the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal bar gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas/_/mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/_/su zhig 
[\[46a.4\]]bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du/_/blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/_/gang gis blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas/_/bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad/_/'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste/_/bde gshegs 'dzum don zhal nas 
[\[46a.5\]]thos par dga'/_/sor bcu thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing /_/dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta/_/nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa/_/dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig_/'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol/_/rgyal ba 
[\[46a.6\]]thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa/_/khyod kyis don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste/_/'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas/_/skye 
[\[46a.7\]]bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel/_/'dzum mdzad rgyu de rta thul mnyan par gyis/_/rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/_/de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis/_/bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyis nyon/_/dri za 'di rnams chos kyi rjes snyegs shing /_/bde 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas/_/chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste/_/chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin/_/rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas/_/rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur/_/gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba/_/des ni de nyid stong 
[\[46b.2\]]zhes bde gshegs gsungs/_/de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas/_/rta med glang po mchog gis mchod pa byas/_/byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing /_/dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do/_/nor ba'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag 
[\[46b.3\]]mos/_/'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas/_/dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te/_/blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul ba/_/brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa/_/bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchodabyed 'gyur/_/
[\[46b.4\]]zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing /_/de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan/_/de dag bde gshegs spyod pa yongs su sbyong /_/de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni/_/khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston/_/'gro ba 'di 
[\[46b.5\]]dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/_/bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa/_/rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/_/sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i/_/
[\[46b.6\]]bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston/_/rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis/_/de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan/_/rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa/_/dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad/_/dri za 
[\[46b.7\]]lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur ba/_/de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'/_/der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas/_/shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong /_/dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//'phags pa yab dang sras 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa/_/de nas gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dri za'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing 
[\[47a.2\]]dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/_de dag gi bcom 
[\[47a.3\]]ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/_tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[47a.4\]]mngon par bstod pa/_mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te/_/rgya mtsho chu 'dzin bas ma 'tshal dang 'dra/_/de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa/_/mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod/_/ri rab srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'/_/gzi brjid chen po 
[\[47a.5\]]nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'/_/shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs/_/tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yong ma mchis/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su chud/_/skye bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa/_/de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen/_/de 
[\[47a.6\]]bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/_/de dag ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang /_/de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang /_/de dag mos pa ci 'dra ma lus mkhyen/_/de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/_/'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod/_/
[\[47a.7\]]mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen/_/phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste/_/de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/_/'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa/_/de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/de la ye shes rgyun tu rab 'byung bas/_/de 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas/_/bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs/_/chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing /_/byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa/_/de dag ma lus khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/_/'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus gnas 
[\[47b.2\]]shing /_/ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang /_/lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams/_/de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs/_/mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang /_/gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar/_/gang la rten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba/_/de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas 
[\[47b.3\]]rab tu gzigs/_/de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis/_/ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing /_/ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen/_/byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/_/rab tu byung zhing 'jig 
[\[47b.4\]]rten mkhas pa yis/_/bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba/_/de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/_/'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas/_/dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang /_/ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba/_/de dag rnams 
[\[47b.5\]]kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs/_/gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de/_/rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing /_/chos kun stong pa nyid du rab brtags nas/_/mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shing /_/'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te/_/lus 
[\[47b.6\]]'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas/_/phung po brag ca 'dra bar rtogs gyur te/_/byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs/_/mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang /_/mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa/_/de yis bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par 
[\[47b.7\]]shog_/'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/_/mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/'dzum pa de yi rgyu ni bka' stsal gsol/_/ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal/_/
[\[48a.2\]]mgon pos de dag the tshom bsal du gsol/_/'jig rten 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur/_/de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa skyed/_/gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs/_/gang gi sems ni mi sgul gnas par gyur/_/de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/_/
[\[48a.3\]]de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing /_/kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdod/_/ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba/_/de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du gsol/_/de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags/_/gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'dir bstan lags/_/
[\[48a.4\]]gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis gyur/_/de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol/_/rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa/_/the tshom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bsal gsol/_/de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/_/dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 
[\[48a.5\]]'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris/_/de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas/_/rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni dris pas na/_/ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs 
[\[48a.6\]]par mthong /_/de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par byas/_/gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas/_/'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa/_/dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis/_/rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas/_/gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos 
[\[48a.7\]]pa'i sems bskyed de/_/'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas/_/rang byung dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang /_/chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang /_/mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnams spangs shing /_/byang chub mchog tu de 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dag yid kyang btang /_/rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnam bshig cing /_/kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te/_/srid pa kun tu chu la pad mo bzhin/_/byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang /_/de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba/_/stong par bshig ste thams cad 
[\[48b.2\]]legs rtogs pa/_/de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste/_/byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes/_/skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste/_/de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas/_/zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 
[\[48b.3\]]'gyur/_/phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/_/byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid/_/gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste/_/ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min/_/ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te/_/shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par 
[\[48b.4\]]rig gyur nas/_/shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na/_/byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya/_/stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya/_/mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis ston/_/smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste/_/de ltar spyod na gzhan min 
[\[48b.5\]]spyod pa yin/_/de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams/_/dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur/_/rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te/_/zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur/_/gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te/_/'di ltar nga la mchod 
[\[48b.6\]]pa rab byas pas/_/gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams/_/mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/_/de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang /_/blo chen de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod/_/de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal 
[\[48b.7\]]ba gdams ngag ston/_/de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dong 'gyur te/_/'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas/_/'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod/_/de ltar brten pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas/_/byang chub bla med 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]de yang thob 'gyur te/_/de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas grags pa can/_/de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya/_/zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi_/tshe 
[\[49a.2\]]tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur/_/de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'byung ba ni/_/rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs snyed de/_/kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med/_/de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten 
[\[49a.3\]]dag_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol/_/ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te/_/kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur/_/gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/_bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas mi'am 
[\[49a.4\]]ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye ba phrag brgyad kyis lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang /_/gnod sbyin gyis mchod pa'i bar dag kyang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/_khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la srog dang /_
[\[49a.5\]]skye ba po dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_gang zag dang /_bdag dang /_bdag gi yang gang yang med la phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/_las gang 
[\[49a.6\]]yod pas rnam par smin pa gdags par bya ba'i las de yang mi dmigs/_byang chub kyang mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/_sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar 
[\[49a.7\]]rmad do/_/ci zhig las dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/_ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]zhing gi bkod pa dang /_der skye zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du 'dong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /_mchod pa de'i mthu dang /_sems can rnam par dgod pa dang /_bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur 
[\[49b.2\]]ro zhes bya ba dang /_bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dus pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos 
[\[49b.3\]]bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad/_ci zhig las dgongs te sems can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/_de nas mi'am ci'i 
[\[49b.4\]]rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas/_/shes rab che mnga' bdag dogs skyes/_/stong pa nyid dang lung 
[\[49b.5\]]bstan pa/_/bde gshegs bdag gis de ma 'tshal/_/gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings/_/'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang /_/rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu/_/mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog_/skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu/_/sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu/_/
[\[49b.6\]]skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i/_/ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal/_/mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na/_/'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung /_/de ni yang dag lung bstan pas/_/thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum/_/sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye zhes/_/gsungs pa de ni ji 
[\[49b.7\]]lta bu/_/ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang /_/shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal/_/gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la/_/dge bshes bsten gsung ji lta bu/_/ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang /_/skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal/_/g.yo ba'ang ma mchis 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bgyi ba rnams/_/rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu/_/ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang /_/dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal/_/rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang /_/rtogs zhes mgon gsung ji lta bu/_/the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes/_/
[\[50a.2\]]shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal/_/zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal pa/_/chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu/_/mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag_/bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol/_/sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams/_/nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu/_/chos 
[\[50a.3\]]ni rab tu spang bgyis na/_/mi mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu/_/brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang /_/'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang /_/las de bgyid pa ma mchis la/_/rang las can gsung ji lta bu/_/bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang /_/zil gyis mi non 
[\[50a.4\]]bdag ma 'tshal/_/mgon po de la bdag dogs na/_/bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom sol/_/dge ba'i tshogs gyur ma mchis la/_/byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs/_/dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul/_/de skad bka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal/_/chos rnams 
[\[50a.5\]]zad pa med gsungs la/_/spong byed las ni zad bstan pa/_/tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang /_/bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal/_/yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la/_/ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa/_/'di yang rab rib bral ba yi/_/spyan mnga' sdig 
[\[50a.6\]]spangs bstan du gsol/_/thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par/_/gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di/_/sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/_/bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan 
[\[50a.7\]]nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/_/bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa/_/gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na/_/rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung /_/ci phyir zhe na 'di lta 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]bur/_/rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na/_/'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/_/de la 'phel med 'grib pa med/_/me long shin tu yongs dag la/_/ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi/_/gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/_/ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis/_/chos kyi 
[\[50b.2\]]dbyings ni 'gyur med na/_/mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/_/yan lag rnams la brtag byos la/_/ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod/_/chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du/_/'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs/_/byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'khrul/_/blo sbyangs 
[\[50b.3\]]pas ni med par shes/_/skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed/_/de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po ngag_/gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/_/byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba'i rnams/_/'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa/_/
[\[50b.4\]]log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/_/de dag sngon cad ma thos pa'i/_/sems med chos ni ngas bshad na/_/byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams/_/'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/_/byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang /_/
[\[50b.5\]]byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas/_/zil gyis ma non rang byung sems/_/rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur/_/'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba/_/de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa/_/'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis/_/gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis/_/gang dag 
[\[50b.6\]]rtag 'dzin de dag la/_/'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med/_/dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces/_/bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston/_/sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skye ba/_/ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa/_/mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang /_/skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad/_/
[\[50b.7\]]gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la/_/dge bshes bsten ces gang smras pa/_/gnas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/_/gnas pa med pa'i dge bshes bsten/_/g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/_/bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa/_/shing rta'i yan lag 'dus 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa dang /_/shing rta'i bya ba gzhan du rtogs/_/mi gang bdag yod khas len cing /_/bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa/_/de dag la ni bya ba dang /_/g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad/_/rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang /_/rtogs zhes nga yis gang 
[\[51a.2\]]smras pa/_/byis pa log pa'i blo can rnams/_/rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa/_/de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir/_/rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston/_/kun tu rtog pa'i rtog pas bskyed/_/yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings/_/zhi ba yod cing chos kun 
[\[51a.3\]]kyang /_/zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni/_/mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis/_/kun tu rtog las sred pa skye/_/skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la/_/kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye/_/mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu/_/yod pa min la log par brtags/_/chu yin par 
[\[51a.4\]]ni mthong gyur kyang /_/smig rgyu la ni chu med do/_/de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs/_/sdug pa min la sdug par rtog_/byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag_/sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis/_/sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te/_/smig rgyu la ni chu med do/_/de bzhin 
[\[51a.5\]]gzugs la sdug pa med/_/gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na/_/byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can/_/sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur/_/chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang /_/spong ba dmyal ltung zhes smras pa/_/med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa/_/mi mkhas rnams 
[\[51a.6\]]ni skrag par 'gyur/_/rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na/_/bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa/_/de dag stong zhes thos gyur na/_/bdag med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye/_/de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te/_/nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas/_/stong pa gya nom spong byed de/_/mi mkhas 
[\[51a.7\]]sems dmyal chen por ltung /_/mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang /_/skye bo'i 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang /_/las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te/_/byed pa po ni rab tu bkag_/yang dag tu ni 'gro ba dag_/rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis/_/rmi lam gang la'ang dngos 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]po med/_/log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen/_/ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan/_/byed po phyogs bcu rnams na med/_/shing rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las/_/me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no/_/bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/_/rlung dang shing la sems pa med/_/
[\[51b.2\]]'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/_/las kyi byed po de bzhin no/_/bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la/_/byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang /_/legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni/_/de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/_/mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste/_/de srid 'tsho zhes 
[\[51b.3\]]brjod mod kyi/_/lo la phung por spungs pa med/_/sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs/_/zad pa med ces gang smras dang /_/las zad ces ni ngas smras pa/_/stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med/_/tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan/_/yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa/_/
[\[51b.4\]]phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'/_/log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams/_/yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so/_/mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de/_/mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi/_/ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi/_/nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig_/yi ge 
[\[51b.5\]]gcig gis 'jug pa yi/_/byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan/_/chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/_/a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/_/de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la/_/mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te/_/'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni/_/a yi sgo yi gzungs 
[\[51b.6\]]su bstan/_/chos rnams thams cad 'gag med pa/_/a yis chos la 'jug par bstan/_/a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa/_/de yang ljon pas shes par gyis/_/chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa/_/de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs/_/chos kun 'gyur ba med 
[\[51b.7\]]pa yang /_/a ni chos kun sgo mor bstan/_/a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag_/ljon pa 'di ltar shes par gyis/_/mi zad pa dang zad smras pa/_/chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis/_/mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]chos rnams kun la sgo med de/_/de dag med pas sgo mi 'byung /_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas 'jug par bya/_/chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces/_/yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan/_/a yi sgo yi gzungs 
[\[52a.2\]]bstan pa/_/'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis/_/chos kun lus med byang chub ces/_/blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas 'jug par bya/_/chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste/_/med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang 
[\[52a.3\]]med/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas 'jug par bya/_/chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste/_/med pas de dag gdags pa med/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas 'jug par bya/_/chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste/_/
[\[52a.4\]]med pas de dag rang bzhin med/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/_/gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon/_/chos kun yid la bya ba med/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin ste/_/bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su 
[\[52a.5\]]bstan/_/med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas shes par bya/_/chos kun thogs pa med pa ste/_/thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs/_/'di yang gzungs kyi 
[\[52a.6\]]sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas 'jug par bya/_/chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/_/mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya/_/chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa/_/de dag ming med shes par bya/_/chos rnams yang dag ma yin te/_/de dag ma lus rang 
[\[52a.7\]]bzhin med/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/a la brten nas shes par bya/_/gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba/_/de dag mthong med bstan par bya/_/lta ba po ni med pa dang /_/de dag rnams kyang med phyir ro/_/chos kun mnyam med de bas na/_/mtshan nyid gcig cing 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]mtshan gzhi med/_/nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste/_/chos kun yod pa ma yin no/_/de ltar lhag med chad pa med/_/mnyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med/_/gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med/_/blta ba'i lam min med phyir ro/_/drang po ma yin yon po min/_/mun pa ma yin snang ba min/_/
[\[52b.2\]]mthong ba med cing thos med de/_/med pas gzungs su shes par gyis/_/g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste/_/chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba 'ang med/_/'khrug pa med cing khro ba med/_/ci yang mi byed nyer zhi med/_/sgyel ba med cing gnas kyang med/_/'gro med ldog 
[\[52b.3\]]med 'gro sems med/_/nyal ba med cing mi nyal med/_/sad pa med par shes par gyis/_/mig can ma yin long ba min/_/lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min/_/sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min/_/dul ba ma yin ma dul min/_/rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min/_/
[\[52b.4\]]'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min/_/bden min [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]min de lta bur/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis/_/'jig rten gdul ba'i don phyir gyi/_/'di la the tshom gang yang med/_/gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom de/_/dam pa'i don du byung ba med/_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal 
[\[52b.5\]]po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa lung bstan pa dang /_gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/_/khang pa brtsegs pa shing la rten pa dang /_pad ma la rten pa dang /_ri la rten pa rin 
[\[52b.6\]]po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/_rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/_bla re dang lda ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/_mi'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba 
[\[52b.7\]]phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa dang /_chu las skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/_de mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_thang las skyes pa dang /_chu las skyes pa'i me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dag las babs te rkang pas dong nas 
[\[53a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[53a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bde gshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba/_/rgyu ma mchis par 
[\[53a.4\]]'dzum mi mdzad/_/lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu/_/'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/_/thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal/_/zla ba tshes la mi bzhin du/_/smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta/_/bde gshegs mdzes pa deng su zhig_/
[\[53a.5\]]gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes/_/bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/_/mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol/_/bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la/_/dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das/_/ji ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur/_/smra mchog bdag gi the tshom khum/_/
[\[53a.6\]]thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis/_/bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing /_/the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad/_/ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par 'gyur/_/de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog_/'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang /_/the tshom bcad slad ljon pa dang /_/
[\[53a.7\]]mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du/_/sangs rgyas yon tan sten 'gyur ba/_/ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa/_/rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa/_/bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar can/_/de khyod dang ba'i yid byos la/_/skyo med yid kyis nga la nyon/_/'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa/_/de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas/_/the tshom gcad pa nga las 
[\[53b.2\]]nyon/_/ljon pa la sogs mi'am ci/_/bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa/_/de dag nga la mchod byas nas/_/'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong /_/bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu der/_/lha mi'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas/_/sems 
[\[53b.3\]]la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur/_/mi yi seng ge de dag gis/_/sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/_/sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas na/_/bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong /_/bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang /_/de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas/_/rang rang zhing rnams 
[\[53b.4\]]sna tshogs su/_/byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/rtag tu snang ba'i bskal pa la/_/mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon/_/chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas/_/stobs bcu gzi brjid mtha' yas 'gyur/_/de dag zhing du sems can gang /_/yongs su ma smin 'ga' 
[\[53b.5\]]mi skye/_/nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba/_/kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa/_/mi yi seng ge'i zhing [(]dar [,]der [)]ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba/_/de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste/_/mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams/_/bdag cag dpag 
[\[53b.6\]]med sangs rgyas zhing /_/yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/_/de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs/_/sems can rlabs chen de dag ni/_/smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab/_/de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/bsam pas rang zhing rnam par sbyong /_/nyon mongs 'joms pa de 
[\[53b.7\]]dag gi_/zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni/_/dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams/_/ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag_/de dag zhing du rnam kun tu/_/mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni/_/sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad/_/lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams/_/kun kyang yi ni rangs par gyur/_/mi'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lha phreng ldan 
[\[54a.2\]]glang po can brgyad khris lha ma yin rnams nas mi'am ci'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing bcom ldan 'das 
[\[54a.3\]]la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/_de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dA ra bas pus nub tsam du gang bar byas so/_/de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs 
[\[54a.4\]]su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal/_/srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba/_/bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can/_/'jig rten bdag po mi yi stag_/sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi/_/'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par/_/
[\[54a.5\]]zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa/_/thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe/_/mi rnams zla ba phyag 'tshal ba/_/de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta/_/dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa/_/dpag 
[\[54a.6\]]yas ye shes phung po ldan/_/gzi brjid dpag yas phung po can/_/blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stug pa/_/bden bzhi mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel/_/rgyal ba'i [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad chos dang ldan/_/the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog_/sum 
[\[54a.7\]]cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan/_/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs/_/bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/_/ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa/_/ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]can/_/bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags/_/ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa/_/ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul/_/zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing /_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul/_/skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs khyod/_/gti mug zhi 
[\[54b.2\]]bgyid chos brnyes pa/_/bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu yi/_/chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog_/ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi/_/bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin du/_/'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang /_/lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi/_/de 
[\[54b.3\]]ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du/_/snying brtser nye bar bzung nas ni/_/'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba/_/srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral bar bgyi/_/bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/_/'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig_/'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa/_/srid pa'i 
[\[54b.4\]]rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bde gshegs rnam par 'dren 
[\[54b.5\]]pa po/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/_/stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i/_/rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol/_/rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'gro ba dang bgyis byung mthong nas/_/'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te/_/'dzum pa'i don ni 
[\[54b.6\]]nyan par 'tshal/_/don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don/_/bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa'i mchog_/dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod/_/the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol/_/gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis/_/gang gis deng mchog bla med bgyis/_/su 
[\[54b.7\]]zhig de ring gting thob gyur/_/bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum/_/de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas/_/dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis/_/deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang /_/rab tu dga' yid ldan par bgyis/_/rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/_/'gro ba'i the 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]tshom myur du khum/_/de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams/_/kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/_phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/_/lung bstan rta thul khyod 
[\[55a.2\]]dris pas/_/des na 'gro ba mang po yi/_/don chen shin tu deng byas 'gyur/_/stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par/_/sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/_/de ni 'gro ba mang don du/_/de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus/_/phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis/_/nga la sems 
[\[55a.3\]]dang nga mchod pas/_/bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu/_/nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/'thun par mi yi nang skyes te/_/rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la/_/me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/_/kun tu bde bar gshegs 
[\[55a.4\]]kyi sems/_/skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur/_/rang byung mi yi seng ge la/_/tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis/_/rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang /_/me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis/_/mi mchog rnams la 
[\[55a.5\]]bstod byas te/_/de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing /_/mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas/_/rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la/_/rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung /_/grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba/_/brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun/_/bskal pa gcig la bde 
[\[55a.6\]]gshegs 'gyur/_/me tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya/_/de na dmyal dang dud 'gro dang /_/ngan song gshin rje'i 'jig rten med/_/zhing de na ni lha min med/_/mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/_/phreng ldan glang po can lha yi/_/longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/_/
[\[55a.7\]]ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med/_/de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag_/mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos/_/de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi/_/skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag_/gang gA'i bye ma rab 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]mang snyed/_/grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams/_/gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/_/grags pa ma smad de dag gi_/ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur/_/de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang /_/rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/grags pa mtha' 
[\[55b.2\]]yas ldan rnams kyi/_/ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang /_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 'gyur/_/phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi/_/lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa/_/thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang /_/de tshe 
[\[55b.3\]]sems ni rab tu dga'/_/phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa 
[\[55b.4\]]yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de 'di lta ste/_dper na kham pa'i gru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol 
[\[55b.5\]]nas pha rol du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes pa de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol 
[\[55b.6\]]zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/_de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to/_/de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang /_skar mdog dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_
[\[55b.7\]]rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go_/lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri yang mngon par sprul te/_de dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]skor ba byed cing me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab 
[\[56a.2\]]tu gtor te/_de dag gis mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi/_/lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag_/'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na/_/thal mo rab tu sbyar 
[\[56a.3\]]nas mchis/_/rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis/_/'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis/_/mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum/_/mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs/_/sred pa'i phur pa rab tu 
[\[56a.4\]]phyung /_/nga rgyal rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsnyal/_/khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste/_/rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs/_/khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste/_/'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos/_/khyod kyis nyon mongs thams cad spangs/_/'ching ba dag ni thams cad bcad/_/sbyor 
[\[56a.5\]]ba kun dang bral ba ste/_/thub pa chags pa kun las 'das/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/_/bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang /_/rnam pa kun tu mi mnga'o/_/khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung /_/ma rig pas ni thugs kyang phyung /_/rnam pa 
[\[56a.6\]]bzhi po'i phyin ci log_/rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs/_/gang du 'jig rten mi chud de/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rngon pas ji bzhin du/_/'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi/_/yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs/_/sems can 'jig tshogs ltar lhung ste/_/stong pa nyid ni ma 
[\[56a.7\]]'tshal bas/_/ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs/_/'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyid/_/khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du/_/'gro de chang ba stong 'drar gzigs/_/gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i/_/ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan/_/phung po stong par rnam par 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bshig_/ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing /_/khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag_/bdag med stong par rnam par bshig_/chos gang dang ni ming gang gis/_/chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba/_/chos de chos des stong pa ste/_/thub pa khyod kyis stong par 
[\[56b.2\]]bstan/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na/_/de la sems can gdags ma mchis/_/srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar/_/de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang /_/dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang /_/yang dag ma yin sgyu ma [(]zhas [,]zhes [)]/_/
[\[56b.3\]]skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad/_/ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhig gis/_/bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing /_/mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang /_/lci dang yang ba bstan bgyis kyang /_/byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste/_/de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis/_/de bzhin chos dbyings 
[\[56b.4\]]mnyam lags na/_/byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs/_/gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/_/legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba/_/lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du/_/de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan/_/shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni/_/ye shes sgron ma rab bus te/_/chos kyi 
[\[56b.5\]]'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/sems can rnams la chos bstan pa/_/de ltar bdag cag myur du ni/_/bla med byang chub zhi thob ste/_/ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/_/'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu/_/'khyams par gyur pa'i 
[\[56b.6\]]sems can la/_/ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin/_/bdag cag gis kyang chos myur bstan/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/_bcom 
[\[56b.7\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu/_/dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol/_/skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag_/bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]ni/_/yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te/_/kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/_/de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis/_/nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur/_/su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur/_/skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol/_/de ring khyod la su 
[\[57a.2\]]yis mchod/_/ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyur na/_/rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol/_/ji ltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis/_/lung bstan 'di dag thos gyur na/_/'gro ba the tshom 'chad 'gyur ba/_/'dren pas de 
[\[57a.3\]]ltar lung bstan gsol/_/ci nas rnam pa thams cad du/_/kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams/_/myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba/_/de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal 
[\[57a.4\]]pa/_'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes/_/rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing /_/nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis/_/
[\[57a.5\]]dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis/_/dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu/_/de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la/_/shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis byas/_/sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas/_/stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur/_/chos rnams 
[\[57a.6\]]la ni nges pa rnyed/_/nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas/_/sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag_/brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod/_/ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni/_/bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/_/'dren pa de dag ji srid du/_/sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing /_/bsnyen 
[\[57a.7\]]bkur byas par ma gyur pa/_/de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/_/de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na/_/kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur/_/mtshan ni 'od zer 'chang ba ste/_/'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi_/nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni/_/blo 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]yi mchog dang ldan pa dag_/'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi_/mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe/_/lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu tham/_/srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur/_/shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi_/nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba 
[\[57b.2\]]rnams/_/lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa dag_/bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i/_/'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang /_/shin tu rgya cher 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur 
[\[57b.3\]]nas/_/rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/_/mchod rten de dag thams cad la/_/srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig 
[\[57b.4\]]rnams kyis mchod byas nas/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur/_/rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba/_/lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag_/brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 
[\[57b.5\]]rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis/_/bzung zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas/_/'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang /_/shAkya yongs su smin mdzad phyir/_/rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la/_/'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad/_/de thos nas ni skye bo kun/_/kun tu dga' 
[\[57b.6\]]zhing rab dga' ste/_/sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas/_/ston pa la ni mngon par bstod/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//bam po drug pa/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi 
[\[57b.7\]]lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin dag dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_klu'i bu mo dag dang /_klu dag dang /_grul bum dag dang /_dri za dag dang /_gnod sbyin dag dang /_mi'am ci dag dang /_phreng ldan glang po can dag dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yid byung ba chen po skyes te/_'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i 
[\[58a.2\]]phyir brtson par gyur te/_de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/_mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang /_bai dUr+ya'i phreng bas brgyan pa/_gser gyi phreng ba sna tshogs dang /_nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/_
[\[58a.3\]]sa gnas rim pa brgyad dang /_ba gam dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_skar khung gis brgyan pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/_bla re chen po dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/_lha'i bu mo'i 
[\[58a.4\]]tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to/_/rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba 
[\[58a.5\]]phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par sprul to/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dA ra ba dang /_lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas par gang bar byas so/_/glang po che sa srung gi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang 
[\[58a.6\]]mngon par sprul te/_glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu/_glang po che sa srung gi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/_so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/_rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun/_pad ma 
[\[58a.7\]]de dag re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/_'dab ma re re zhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/_lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/_dbus su glang po 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]che sa srung gi bu dag btsud nas phyi bzhin shing rta de ltar bshams pa de dag bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so/_/rin po che'i khang pa de dag las kyang lha'i tsan dan dang /_a ga ru dang /_ud pa la dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /_gser phye'i char mngon 
[\[58b.2\]]par bab par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dza Sha ka dang /_many+dza Sha ka chen po dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_pa ru Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog dkar dang /_mdog dkar chen po dang /_sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon 
[\[58b.3\]]par bab par gyur to/_/gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/_la la ni gar byed/_
[\[58b.4\]]la la ni rol mo byed/_la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang /_glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang /_rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu la zhon te/_bcom 
[\[58b.5\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po yang phul bar gyur to/_/lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu 
[\[58b.6\]]brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/_lha'i bu mo de dag kyang la la ni glu len/_la la ni gar byed/_la la ni rol mo byed/_la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so/_/de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems 
[\[58b.7\]]te/_ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/_sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]snyam du sems par gyur cing de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to/_/de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[59a.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong /_mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong /_bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar 
[\[59a.3\]]mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/_de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis 
[\[59a.4\]]mngon par bstod do/_/'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang /_/sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa/_/de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid/_/'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang /_/de bzhin 
[\[59a.5\]]gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang /_/'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes/_/de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes/_/bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du/_/ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste/_/rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas/_/'di 
[\[59a.6\]]la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/_/rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas/_/byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa/_/de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te/_/bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no/_/slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang /_/bcom ldan 
[\[59a.7\]]nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa/_/de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra/_/bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan gang rnams mi smra lhur len cing /_/bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs/_/de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das/_/bde 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/_/gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir/_/rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang /_/khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra/_/bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren 
[\[59b.2\]]pa mchog_/stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can/_/ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag_/sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs/_/'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa/_/gnas med zhi bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing /_/sdug 
[\[59b.3\]]bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs med pa/_/de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang /_/sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis/_/gang tshe gau ta ma'i bstan pa 'di/_/bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom thams cad 
[\[59b.4\]]spangs/_/sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas/_/bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/_/bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams/_/the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa 
[\[59b.5\]]gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can/_/bde gshegs 
[\[59b.6\]]rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad/_/rnam par 'dren pas 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na/_/rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum/_/rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di/_/byung bar rig nas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/_/'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du 
[\[59b.7\]]gsol/_/'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod/_/lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu yid dga' bas/_/rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod/_/bde gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol/_/zla ltar dri med 'od 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]mnga' mtha' yas gzi/_/ci nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas/_/mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dga' 'gyur bar/_/rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol/_/bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun/_/sprul pa lta bur 
[\[60a.2\]]rnam par rtogs gyur nas/_/stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsol te/_/rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs/_/skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas/_/thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur/_/rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te/_/dgongs pa rig nas rgya 
[\[60a.3\]]chen rtsom par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas/_/rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig_/smras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste/_/'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to/_/
[\[60a.4\]]lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa/_/des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas/_/'dzum mdzad pa yi rgyu de ngas bstan gyis/_/dga' zhing dang ba'i sems kyis nga la nyon/_/lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni/_/ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas/_/chags med ye 
[\[60a.5\]]shes mthong ba dpag med cing /_/rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/_/srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe/_/mi yi gtso bo gang gA'i bye snyed mchod/_/srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las/_/chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo /_/'di dag nga la mchod mchog 'dir 
[\[60a.6\]]byas pas/_/chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong /_/bde gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni/_/chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad yod mi 'gyur/_/lha tshogs 'di yis nga la mchod byas te/_/chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas/_/bskal pa pad ma zhes bya 
[\[60a.7\]]byung ba'i tshe/_/smra ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni/_/bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal po/_/chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing /_/'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]de dag bstan la bag yod pa/_/chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems/_/zhi gnas de la su sten bag yod pa/_/myur du bla med byang chub mchog zhi 'thob/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe 'thab 
[\[60b.2\]]bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la 
[\[60b.3\]]thogs pa mi mnga' bar shes shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/_de dag thob na ma shes pa'am/_ma mthong ba'am/_ma rtogs pa'am/_mngon du ma byas pa'am/_skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_las sam/_las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs 
[\[60b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de/_shes par bya ba yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/_rab tu mkhyen/_legs par 
[\[60b.5\]]mngon du mdzad pas de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/_/don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/_shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_yongs su shes 
[\[60b.6\]]par bya ba ma yin pa/_ma bstan pa/_rab tu ma bstan pa/_ma thos pa/_thos par ma byas pa/_ma shes pa/_rnam par ma shes pa/_ma bstan pa/_ma mthong ba/_ma brtags pa/_'dzin du ma bcug pa/_rtogs par ma byas pa/_thob par ma byas pa/_ma thob pa/_nye bar ma bsnyen pa/_
[\[60b.7\]]ma bor ba/_ma bzhag pa/_ma spangs pa/_bya ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_rab tu zhi ba med pa/_ma smad pa/_ma bstod pa/_thob pa ma yin pa/_ma thob pa ma yin pa/_bde ba ma yin pa/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/_snyan pa ma yin pa/_mi snyan pa ma yin pa/_gzugs ma yin pa/_gzugs 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]med pa ma yin pa/_grangs med pa/_bgrang ba med pa/_'jig rten med pa/_'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/_rnam par byang ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_ldog pa med pa/_ma brtags pa/_rnam par ma brtags pa/_ma g.yos pa/_
[\[61a.2\]]ma bsams pa/_ma bskyod pa/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/_ma spros pa/_spros pa dang bral ba ste/_'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[61a.3\]]lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi 
[\[61a.4\]]dmigs pa/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi 
[\[61a.5\]]mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma 
[\[61a.6\]]mi dmigs pa/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma mi 
[\[61a.7\]]dmigs pa ste/_'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang /_de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang /_skrag par 'gyur te/_des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/_de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/_'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/_
[\[61b.2\]]de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/_
[\[61b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_
[\[61b.4\]]rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/_/khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te/_/dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag_/kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/_/'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa gnyis yin te/_/khyod kyis gzhan las ma 
[\[61b.5\]]gsan rang gis gzigs/_/de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/_/bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so/_/gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams/_/bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba/_/rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/_/'jig rten phan phyir kun 
[\[61b.6\]]rdzob de bstan to/_/sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa/_/sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi rnams/_/mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/_/rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang /_/phyug po'i khyim 
[\[61b.7\]]dang dbul po'i khyim dag dang /_/bran gyi tshogs dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs/_/bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang /_/'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed gang yang rung /_/mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/_/kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas/_/
[\[62a\]]
