[\[62a.1\]]'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to/_/de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na/_/'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste/_/thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang /_/bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo/_/thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed/_/ma thob 
[\[62a.2\]]gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/_/gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya/_/nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/_/kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba/_/de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya/_/mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang /_/bdag med 
[\[62a.3\]]rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang /_/mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing /_/de la dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa/_/de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na/_/'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar 'gyur/_/de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas/_/
[\[62a.4\]]sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong /_/de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang /_/sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis/_/ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na/_/sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab 
[\[62a.5\]]spangs te/_/srid pa kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur/_/chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/_/stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes/_/gang gis thos nas dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba/_/de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs 
[\[62a.6\]]pa'i chos/_/de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/_/de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/_/byang chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams/_/skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol/_/de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du/_/bla 
[\[62a.7\]]na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des/_/khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/_/mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol/_/des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na/_/'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 
[\[62b.2\]]'gyur/_/rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la/_/bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te/_/drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod/_/'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu bar mdzad slad du/_/snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod 
[\[62b.3\]]du gsol/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mthu dag thos gyur na/_/skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos na/_/mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur/_/mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir/_/the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur 
[\[62b.4\]]legs par sol/_/'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdod/_/lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol/_/kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/_/khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la/_/sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/_/'jig rten phan 
[\[62b.5\]]phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_/'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa/_/rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na/_/
[\[62b.6\]]skye bo tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing /_/'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang /_/tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang /_/gti mug blo can dga' ba [(]skyar [,]skyer [)(]ma [,]mi [)]'gyur/_/gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang /_/
[\[62b.7\]]gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang /_/gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag_/de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur/_/gang gis 'gro ba gdon zin mthong gyur te/_/mi yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas/_/ud pal phreng 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bzhin mgo la khyer bar 'gyur/_/nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur ba/_/sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te/_/de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di/_/me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/_/'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la/_/
[\[63a.2\]]bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste/_/nyon mongs dmad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur/_/snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan/_/rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang gA yi/_/bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur byas/_/byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing /_/
[\[63a.3\]]dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas/_/sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje skyed/_/de dag mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la/_/chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur/_/gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren 
[\[63a.4\]]'gyur ba/_/rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur/_/mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyen nas/_/de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad/_/rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag_/rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad/_/de dag rgyal ba'i gsung 
[\[63a.5\]]de thos gyur nas/_/'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs/_/cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong /_/rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med pa smra/_/rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas/_/de dag nga la 
[\[63a.6\]]mchod pa rgya chen byas/_/bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/_/skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag_/nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur/_/blo gros dag 
[\[63a.7\]]ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/_/sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong par 'gyur/_/'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams/_/rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa/_/rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yi/_/lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'/_/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[63b.2\]]gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig ci gzugs sam/_'on te tshor ba'am/_'on te 'du shes sam/_'on te 'du byed dam/_'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[63b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[63b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/_byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[63b.5\]]par shes pa yang ma skyes pa/_byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/_byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/_rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa/_byang chub kyang 
[\[63b.6\]]'gag pa med pa/_gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/_byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/_rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/_byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/_gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/_byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/_rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 
[\[63b.7\]]gnyis su med pa/_byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/_gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/_byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/_byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/_gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/_byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs su med pa/_byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa dang /_g.yo ba med pa dang dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang /_dmigs su med pa'i bar 
[\[64a.2\]]du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /_byang chub ni gang /_lung bstan pa ni gang /_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[64a.3\]]rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /_sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/_
[\[64a.4\]]de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/_ming tsam/_brda tsam/_kun rdzob tsam/_brjod pa tsam/_gdags pa tsam 
[\[64a.5\]]ste/_de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba las sang na/_'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/_de rjes su dran na yang mi rnyed cing de ltar 
[\[64a.6\]]mi rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos 
[\[64a.7\]]thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/_chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhan to/_/chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/_gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/_gang zhig byang chub yin/_
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/_de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/_so so'i skye bo yang dmigs su med/_so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/_nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/_nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/_rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/_
[\[64b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/_sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/_byang chub kyang dmigs su med/_mya ngan 
[\[64b.3\]]las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/_yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i 
[\[64b.4\]]phyir brtson par gyur nas de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs 
[\[64b.5\]]gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa/_/de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/rnam thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 
[\[64b.6\]]'gyur/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te/_/sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa/_/chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags/_/mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes/_/skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi_/byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma 
[\[64b.7\]]mchis/_/phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan/_/de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing /_/byang chub sems la 'ang de dag mi smod de/_/dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par/_/bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pa bgyid/_/bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs/_/de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams/_/yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing /_/mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod/_/gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing /_/
[\[65a.2\]]mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te/_/srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon/_/dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid/_/phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing /_/lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes/_/de 
[\[65a.3\]]ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis/_/skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/_/de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te/_/mi yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba/_/de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab/_/gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing /_/khams dang skye mched de bzhin 
[\[65a.4\]]rgyal ba'i chos/_/byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa/_/bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang /_/gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa/_/'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis/_/'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na/_/de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi 
[\[65a.5\]]dka'/_/phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang /_/byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras mi g.yo bar/_/gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags/_/phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang /_/khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang /_/
[\[65a.6\]]lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par/_/gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras/_/rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste/_/khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang /_/byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang /_/phung po spros 
[\[65a.7\]]'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang /_/skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang /_/lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing /_/de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/_/gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lags te/_/mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags/_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags/_/de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras/_/rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing /_/ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal gyur la/_/de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing /_/'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen 
[\[65b.2\]]bkur lags/_/rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang /_/ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi/_/dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang byung ba/_/rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan pa grub par shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i 
[\[65b.3\]]bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'dren pa rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis/_/stobs bcu brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal 
[\[65b.4\]]gsol/_/des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur/_/shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'tshal 'gyur te/_/nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par/_/kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta/_/'di ltar dper na nad pa nad skyo ba/_/
[\[65b.5\]]sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa/_/de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing /_/rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du lta/_/'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste/_/sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan/_/rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te/_/
[\[65b.6\]]kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod/_/de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing /_/ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dgar 'gyur dang /_/sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar/_/ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol/_/mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab/_/
[\[65b.7\]]the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/_/sangs rgyas slar sdo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na/_/rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la/_/'dzum 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan/_/de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na/_/de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas/_/'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa/_/gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur te/_/nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i/_/dga' ldan 
[\[66a.2\]]lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad/_/'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong /_/rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par gyur/_/gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas/_/bsam 
[\[66a.3\]]pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus/_/de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms/_/sngon chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing /_/skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas/_/stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas/_/de ring 
[\[66a.4\]]'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas/_/'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du/_/byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang /_/gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang /_/byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med/_/'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba/_/de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes/_/lha 
[\[66a.5\]]rnams gang yang de la the tshom med/_/byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod/_/de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du/_/lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te/_/mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na/_/de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byung 'gyur/_/gnas pa med pa 
[\[66a.6\]]la ni nges gyur nas/_/g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med/_/'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa/_/de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yod med do/_/chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/_/byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang /_/thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin 
[\[66a.7\]]med/_/de la'ang lha rnams the tshom rnam par dag_/blo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams/_/kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te/_/de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur/_/'dren pas skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la/_/'gro 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grel par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni/_/rang byung chos la rnam des rgyal po'o/_/de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi/_/bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa/_/de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang /_/yi rangs gyur 
[\[66b.2\]]cing stobs kyang thob par 'gyur/_/dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_
[\[66b.3\]]lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[66b.4\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang /_mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang /_
[\[66b.5\]]mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang /_mi zad pa'i mtha' dang /_mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/_mtha' ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 
[\[66b.6\]]sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/'byung ba mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o/_/mtha' ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes 
[\[66b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/_chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_byang chub gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis 
[\[67a.2\]]pa lags pas de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 
[\[67a.3\]]ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/_mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig 
[\[67a.4\]]mchis na ni mya ngan las 'da' ba yang btsal bar 'gyur na/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de la 
[\[67a.5\]]bdag cag som nyi ma mchis the tshom ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom ma mchis na de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[67a.6\]]tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa/_'phrul dga' ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa 
[\[67a.7\]]mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te/_/rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang /_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas/_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa/_/mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten the tshom 'tshal/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs/_/the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol/_/khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na/_/'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[67b.2\]]byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du/_/de dag lam mchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur/_/the tshom 'tshal ba dag ni nam du yang /_/byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste/_/the tshom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams/_/byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur/_/rkang 
[\[67b.3\]]gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag_/sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan/_/lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na/_/rgyal ba'i go 'phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing /_/the tshom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas/_/
[\[67b.4\]]lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing /_/'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_ngas ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/_/rta thul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa/_/
[\[67b.5\]]lung bstan de ni khyod la ma lus par/_/bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon/_/'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis/_/thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te/_/mu stegs tshogs kyis bsam pa zil mnan nas/_/'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po 
[\[67b.6\]]bsgrags/_/gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung ba ltar/_/de la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur te/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i tshul thob pa/_/bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/_/nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe/_/mi rnams zla ba myur du 'char bar shes/_/de bzhin rgyal 
[\[67b.7\]]ba'i sras po tshul thob dag_/bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes/_/skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni/_/sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med/_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag_/bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes/_/ji 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe/_/nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes/_/de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/_/ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes/_/chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing /_/rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams 
[\[68a.2\]]kyis shes/_/de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa/_/byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur bar shes/_/ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni/_/sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tshom med/_/de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang /_/'jig rten mkhas pa myur 'gyur ye shes 
[\[68a.3\]]'jug_/gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la/_/rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi chos nyid rab tu mthong /_/gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag_/sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad smras byas 
[\[68a.4\]]kyang /_/chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba/_/de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus/_/de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing /_/bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan rjod byed pa/_/de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa/_/mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzod/_/de 
[\[68a.5\]]ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la/_/gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog mngon shes shing /_/de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang smra la/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad/_/rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams/_/bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa/_/de dag 
[\[68a.6\]]tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i/_/'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya/_/gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing /_/mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba/_/de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal/_/tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur/_/
[\[68a.7\]]gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad/_/sha khrag pags la mi lta byas pa bas/_/gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na/_/de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub da ltar min/_/'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang /_/ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang /_/
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa/_/kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob/_/rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa/_/'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing /_/'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas na/_/tshul gyis su ni rang 'byung thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[68b.2\]]'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa/_/de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams/_/de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul lo/_/tshul thob rnams kyis mngon bsten myur du 'thob/_/de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnams ni/_/sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med/_/
[\[68b.3\]]sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnam rtse ba/_/tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod/_/de ltas tshul la dad pa'i yid byas te/_/brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min/_/rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa bsten byas na/_/bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/bde bar 
[\[68b.4\]]gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni/_/'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yi rangs te/_/rjes su yi rang the tshom med gyur nas/_/mthar phyin blo gros la ni zhugs par gyur/_/'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//bam po 
[\[68b.5\]]bdun pa/_de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu 
[\[68b.6\]]dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa yang mi dmigs na de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_
[\[68b.7\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o/_/de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ni gnyis su med do zhes mi spyod ma mos na de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang /_de ni lam log par zhugs 
[\[69a.2\]]par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[69a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa ma lags/_da ltar byung ba ma lags/_'dus byas ma lags/_'dus ma byas ma lags/_
[\[69a.4\]]dngos po ma lags/_dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/_mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/_yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/_spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/_bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi 
[\[69a.5\]]ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/_rnam par byang ba ma lags te/_gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis 
[\[69a.6\]]mi dmigs la gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/_yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma 
[\[69a.7\]]lags/_spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/_bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]ma dang bral ba'o/_/gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de yang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/bcom 
[\[69b.2\]]ldan 'das 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o/_/'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[69b.3\]]'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba'am/_skye ba dang /_'gag pas bzung ba'am/_'das pas bzung ba'am/_ma 'ongs pas bzung ba'am/_da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/_'dus byas kyis bzung ba'am/_'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams 
[\[69b.4\]]cad du mi dmigs te/_de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/_yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/_spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/_bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs 
[\[69b.5\]]pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[69b.6\]]dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'byin legs par gsungs/_/'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na/_/skye bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis/_/'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs/_/phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te/_/
[\[69b.7\]]phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid/_/chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni/_/mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang /_/yongs shes bya dang spang bsgom mngon bya ba/_/gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te/_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung /_/byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/_/byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[70a.2\]]mi mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa/_/de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang /_/mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul log pa ste/_/blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod/_/mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la/_/spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas 
[\[70a.3\]]bstan la mkhas/_/mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan ma med spangs te/_/stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa/_/mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod/_/de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob/_/phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min/_/gnas de nyan thos rnams 
[\[70a.4\]]kyis bgrod bya min/_/rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste/_/rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med/_/dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang /_/de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag_/mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med/_/go 'phang de ni mtshan 
[\[70a.5\]]ma spyod pa dang /_/nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang /_/gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong smra dang /_/chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus/_/sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la/_/slob dang rnam bral slob pa slob pa'i rnams/_/mkhas de rtogs pa med 
[\[70a.6\]]pas byang chub rtogs/_/ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na/_/bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des/_/'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya zhing /_/mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/de 
[\[70a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyen nas/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la/_/thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu de ma gsungs na/_/rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol/_/
[\[70b.2\]]'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsungs/_/'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu/_/'dren pas bka' stsol the tshom bsal du gsol/_/drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas/_/thub chen khyod kyi 'khor rnams 
[\[70b.3\]]the tshom 'tshal/_/gau tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la/_/'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol/_/'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud las rgyab phyogs te/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod/_/'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal/_/
[\[70b.4\]]don yong grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol/_/bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis te/_/phyir zhing dad bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de/_/the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar/_/rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par khum/_/bde gshegs bstan 
[\[70b.5\]]la 'di dag bder gnas shing /_/gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/_/lam de nas ni the tshom ma mchis mchi/_/de bas skye bo'i the tshom gcod du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_skye bo 
[\[70b.6\]]tshogs chen don dbang brten byas nas/_/tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras shing /_/'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa/_/khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin/_/rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas/_/skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur/_/khyod kyis de dris skye bo 
[\[70b.7\]]tshogs chen dag_/byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te/_/rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas/_/don du gnyer ba de dag de bzhin 'dod/_gang gis 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par/_/smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong /_/byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te/_/de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab/_/mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi rnams gang /_/rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 
[\[71a.2\]]'jig 'gyur zhing /_/mtshan ma'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong /_/mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/_/med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas/_/ji ltar brtags pas de ltar 'ching ba yin/_/mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi/_/zhi ba 
[\[71a.3\]]dag ni grags pa dam pa thob/_/'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis/_/sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed/_/'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chung myong /_/de ltar mi mkhas mtshan ma brtag pa byas/_/mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[71a.4\]]byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong /_/de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na/_/byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob/_/'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel/_/mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor ba spong /_/mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de/_/kun tu 
[\[71a.5\]]sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med yin/_/gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa/_/rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas bar chad yin/_/mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na/_/longs spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur/_/chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/_/rnam par rtog 
[\[71a.6\]]pas chos byung kun kyang stong /_/rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/_/de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas/_/mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal/_/dper na tsam pa'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar/_/mkhas rnams 
[\[71a.7\]]thub pas gsungs la legs zhes 'dzin/_/'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis/_/mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing /_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos rnams yongs shes nas/_/'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu 
[\[71b.2\]]dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang ba thob 
[\[71b.3\]]ste/_chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/_ma byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/_/de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang ma yin/_byung ba yang ma yin/_ma byung ba yang ma yin/_
[\[71b.4\]]grub pa yang ma yin/_ma grub pa yang ma yin/_'gags pa yang ma yin/_ma 'gags pa yang ma yin/_gnas pa yang ma yin/_mi gnas pa yang ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/_rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/_rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/_
[\[71b.5\]]khong khro ba yang ma yin/_rmongs pa yang ma yin/_ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/_shes pa po yang ma yin/_shes pa po med pa yang ma yin/_mthong ba po yang ma yin/_mthong ba po med pa yang ma yin/_tshor ba po yang ma yin/_tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/_ston 
[\[71b.6\]]pa po yang ma yin/_ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma yin/_dmigs pa yang ma yin/_mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/_'gro ba yang ma yin/_'ong ba yang ma yin/_song ba 
[\[71b.7\]]yang ma yin/_'ong ba yang ma yin/_stong pa yang ma yin/_mi stong pa yang ma yin/_mtshan ma yod pa yang ma yin/_mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/_smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/_smon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/_/de dag de ltar chos thams cad 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]la yong mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la yang mi gnas/_tha snyad la yang mi gnas/_brjod pa la yang mi gnas/_de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_bya ba med 
[\[72a.2\]]pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_nyan thos kyi 'du shes 
[\[72a.3\]]can yang ma yin/_nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can 
[\[72a.4\]]yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_byang chub 
[\[72a.5\]]sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_
[\[72a.6\]]sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/_'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/_de 
[\[72a.7\]]ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/_/zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba bsten pa rjes su ston/_/zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis/_khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes/_/zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi 
[\[72b.2\]]ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten/_/yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton/_/sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god/_/de bsten sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung /_/
[\[72b.3\]]'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan/_/gal te bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob/_/bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po zhi ba dag_/'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 
[\[72b.4\]]'gyur/_/'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro ba zhi bgyid gang dag gis/_/'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtog gyur pa/_/de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba 
[\[72b.5\]]rtag tu ston par 'gyur/_/'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das/_/thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs 'gyur/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab/_/thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal 
[\[72b.6\]]ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis/_/gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol de la zhi bar rtogs/_/phung po 'jig pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags/_/dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste/_/chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 
[\[72b.7\]]'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs/_/thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gsungs/_/thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu mtshan mi rnyed/_/de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'/_/de dag byang chub skyon bral 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur/_/bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob/_/rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa/_/chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 
[\[73a.2\]]'di tsam zhes ni mkhyen gyur pa/_/des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa/_/zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang /_lha rnams kyis bcom 
[\[73a.3\]]ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni/_/log pa rmongs byed chang ba [(]stong 'ad [,]stong 'dra [)]zhing /_/ston gyi sprin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar 
[\[73a.4\]]mkhyen/_/rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen/_/ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas/_/kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'drangs pa/_/de la bkres med zas med sems can med/_/rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs/_/skom pa'i mi zhig nyal 
[\[73a.5\]]ba'i rmi lam na/_/chu bsil [(]dang [,]dwangs [)]zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang /_/ngoms med tsha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs/_/'di la byed med tshor med sems can med/_/byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med/_/'bras bu myong bar 
[\[73a.6\]]'gyur ba de med ces/_/'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'/_/mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na/_/dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med/_tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med/_/de mkhyen de la the tshom yong mi mnga'/_/pi bang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar 
[\[73a.7\]]snyan te/_/sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min/_/de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na/_/phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'/_/nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/_/gos kyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur/_/de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]chos rnams kyang /_/log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar gyur/_/tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang /_/rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur/_/de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang /_/so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin/_/ji ltar mi yis 
[\[73b.2\]]dung gi sgra thos te/_/sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtag byas kyang /_/rang bzhin gyis stong dngos po de mi dmigs/_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la/_/yan lag srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/_/dngos med 
[\[73b.3\]]yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/_/drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/_/yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong /_/nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyis yan lag stong /_/drang srong chen pos de bzhin 
[\[73b.4\]]chos kun gzigs/_/grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/_/grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/_/grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na/_/
[\[73b.5\]]dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong /_/ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med/_/phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_/mi dbang 
[\[73b.6\]]khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te/_khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra/_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/sgra de 'jig rten 
[\[73b.7\]]dga' byar rtog pa med/_/ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med/_/ji ltar rnga bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min/_/ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs ris kyi lha de dag 
[\[74a.2\]]dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstod pas 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 
[\[74a.3\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas/_/lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/_/skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the tshom 'tshal/_/
[\[74a.4\]]bde gshegs zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de la lta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod/_/rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tshom dgum du gsol/_/rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma 
[\[74a.5\]]mthong na/_/bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tshom rgyu de gsungs/_/rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/'khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems/_/bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog the tshom 
[\[74a.6\]]gcod pa nyan 'tshal na/_/rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de de dag rnams la gsungs/_/thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur/_/'khor 'di snying bo ldan zhing rnyog med sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/_/ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes 
[\[74a.7\]]pa 'dra la lta/_/'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol/_/de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur/_/khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das rig nas/_/skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim/_/de dag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub/_/brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid/_de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol/_/rkang 
[\[74b.2\]]gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni/_/dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su 
[\[74b.3\]]bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul nga yis phan byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa/_/rtse gcig yid kyis snyen cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos/_/de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/_/phan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs 
[\[74b.4\]]rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med/_/bskal pa khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed du dge ba legs par spyad/_/kun tu rnam pa dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste/_/de ltar gyur 
[\[74b.5\]]kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems ma bskyed/_/'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas/_/de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che ldan sangs rgyas 'dren 
[\[74b.6\]]che ba/_/srid pa sel cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur/_/skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[74b.7\]]zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te/_/'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus/_/de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar 'thun par 'gyur/_/g.yo ba 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur/_/de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i/_/sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan 'da'/_/de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug 
[\[75a.2\]]bsngal gcig shes te/_/mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pas sems can yid 'byung ba'o/_/de na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur/_/de dag thams cad blo 'thun 'gyur zhing sla ba'i lam la myur bar 'gyur/_/de na 
[\[75a.3\]]mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mi sdug mi rtag de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang /_/zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi/_/sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[75a.4\]]sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur/_/bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med/_/de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan 
[\[75a.5\]]pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung /_/de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgra grag 'gyur/_/'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur/_/de tshe zhing mchog stong pa thams 
[\[75a.6\]]cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas/_/drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di brtsams te/_/zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur/_/tshangs 
[\[75a.7\]]pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur na/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa/_/de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur/_/de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston/_/
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa bstan par gyis/_/tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa 
[\[75b.2\]]yang mthong /_/lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[75b.3\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs nas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_des chos 
[\[75b.4\]]thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do/_/de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang /_thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang /_sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /_'jam pa'i spobs pa dang /_dge ba'i spobs 
[\[75b.5\]]pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_grol ba'i spobs pa dang /_nye bar gyur ba'i spobs pa dang /_zab pa'i spobs pa dang /_phra ba'i spobs pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad 
[\[75b.6\]]snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de/_de 'di snyam du chos thams cad 
[\[75b.7\]]ni rnam par rtog pa med de rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o/_/gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/_chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing /_de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/_a zhes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/_kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[76a.2\]]pa/_ma bgyis pa/_mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/_yongs su ma grub pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_mi gnas pa/_mi g.yo ba/_'du ba ma mchis pa/_'phro ba ma mchis pa/_rtog pa ma mchis pa/_rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/_ma bsgrubs pa/_yongs su thug 
[\[76a.3\]]pa ma mchis pa/_ma brtags pa/_gzugs ma mchis pa/_bstan du ma mchis pa/_bltar ma mchis pa/_ma mthong ba/_bsam du ma mchis pa/_rnam par mi gnas pa/_ma shes pa/_rnam par ma shes pa/_ma smos ba/_ma bstan pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_
[\[76a.4\]]bsam du ma mchis pa/_song ba ma mchis pa/_'ongs pa ma mchis pa/_nye ba ma lags pa/_ring ba ma lags pa/_ma brtags pa/_gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/_ming ma mchis pa/_tha snyad ma mchis pa/_gnyen po ma mchis pa/_sgrib pa ma mchis pa/_
[\[76a.5\]]'pho ba ma mchis pa/_'khrug pa ma mchis pa/_brtag tu ma mchis pa/_mi zad pa/_gnyis su ma mchis pa/_ma byung ba/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma lags pa/_bden pa ma lags pa/_sho be ma lags pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_sbyangs pa ma lags pa/_sbyang bar 
[\[76a.6\]]'os pa ma lags pa/_gdags su ma mchis pa/_mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/_ma bzung ba/_ma bor ba/_'dzin pa ma mchis pa/_yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/_gtad du ma mchis pa/_yongs su gtad du ma mchis pa/_ma btang ba/_yongs su ma btang ba ste/_a 
[\[76a.7\]]zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/_chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so/_/a ni ma skyes pa ste/_chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so/_/a ni ma skyes pa ste/_chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/_/a ni ma 'gags pa ste/_chos 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/_/a ni ma 'gags pa yang ma lags pa ste/_/chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so/_/a ni gnas pa yang ma lags/_mi gnas pa yang ma lags/_a ni btags pa yang ma lags/_
[\[76b.2\]]ma btags pa yang ma lags/_a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/_ma spangs pa yang ma lags/_a ni shes pa yang ma lags/_ma shes pa yang ma lags/_a ni dmigs pa yang ma lags/_ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/_a ni stong pa yang ma lags/_mi stong 
[\[76b.3\]]pa yang ma lags/_a ni dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/_dmigs su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_a ni mtshan ma yang ma lags/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_a ni smon pa yang ma lags/_smon pa ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 
[\[76b.4\]]'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo/_/chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste a'i tshul lo/_/chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste/_a'i 'gro ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste a la 'jug pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni 
[\[76b.5\]]gdags pa gcig pa ste as gdags pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste a'i tha snyad do/_/chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i tshul gyis rtogs 
[\[76b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/_/chos gang ma grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/_/chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o/_/
[\[76b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni/_'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi ste/_de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dper na rmi lam na 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi 
[\[77a.2\]]byed pa yang 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na brag ca la tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad 
[\[77a.3\]]kyi gdags par blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na smig rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/_
[\[77a.4\]]skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi'i rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa 
[\[77a.5\]]dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yor dang /_smig rgyu dang /_brag ca'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/_brag ca la bya ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad 
[\[77a.6\]]snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de skad ces gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs/_/thub pa 
[\[77a.7\]]'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud/_/bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong /_/sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]can/_/byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor bar bgyid/_/de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang 'cha'/_/de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal/_/'khor bar dga' ba zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal 
[\[77b.2\]]de yis dbang po bdas/_/gang la mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis/_/blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la/_/nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti 
[\[77b.3\]]mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang /_/blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba/_/de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yang khyer/_/de dag rgyal ba'i tshul sgo thar pa bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos nas/_/skyes 
[\[77b.4\]]bu ngan pa blo zhan de dag bstan ngag bden pa nyid kyis 'jigs/_/bde gshegs khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan/_/de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing /_/bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya/_/
[\[77b.5\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol/_/bde bar gshegs pa cang mkhyen des pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des/_/myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges 
[\[77b.6\]]pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas/_/pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad/_/bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog_/'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag_/grol nas 
[\[77b.7\]]'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos/_/de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur/_/'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med/_/de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi 'dag nyon mi mongs/_/
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med/_/gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur/_/grol zhing 'grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'/_/bcom ldan lhar bcas 'jig rten 
[\[78a.2\]]dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste/_/kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog_/'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni/_/las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong gang gyur de yang med/_/bde gshegs 
[\[78a.3\]]de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal/_/des na da ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing des pa ste/_/dge ba'i blo mnga' dag gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso bo bstod pas 
[\[78a.4\]]bsod nams gang byung ba/_/ji snyed dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i/_/bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid thob shog_/bsod nams 'di kun 'gro ba kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog_/de nas 
[\[78a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_tshul gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thugs su chud la 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/
[\[78a.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa/_/bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_/rgyal ba dpal stug 
[\[78a.7\]]rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol/_/'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs/_/gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur zhing /_/rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur/_/des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur/_/drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas/_/
[\[78b.2\]]'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/the tshom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang 'thun byung sras su 'gyur/_/'khor rnams 'di dag 
[\[78b.3\]]brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing bka' lung stsal du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zhabs 'bring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal/_/gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phob 
[\[78b.4\]]gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal/_/ring du song ba'i ma la bu lta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol/_/skyob pa'i 
[\[78b.5\]]gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur/_/thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer/_/su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal/_/rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos 
[\[78b.6\]]shing dgar gyur nas/_/tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu 
[\[78b.7\]]legs/_/bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod kyis dris gyur pa/_/de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis/_/'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/_/'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs/_/byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyod pa/_/byang chub 'gro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur/_/
[\[79a.2\]]tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di thos na/_/sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur/_/de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yid nges gyur/_/bu skyes ma bzhin dga' bas byang chub mchog tu de dag 
[\[79a.3\]]smon lam btab/_/'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan te/_/bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas nas/_/sems can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te/_/de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas 
[\[79a.4\]]pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya 'grangs par/_/yangs shing shin tu dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste/_/kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yong mi 'byung /_/bde 
[\[79a.5\]]bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses sems can thams cad rang 'byung mdzad par 'gyur/_/zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te/_/sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur/_/de na rang byung 
[\[79a.6\]]sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya 'grangs gang gA'i bye snyed 'gyur/_/rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa bas/_/gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang 
[\[79a.7\]]dag dga' byas na/_/bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so/_/de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis/_/rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba rnyed sla min/_/de ni u dum ba ra'i me tog 'dra zhes 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga'as gsungs/_/de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis/_/shin tu blo phra sten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la bsten par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas/_/'khor rnams thams 
[\[79b.2\]]cad yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/_/khrag khrig lha rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed/_/dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung /_/zhi ba thugs zhi skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi 
[\[79b.3\]]bar mdzad/_/bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni bskyug tu gsol/_/khyod kyi ye shes thos nas skye dgu'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren las tshul thos mi bzad srid pa'i rgyud las grol/_/'od gsal ba lung bstan 
[\[79b.4\]]pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//bam po brgyad pa/_de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams nas 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la 
[\[79b.5\]]yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yang brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/_ting nge 
[\[79b.6\]]'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/_sdug bsngal yang ma lags bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i gnod 
[\[79b.7\]]pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /_mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /_lag pa bcad dam/_rkang pa bcad dam/_rka lag bcad dam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_rna ba dang sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sba lcag gis gzhus sam/_spa lcag byed tshal lam/_lcag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_btson rar bcug gam/_lcags sgrog dang /_shing sgrog tu bcug gam/_
[\[80a.2\]]btson cha dam po la rgyas btab bam/_byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam/_dugs kyi snod ltar bdugs sam/_bu ram shing brdungs pa ltar brdungs sam/_'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom 'am/_'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/_mar gyi mar me 
[\[80a.3\]]dang zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_me'i nang du bor ram/_seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/_stag gi khar bstabs sam/_skam ril bya ba ltar gril tam/_byi bo'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/_nyes byung ba 
[\[80a.4\]]bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/_kar Sha pa Na tsam du gtubs sam/_'bras phye btso ba ltar btsos sam/_glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_mig phyung ngam/_gsal shing gi rtse mo la bzhag gam/_gsad pa'i gnas 
[\[80a.5\]]su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mog gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_bde ba yang ma lags/_mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[80a.6\]]chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/_gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/_gang gis bdag la skom blud pa dang /_gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang /_bkur sti byas pa dang /_
[\[80a.7\]]bsti stang byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/_gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang /_mi bde bar byed pa dang /_brdeg pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/_de yid la bya ba de dag dang ldan zhing de de lta bu'i las dang /_de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[80b.2\]]rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la sten cing snyen la sgom zhing mang du byed de/_de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 
[\[80b.3\]]gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba dang /_skye ba la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba ste/_dbang lnga thob par rig par 
[\[80b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/de 'tshal na tshe rjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de 'tshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing 
[\[80b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang /_'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslabs pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 
[\[80b.6\]]yongs su bzung ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /_bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges pa'i rtogs pa thob par 
[\[80b.7\]]'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de nas dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjod nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste/_/
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchis/_/de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas don mkhyen 'khor ba rgal gyur pa/_/thub pa mi yi 'dren pa'i tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod/_/'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i 
[\[81a.2\]]thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen/_/yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar/_/de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[81a.3\]]gzigs/_/'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te/_/mi mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam gzhag la/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs 
[\[81a.4\]]pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'/_/byams pa dge sgom sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la/_/sems can rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen/_/de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral 
[\[81a.5\]]thugs ldan/_/des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang /_/lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs/_/de ltar 
[\[81a.6\]]rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal/_/des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal mi gzigs la/_/dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis 
[\[81a.7\]]mi dgyes rnam par bsal/_/de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/_/des na mi mchog khyod la mchod nas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/_/skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmigs/_/'on kyang 'khor bar 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed/_/sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang 
[\[81b.2\]]gnyis su med par bstan/_/gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs/_/thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod mi yang ma gzigs te/_/sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyis/_/thub 
[\[81b.3\]]pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad na ma brnyes kyang /_/de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma gsungs ma lags bsnyel ba yang mi mnga'/_/bde bar gshegs pa lus la song ba'i bsgom pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/_/sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar 
[\[81b.4\]]gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis/_/'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la/_/tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te/_/de ltar gang zhig dran sgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yong ma gzigs/_/sangs 
[\[81b.5\]]rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis/_/thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma brnyes la/_/gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang /_/thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa 
[\[81b.6\]]bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod pa bgyis/_/'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs/_/bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'di na rang bzhin ma mchis la/_/thar pa 
[\[81b.7\]]'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa bsgom par gyis shes gsungs/_/sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis/_/gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum [(]'am [,]mam [)]bzhi lta ga la mchis/_/gang gis gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/de bas gang gi bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis/_/ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 
[\[82a.2\]]'dzin bgyid na/_/'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam ste 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcing ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brtags pa ma bshig des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/thar mdzad slad du bcom ldan 
[\[82a.3\]]'das kyis lam zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs/_/'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dpa' bo dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/yang dag du na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa sgom pa mi dmigs te/_/chad par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang yong mi dmigs/_/thams 
[\[82a.4\]]cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gang na'ang ma mchis te/_/de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis 'gyur/_/'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchod 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' 
[\[82a.5\]]mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/_/thar par mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs/_/rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgom zhes bstan/_/thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te/_/
[\[82a.6\]]'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po/_/de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub pas gsungs/_/de dag rang bzhin ma mchis nyon mongs ma mchis 
[\[82a.7\]]rgyal ba ma mchis te/_/thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod/_/byang chub yan lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drang lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs/_/'ching ba mchis pa ma lags 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis te/_/sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan/_/brtson 'grus ldan par 'phags lam sdug bsngal mtha' 
[\[82b.2\]]mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs/_/mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te/_/'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod/_/'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs/_/
[\[82b.3\]]gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan/_/'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag min nyon mongs min/_/'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson/_/sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag 
[\[82b.4\]]mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs/_/bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi/_/thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste/_/'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod/_/stobs bcu
