[\[82b.5\]]sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de/_/gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang /_/gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams/_/mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[82b.6\]]sems can rnams la bstan/_/sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lhag ma de dang 'dra/_/gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_/bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/rnam 'dren the tshom som nyi ma 
[\[82b.7\]]mchis de slad khyod la mchod par 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di sten pa/_/mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis/_/'di 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/_/de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 
[\[83a.2\]]'khod pa yang mkhyen/_de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/_/skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil 
[\[83a.3\]]mnan nas/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum mdzad pa 'di 'jig rten bstan/_/rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/_/ma lus 
[\[83a.4\]]'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod/_/dpal stug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas/_/sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te/_/chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i 
[\[83a.5\]]ston par skye bar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed/_/de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/_/su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med 'gyur ba/_/de dag 
[\[83a.6\]]bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes/_/bdud kyi mi phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas/_/sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring 
[\[83a.7\]]nges pa thob par 'gyur/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tshom ma mchis mdzod/_/bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing /_/byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/_/gang la 'dzum 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa deng bstan bde gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags/_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tshom khum/_/'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na/_/bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar 
[\[83b.2\]]bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren/_/de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 
[\[83b.3\]]tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_/nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing /_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa/_/khyod kyis bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur/_/de ni khyod la 
[\[83b.4\]]bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon/_/dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni the tshom med/_/kun kyang yi rangs rab zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mchod 'os mchod byas te/_/
[\[83b.5\]]the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur/_/de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod/_/bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur/_/'di dag bskal pa ud pa la la rgyal ba dgra 
[\[83b.6\]]rgyal mthu chen 'gyur/_/'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed/_/sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba/_/de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon/_/rgyal ba de kun 
[\[83b.7\]]chos kyi tog ces bya ba 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur/_/'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan bzla bar 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te/_/de tshe zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]'gyur/_/thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na/_/thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur/_/sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te/_/
[\[84a.2\]]ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi med 'thob/_/thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun 'chad mi 'gyur te/_/slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'du/_/ji ltar bye ba brgya bgrangs nga la 
[\[84a.3\]]legs par spyad pa byas nas su/_/byams pa blta phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dong 'gyur ba/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel mchod pa bya phyir 'dong /_/
[\[84a.4\]]bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing /_/dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de tshe thos gyur nas/_/'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed/_/bdag nyid chen po shes nas thub pa'i 
[\[84a.5\]]zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs/_/dge rgyas ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung 
[\[84a.6\]]bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang /_chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing /_tshul la 'jug pa 
[\[84a.7\]]thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang /_mi chod pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_grol ba'i spobs pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_nye ba'i spobs pa dang /_phra ba'i spobs pa dang /_zab pa'i spobs pa dang /_sna 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]tshogs kyi spobs pa dang /_'jam pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/_chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' 
[\[84b.2\]]yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/_de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'thob cing mi chod pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma 
[\[84b.3\]]mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de la dmigs pa gang yang gzugs lags par ma 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/_khams la 'jug pa dang /_skye mched la 'jug 
[\[84b.4\]]pa dang /_dbang po la 'jug pa dang /_bden pa la 'jug pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang /_sems can la 'jug pa dang /_sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_dngos po la 'jug pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[84b.5\]]dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang /_dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_bdag la 'jug pa dang /_stong pa la 'jug pa dang /_mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_smon pa la 'jug pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug 
[\[84b.6\]]pa dang /_gnas pa la 'jug pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang /_'dus byas la 'jug pa dang /_'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/_thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[84b.7\]]spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/_phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu 'thob bo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzugs ni gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/_sa 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]ni sar yongs su ma grub/_de bzhin du chu dang /_me dang /_rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/chu dang /_me dang /_rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchis 
[\[85a.2\]]pa ste/_chos gang la yang rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/_ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[85a.3\]]gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[85a.4\]]da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes bka' stsal te/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis na 'das par lta ga la 'gyur/_ma 'ongs par yang ga la 'gyur/_da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur[(]/[,)]
[\[85a.5\]]te/_de bas na gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/_de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so/_/phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma 
[\[85a.6\]]mchis te/_de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs de yang ming tsam dang /_tha snyad tsam dang /_brda tsam dang /_kun rdzob tsam dang /_brjod pa tsam dang /_gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug pa mi dmigs te/_'di la phung po yang mi 
[\[85a.7\]]dmigs/_gzungs kyang mi dmigs/_'jug pa yang mi dmigs/_gzungs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/_chos gang ma bgyis pa de la spungs pa yang ga la mchis te/_phung po ni spungs pa'i 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o/_/dper na khyim dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_bsil khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_skar khung khol ma dang /_ba gam dang /_dra ba dang /_stegs bu dang /_kha khyer dang /_skar khung dang /_rta babs dang /_ra ba dang /_shing thags dang /_'obs dang /_chos mang po bsags pa la/_
[\[85b.2\]]grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba yang de bzhin te/_gzugs de yang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/_spungs pa ma mchis pas na gzugs kyang ma mchis/_gzugs kyi phung po yang ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[85b.3\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/_spungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang ma mchis so/_/de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/_
[\[85b.4\]]gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na/_sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do/_/de la mig gang zhe na/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[85b.5\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang ba'o/_/de la sa'i khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang /_me'i khams dang ba dang /_rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_
[\[85b.6\]]chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skye mched de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi skye 
[\[85b.7\]]mched ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/_gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o/_/de ltar mig kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/_skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ma 'gags pa'o/_/gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang /_tha snyad tsam dang /_brda tsam dang /_kun rdzob tsam dang /_brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par gdags su ma mchis pa ste/_ming de yang ming gis ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos gang la mig ce 
[\[86a.2\]]'am/_skye mched ce 'am/_sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/_ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/_de'i 
[\[86a.3\]]slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/_gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo/_/de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig ni mig gis ma mchis pa/_khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_khams ni khams 
[\[86a.4\]]kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so/_/gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/_/gang ma skyes 
[\[86a.5\]]ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang /_tha snyad tsam dang /_brda tsam dang /_kun rdzob tsam dang /_brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/ming de yang ming gis ma mchis/_brjod pa'i bar 
[\[86a.6\]]de yang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/_yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so/_/gang ma skyes ma 
[\[86a.7\]]'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_tha snyad ma mchis pa/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]brda ma mchis pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa/_'dris pa ma mchis pa/_brjod du ma mchis pa/_'ong ba ma mchis pa/_'gro ba ma mchis pa/_ma bstan pa/_rab tu ma bstan pa/_mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_dkar po ma lags pa/_nag po ma lags pa/_
[\[86b.2\]]gnas ma lags pa/_rten ma lags pa/_thob pa ma lags pa/_thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_rtogs pa ma lags pa/_rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_mngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/_so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/_nyan thos kyi sa ma lags pa/_rang 
[\[86b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/_sa yang ma lags/_sa ma lags pa yang ma lags so/_/de ni de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang /_zhi ba dang /_mtshan nyid ma mchis 
[\[86b.4\]]pa ste/_tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o/_/des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste don dam par ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi 
[\[86b.5\]]khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[86b.6\]]bden pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/_chos kyi dbyings te ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis 
[\[86b.7\]]kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/_de ltar 
[\[87a.2\]]na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/_gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu gnyis te/_'di lta ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_
[\[87a.3\]]lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po dang /_yid kyi dbang po dang /_mo'i dbang po dang /_pho'i dbang po dang /_srog gi dbang po dang /_bde ba'i dbang po dang /_sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang /_yid bde ba'i dbang po dang /_yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po 
[\[87a.4\]]dang /_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/_de la 
[\[87a.5\]]mig ni mig gis ma mchis/_dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/gang yongs su ma 
[\[87a.6\]]grub pa de ni mi skye ba/_gang ma skye ba ni mi 'gag pa/_gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/_dbang po ma 
[\[87a.7\]]lags so/_/gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_'di lta ste/_dper na chang pa stong pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_yang dag pa ma lags pa/_ma mchis pa ste/_'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/_don dam par ni stong pa yang mi dmigs/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]chang ba yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang chang pa stong pa ltar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing ma mchis la/_yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/_gso ba/_gsog_/log pa/_slu ba'i chos can/_byis pa 'drid pa/_glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/_'di ltar ming du gdags par 
[\[87b.2\]]bas kyi/_don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs dbang po yang mi dmigs na de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzung pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyi/_don dam par ni ma lags so/_/
[\[87b.3\]]dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/_chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_ma mchis pa/_gso ba_/gsog_/log pa/_slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa/_glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa/_rang bzhin dang bral ba 
[\[87b.4\]]ste/_de ni mi skye mi 'gag go_/gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_
[\[87b.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/_gdags su ma mchis pa/_gdags pa ma lags pa/_ma shes pa/_shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma thos pa/_thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_rnam par ma rig pa/_
[\[87b.6\]]rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma rtogs pa/_rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma thob pa/_thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma mthong ba/_mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma rnyed pa/_rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ma mchis shing 
[\[87b.7\]]mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig rmi lam na rgod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtses pa dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/_'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rmi lam 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]na yang mi des rgod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtses pa dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa de dag ma thob ma rnyed na/_nyal ba las sad pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_thob pa dang /_rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi 
[\[88a.2\]]lam lta bu ste/_ji ltar rmi lam na rgod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtses pa dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/_de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da 
[\[88a.3\]]ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/_dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o/_/de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/_chos thams 
[\[88a.4\]]cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/_bzhi po 'di dag ni bden pa ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams 
[\[88a.5\]]cad ni stong pa ste/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/_de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/_som nyi ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig 
[\[88a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad du kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma lags pa'i 
[\[88a.7\]]slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spang pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/_lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/_gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/_'gog pa dmigs su ma mchis na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/_'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas de ltar na 
[\[88b.2\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/_gang brtags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o/_/gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so/_/gang 
[\[88b.3\]]dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_ma btags pa gdags par mi bgyi ba/_ma bstan pa/_rab tu ma bstan pa/_bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma brjod pa/_brjod par bgyi ba ma lags 
[\[88b.4\]]pa/_mngon par ma brjod pa/_mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma mthong ba/_mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma shes pa/_shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_khong du ma chud pa/_khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma rtogs pa/_rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma rnyed pa/_rnyed par bgyi 
[\[88b.5\]]ba ma lags pa/_ma thob pa/_thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma thos pa/_thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma mthong ba/_mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/_ma bsgrubs pa/_bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_mngon du ma bgyis pa/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/_dkar po ma lags pa/_nag po ma 
[\[88b.6\]]lags pa/_snang ba ma lags pa/_mun pa ma lags pa/_'gro ba ma lags pa/_'ong ba ma lags pa/_gsal ba ma lags pa/_zab pa ma lags pa/_'khrugs pa ma lags pa/_dang ba ma lags pa/_'jig pa ma lags pa/_bde ba ma lags pa/_'ching ba ma lags pa/_grol ba ma lags pa/_
[\[88b.7\]]rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/_khong khro ba ma lags pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/_rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/_ye shes ma lags pa/_rnam par shes pa ma lags pa/_lam ma lags pa/_lam gol ba ma lags pa/_'jig pa ma lags pa/_rnam par 'jig pa ma lags pa/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]gzung ba ma lags pa/_mi gzung ba ma lags pa/_dor ba ma lags pa/_rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/_dmigs pa ma lags pa/_dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_sems can ma lags pa/_sems can ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_srog ma lags pa/_srog ma mchis pa ma lags 
[\[89a.2\]]pa/_gang zag ma lags pa/_gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_bdag ma lags pa/_bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_dngos po ma lags pa/_dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_stong pa ma lags pa/_mi stong pa ma lags pa/_mtshan ma ma lags pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_smon pa 
[\[89a.3\]]ma lags pa/_smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_gnas pa ma lags pa/_gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_'dus byas ma lags pa/_'dus ma byas ma lags pa/_chad pa ma lags pa/_rtag pa ma lags pa/_log pa ma lags pa/_yang dag pa ma lags pa/_bden pa ma lags pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma 
[\[89a.4\]]lags pa/_mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/_mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_rten ma lags pa/_rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_gzhi ma lags pa/_gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa/_mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_spang ba ma 
[\[89a.5\]]lags pa/_bsgom pa ma lags pa/_mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/_rnyed pa ma lags pa/_rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/_'khor ba ma lags pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/_sangs rgyas ma lags pa/_'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/_so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/_'phags pa'i 
[\[89a.6\]]spyod yul ma lags pa/_nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/_spyod yul yang ma lags pa/_spyod yul ma lags pa yang ma lags pa/_bgyis pa ma lags pa/_ma bgyis pa 
[\[89a.7\]]ma lags pa/_dag pa ma lags pa/_dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/_de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/_gzungs thob pas spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig 
[\[89b.2\]]pas ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o/_/
[\[89b.3\]]gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/gang dus gsum mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_gdags su ma mchis 
[\[89b.4\]]pa ste/_gzhan du na ming tsam dang /_brda tsam dang /_tha snyad tsam dang /_brjod pa tsam dang /_gdags pa tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gtogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so/_/chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma 
[\[89b.5\]]mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa/_tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa/_brjod du ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/_gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_log pa/_brtags pa/_rnam par bsgrubs pa/_yongs su brtags pa/_rnam par brtags 
[\[89b.6\]]pa/_rnam par dpyad pa/_ma zhi ba dang /_rab tu spros pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba yang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de 'du byed skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_de bas na ma rig pa ni ma rig pa ma mchis pa'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang 
[\[89b.7\]]ma skyes pa'o/_/gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/_na bar mi 'gyur/_'chi bar mi 'gyur/_shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/_skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/_gang la rga ba ma mchis pa de ni na bar mi 'gyur/_'chi bar 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]mi 'gyur/_shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/_skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste ming tsam du bas kyi/_don dam par ni ma lags so/_/ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid 
[\[90a.2\]]byang chub bo/_/de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/_de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/_chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o/_/de bas na 
[\[90a.3\]]chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_dmigs su ma mchis pa/_
[\[90a.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa/_rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa/_khong khro ba ma mchis pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o/_/de'i slad du chos thams 
[\[90a.5\]]cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/_de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la 
[\[90a.6\]]la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[90a.7\]]pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/_byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas gnyis su ma mchis pas ni gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[90b.2\]]pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/_de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so/_/
[\[90b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am/_
[\[90b.4\]]gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchi na de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 
[\[90b.5\]]ci'ang 'dor ba'am/_len pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/_de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon 
[\[90b.6\]]par zhen pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[90b.7\]]byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur ba ma mchis kyang [(]gda'i [,]gda'o [)]/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba mi gda'o//_//
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bam po dgu pa/_de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro ba brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo 
[\[91a.2\]]sbyar te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub 
[\[91a.3\]]pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa/_/'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan/_/mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod 
[\[91a.4\]]pa bstan/_/khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/_/mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/phung po rnams ni 
[\[91a.5\]]ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral/_/byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su brtags/_/shes pa mi ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyong la spre'u thogs pa bzhin/_/grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 
[\[91a.6\]]'dod/_/khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/dper na brag ca rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra/_/des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings/_/grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams 
[\[91a.7\]]ni khams gsum chags ma mchis/_/skye mched ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan/_/yang dag ma lags [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing byis pa slu ba chang pa stong pa 'dra/_/mi mkhas skye bo lam la gcig tu ma nges mang po de la chags/_/dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho chen 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung /_/'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste/_/thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong /_/mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags/_/bya dang mtsho yi nya dang srog 
[\[91b.2\]]chags dag ni rgya la thogs pa bzhin/_/sems can sems can nyid stong sems can bral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/thub pa sems can ri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na/_/mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags/_/mkhas 
[\[91b.3\]]pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol/_/rten cing chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis/_/rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa/_/mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye 
[\[91b.4\]]bo mang po bcings/_/mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar ba'i bya bzhin grol/_/thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/_/thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun mtshan nyid bral/_/thub pa khams gsum mi 
[\[91b.5\]]chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te/_/de slad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med/_/thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi 
[\[91b.6\]]khyab/_/thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun brtags ma lags/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par bgyi/_/mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes shes smra ba dang /_/gang dag rgyal bas 
[\[91b.7\]]'khor lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang /_/gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan bzlas smra ba/_/de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por yongs su dkris/_/gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]dang /_/gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba/_/de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi lag tu mchis/_/chos kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi/_/gang dag tshul dang 
[\[92a.2\]]tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal/_/de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo dpal stug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags/_/de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi 
[\[92a.3\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_/de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa/_/ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas/_/kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag mthong nas/_/'dren sras de dag tshul 
[\[92a.4\]]'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chos rnams nges par rtogs par thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 
[\[92a.5\]]de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_dpal stug 'dren pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te/_/rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum 
[\[92a.6\]]de skad thos/_/'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/_/rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs/_/de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mdzad bsil mthong nas/_/'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde 
[\[92a.7\]]gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs/_/de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur/_/'dren pa dam pa lha tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa/_/de dag su zhig gang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]gis ci 'thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'phrul ba gsungs/_/mi mchog tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrog ste the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol/_/de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob/_/bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad 
[\[92b.2\]]gzhan du mi sems par/_/'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis/_/thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/_/des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rkang gnyis 
[\[92b.3\]]gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste/_/bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid cing gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur/_/de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol/_/des ni yi rangs gyur te 
[\[92b.4\]]'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur/_/'dren pa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing /_/rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste/_/tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par 
[\[92b.5\]]'gyur/_/'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa/_/rta 
[\[92b.6\]]thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/_/gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang rgyu/_/de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing /_/
[\[92b.7\]]rgyu las gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad/_/kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang /_/kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang /_/kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'dren pa mthu bo cher ni 'gyur bya ste/_/skye bo sdug bsngal lhung ba dgrol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/_/'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya/_'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par 
[\[93a.2\]]rig par bya/_/'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya/_/rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/_/kha cig thar pa'i don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas/_/des na 'jig 
[\[93a.3\]]rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/_/rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur/_/rang rgyal don du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur/_/'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu nub 
[\[93a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsum shes par gyis/_/rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub/_/sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis/_/'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang 
[\[93a.5\]]yin de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyis/_/kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga las legs par mnyan par gyis/_/dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub/_/'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur/_/blo mchog ldan phyir 
[\[93a.6\]]'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas/_/rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzad/_/gzhan yang 'dzum rgyu rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis/_/gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni/_/
[\[93a.7\]]de dag nga la skyen par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/_/'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur/_/dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur/_/gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na/_/de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya/_/gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha' yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gebs pa dang /_/gang 
[\[93b.2\]]tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang /_/gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa/_/de ni 'jig rten 'das pa tshe yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum 
[\[93b.3\]]de tsam bstan/_/rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnams gsum po de dag shes par gyis/_/des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad/_/de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tshom med par gyis/_/'bras bu che ris lha 
[\[93b.4\]]tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/_/zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur/_/de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi cha 'di bstan/_/de 
[\[93b.5\]]dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong /_/bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyod/_/da dung tshul mkhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum cu rtsa drug tu/_/gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod 
[\[93b.6\]]pa byed cing gnas/_/thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtogs rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yongs su btsal byas nas/_/de dag de'i 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog_/'dren pa mthu chen yon 
[\[93b.7\]]tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung /_/rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang rang zhing sbyangs te/_/sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya/_/de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa grangs med de/_/
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_/gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang /_/legs mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur/_/'dus pa de dag thams cad 
[\[94a.2\]]grangs med 'dus pa de ni ci 'dra ba/_/de las nyis gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/_/de tshe rgyal bar zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/_/de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/_/bde gshegs 
[\[94a.3\]]de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi 'ang de nyid 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos/_/de tshe sras kyis gzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub 
[\[94a.4\]]sems bskyed pa/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni/_/nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad 
[\[94a.5\]]pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi/_/bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing /_/yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin/_/mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas/_/rkang gnyis dam pa 
[\[94a.6\]]gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te/_/thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'/_/bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas/_/de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo 
[\[94a.7\]]la 'bar bzhin spyad spyod de/_/rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byos la/_/yang dag mthong ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'di la kun tu bsten byos te/_/dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis/_/'bras bu 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]che ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i tshe sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur par rig nas tshim 
[\[94b.2\]]zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do/_/de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol pa/_khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang /_/
[\[94b.3\]]btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang /_/rgyal srid btang bar ci smos te/_/sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/_khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa/_/rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/shin tu bslabs pas 
[\[94b.4\]]mthar phyin pa/_/khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/_/khyod kyis bzod pa bsten mdzad pas/_/yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad/_/zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te/_/bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/
[\[94b.5\]]lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/_brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te/_/stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa/_/brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/_/khyod 
[\[94b.6\]]kyis bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa/_/de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_/bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/_/dpa' bos shes rab pha rol phyin/_/yang dang yang ni 
[\[94b.7\]]bsgoms pas na/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa/_/shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/_sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang /_/don spyad 'thun pa'i don dag gis/_/'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_byams chen thugs rje chen po dag_/yun ring dus nas bsgoms mdzad de/_/sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral/_/gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu 
[\[95a.2\]]dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/_nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing /_/thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas/_/ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa/_/kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med kyis gsol pa/_sems dag mnyen pa'i sems 
[\[95a.3\]]mnga' ba/_/sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba/_/sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa/_/sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/_shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can/_/blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs/_/thugs gsal 
[\[95a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i blo/_/mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad/_/sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa/_/kun dga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/
[\[95a.5\]]lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/_dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba/_/khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom/_/khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang /_/rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur/_/lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/_khyod kyis chos rnams myur bar 
[\[95a.6\]]mkhyen/_/sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs/_/zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/_/myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol pa/_bral gyur yongs su bral gyur pa/_/chu bo rgal te zag pa spangs/_/pha rol phyin cing thang 
[\[95a.7\]]la bzhugs/_/brtson 'grus brtan la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/_'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs/_/gti mug spangs pa zag med pa/_/sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/_/'jig rten mchod 'os phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa/_khyod kyi dam chos shin tu brtan/_/'jig rten gsum du rab tu mchod/_/gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes/_/de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/_lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri/_/rlung gis 
[\[95b.2\]]bskyod par mi nus te/_/de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/_/bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so/_/lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas gsol pa/_dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam/_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/_/shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa/_/rgyal ba mdzes 
[\[95b.3\]]la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_sku chen khyod la sku mi mnga'/_/de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs/_/yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston/_/khyod mtshungs gang zag yong ma mchis/_/lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/_gnyis su 
[\[95b.4\]]med pas yang dag ston/_/dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon/_/gang dag zab la zhum ma mchis/_/de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin/_/lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/_mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag_/khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams/_/sbrul 
[\[95b.5\]]rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin/_/srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor/_/lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/_ji ltar mar me mar zad cing /_/snying po zad pas zhir 'gyur bzhin/_/khyod kyis bstan pa myur thos nas/_/shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'/_/lha'i 
[\[95b.6\]]bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/_gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i/_/mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang /_/shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag_/'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa/_zhi ba'i 
[\[95b.7\]]sems mnga' zhi la spyod/_/cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi/_/nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa/_/dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi zhi gnas bslabs pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag_/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/_chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan/_/shes rab chen pos de 'tshal na/_/de dag de bzhin 
[\[96a.2\]]gshegs par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/_khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs/_/mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams/_/ye shes mchog gis mnyam gzhag cing /_/byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis 
[\[96a.3\]]gsol pa/_shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/thub chen khyod las gang slob pa/_/de dag 'jig rten snang mdzad cing /_/sgrib pa med par gzigs par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/_'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsungs/_/ye shes rgya mtsho de thos 
[\[96a.4\]]nas/_/de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung /_/lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog_/thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs/_/de 'dra'i ye shes ston bgyid pa/_/de dag gang zag mchog tu 
[\[96a.5\]]'gyur/_/lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/_gnas ma mchis shing blang ma mchis/_/chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba/_/de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen/_/lha'i bu gnas med blo gros kyis gsol pa/_
[\[96a.6\]]chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste/_/sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu mi rten blo gros kyis gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis/_/sems can 
[\[96a.7\]]ma mchis phan tshun min/_/lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/_/yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu bar snang rgyu bas gsol pa/_bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams/_/bar snang lta bur snang ba ste/_/skye dang 'gog pa med par gzigs/_/de slad 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'jig rten chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu ngar 'dzin pa med pas gsol pa/_khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni/_/g.yo ba med cing ngar 'dzin med/_/spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs/_/lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol 
[\[96b.2\]]pa/_sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur na/_/de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'/_/thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis/_/lha'i bu rab tu sad pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa/_gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la/_/gda' yang 
[\[96b.3\]]de ltar ma mchis pa/_/de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs/_/de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu yid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/_/de bzhin khyod kyis 
[\[96b.4\]]bstan pa mdzad/_/de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen/_/lha'i bu spobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/_chos nyid la ni khor zug tu/_/spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/chos nyid de ni brnyes pas na/_/de slad khyod ni spobs pa ldan/_/lha'i bu chags med blo 
[\[96b.5\]]gros kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi chos 'di thams cad ni/_/rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par/_/yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen/_/de bas thub pas rab rib bsal/_/lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsol pa/_mya ngan med cing nyer len med/_/spros pa med cing 
[\[96b.6\]]rnyog pa med/_/chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs/_/de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_chos rnams yang dag ma lags de/_/'gro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa/_/de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen/_/de bzhin 
[\[96b.7\]]rab tu bstan par mdzad/_/lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/_lhun gyis grub cing blang med pa/_/rmongs pa med cing shes pa med/_/chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa/_/khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/_/lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/_snang ba 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ma mchis mun ma mchis/_/gzugs med ma lags gzugs can min/_/gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis/_/khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/_/lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/_yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa/_/yod dang med pa ma 
[\[97a.2\]]lags par/_/rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du/_/de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/_byis pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa/_/ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/_/bar na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa/_/de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis 
[\[97a.3\]]gzigs/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/_gang zag sems can ma mchis pa/_/ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa/_/bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi ba/_/de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/_gang 
[\[97a.4\]]gis tha snyad gdags pa yi/_/mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te/_/chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/_ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing /_/smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang /_/
[\[97a.5\]]su la smon lam mchis gyur pa/_/de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen/_/lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/_rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing /_/gang zhig grol 'gyur de ma mchis/_/de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa/_/de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/_/
[\[97a.6\]]lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/_khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing /_/bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te/_/bde gshegs khyod la smad mi mnga'/_/su smod de dag mkhas ma lags/_/lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/_ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs/_/
[\[97a.7\]]char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid/_/de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/_/'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad/_/lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/_thub khyod gsung ni don mchis te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/shin tu brtags te mdzad 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]pas na/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan/_/lha'i bu blo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis/_/ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te/_/de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/_/gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad/_/
[\[97b.2\]]lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa/_khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te/_/seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas/_/mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa/_/seng ges [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo bzhin/_/lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa/_bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de/_/khyod kyis 
[\[97b.3\]]spyod pa spyad bgyis pas/_/sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod/_/bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung /_/lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/_bag yod pa la rab gnas te/_/khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel/_/stobs bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos/_/bsam 
[\[97b.4\]]gyis mi khyab rab tu spel/_/lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/_bag yod pa la brtson pas na/_/byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes/_/thub chen rang yang grol gyur nas/_/de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel/_/lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/_
[\[97b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag_/ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams/_/kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste/_/bag yod pas ni nges par 'byung /_/lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/_bag yod yongs su ma btang bas/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/_/'gro ba 
[\[97b.6\]]'di la ma chags par/_/thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung /_/lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol pa/_byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing /_/khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na/_/thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis/_/byang chub dam pa brnyes par gyur/_/lha'i bu 
[\[97b.7\]]bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/_bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing /_/mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pa/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras/_/yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/_bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rnams/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/_/dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas/_/nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil/_/lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas ye shes tshol mdzad tshe/_/khyod ni bag gis bzung bas na/_/bskal pa bye ba 
[\[98a.2\]]grangs med du/_/khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/_chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi/_/de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/_/byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang 
[\[98a.3\]]dag par gnas pas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/_/'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'/_/sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad/_/rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs/_/
[\[98a.4\]]sus kyang mi bskyod ri bo bzhin/_/khyed la gnod bgyir mi nus te/_/sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/_/khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/_/zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul/_/bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs te/_/'dod chags 
[\[98a.5\]]kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/_zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la/_/dpa' bo chen po bsgom mdzad pas/_/ci la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/_/sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol 
[\[98a.6\]]pa/_ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi/_/sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs/_/gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i/_/chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang /_/lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/_'jig rten sgron ma'i zhi gnas ni/_/sems kyi 
[\[98a.7\]]rnyog pa 'dang bar bgyid/_/zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyis 'ching /_/de khyod mtha' yas dbang du mdzad/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/_/zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs/_/de la chags med spyod 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pa ni/_/rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/lha'i bu zhi gnas brlan gyis gsol pa/_bsam gtan gyis ni sngon brlan te/_/shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas/_/de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes/_/de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren/_/lha'i bu zhi 
[\[98b.2\]]gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang /_/lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste/_/zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/_/rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung /_/lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol ba/_dpa' bo chen po lhag 
[\[98b.3\]]mthong ni/_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste/_/de la khyod kyis sras spyod cing /_/rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/_shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing /_/rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sman pa'i rgyal po 
[\[98b.4\]]ston pa ste/_/de bas lhag mthong dge ba lags/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad btsal bgyis te/_/yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na/_/brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob/_/byang chub nyid la gnas par 'dod/_/
[\[98b.5\]]lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/_gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis/_/byang chub mchog tu nges par byung /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis/_/brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/_yang dag ji 
[\[98b.6\]]bzhin yang dag tu/_/chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na/_/byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te/_/de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/_mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing /_/dka' ba mang po spyod 
[\[98b.7\]]bgyid pa/_/de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis/_/pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/_chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du/_/rgyal sras gang dag zhugs pa'i rnams/_/chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal cing /_/rang byung nyid 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]ni thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong la bsten pas gsol pa/_rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du/_/ye shes la ni bsten mdzad pas/_/thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni/_/srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/_/lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis 
[\[99a.2\]]gsol pa/_sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen/_/'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi/_/'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa/_lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing /_/chos 
[\[99a.3\]]kun rnam par gzigs pas na/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te/_/sa bzang n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'dra/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol pa/_rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/_/ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste/_/byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing /_/
[\[99a.4\]]skye bo mang po 'grel par bgyid/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol/_/chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/_/zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'/_/thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong 
[\[99a.5\]]la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/_dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni/_/lhag mthong nyid tu yang dag 'du/_/rang bzhin med par rnam mthong na/_/de ni rang byung byang chub lags/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa/_sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste/_/chos 
[\[99a.6\]]rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing /_/thugs rje chen po shin tu skyed/_/lha'i bu lhag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/_byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i/_/'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung /_/de dag byang chub mchog kyang 
[\[99a.7\]]'thob/_/grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'grel/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la bsten gyis gsol pa/_stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i/_/mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/_/sems can bcings las 'grol bgyid cing /_/bcings pa thams cad rnam par gcod/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/_stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa/_/'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs/_/dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa/_/de ltar srog chags rnams la ston/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod 
[\[99b.2\]]yul ni/_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/_/srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas/_/dpa' bos de la spyad par mdzad/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi bsam pas gsol pa/_skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la/_/'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs/_/chos rnams 
[\[99b.3\]]kun la mi gnas shing /_/nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/_stong nyid chos la sten bgyid cing /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa/_/de dag ston pa mchod pa ste/_/mchod pa de ni bla na med/_/lha'i 
[\[99b.4\]]bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/_gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur pa/_/de ni yang dag 'phags zhes gsungs/_/stong nyid chos la sten bgyid pa/_/ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis 'dren gyis gsol pa/_dpa' 
[\[99b.5\]]bo chen po chos rnams gang /_/mya ngan 'das min ston ma mchis/_/kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren/_/drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/_stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni/_/khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shar/_/
[\[99b.6\]]stong pa nyid la gang sten pa/_/de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la sten gyis gsol pa/_gang rnams stong pa nyid sten pa/_/mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur/_/nyon mongs med cing lta med rnams/_/byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i 
[\[99b.7\]]bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_gang rnams stong nyid sten bgyid pa/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs/_/rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur/_/'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te/_/stong pa nyid la gang sten pa/_/de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag_/stong gis dkrug par mi nus so/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa/_mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te/_/
[\[100a.2\]]dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung /_/mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med la gnas pas gsol pa/_mtshan ma med la spyod gyur cing /_/zhi ba zhi la spyod pa rnams/_/mtshan ma 
[\[100a.3\]]rnam par bshig rnams kyis/_/tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi nus/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul la/_/'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de/_/mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing /_/zhi spyod khyod 
[\[100a.4\]]la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas skom gyis gsol pa/_thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni/_/mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te/_/yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod 
[\[100a.5\]]pas gsol pa/_mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du/_/gang zag mchog ni spyod mdzad pas/_/lha dang dri za mi dag kyang /_/khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig cing /_/
[\[100a.6\]]dpa' chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/_/mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad/_/de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/_thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod/_/mtshan ma med la rnam par rol/_/mi rnams yongs su smin 
[\[100a.7\]]mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la zhugs/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa/_gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/_/de dag byang chub grub pa ste/_/yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/_/gang gis mtshan ma rnam bshig pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'/_/bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste/_/sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol pa/_zhi 
[\[100b.2\]]la spyod cing rnam grol ba/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med/_/'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten/_/dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/_mtshan ma med la mos gyur cing /_/zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur 
[\[100b.3\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas rgal ba 'gro sgrol ba/_/de dag tshad ni ga la mchis/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/_mgon po gang dag smon lam ni/_/rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa/_/de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung /_/
[\[100b.4\]]lha'i bu smon pa med pa la sten pas gsol pa/_zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod/_/srid pa rnams su smon mi mdzad/_/sred pa yongs su chad pas na/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten yong mi gos/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol pa/_gang gis srid pa yongs 
[\[100b.5\]]bcom pa/_/de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste/_/de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras/_/rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa/_/sred pa yongs su bcad pas na/_/srid pa 'jig 
[\[100b.6\]]bgyid srid pa la/_/de dag smon pa mi bgyid do/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/_gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa/_/gzi ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/_/re ba btang zhing bcings grol ba/_/de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_/lha'i bu smon 
[\[100b.7\]]pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/_gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa/_/de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgal/_/de dag mi skom zang zing med/_/dpa' chen khyod la deng phyag 'tshal/_/lha'i bu smon pa med la nges pas gsol pa/_gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang /_/bde 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ba dngos po med bsgoms pa/_/mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab/_/de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/_srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba/_/de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul/_/kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel 
[\[101a.2\]]ba/_/sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/_srid pa'i dgon las byung ba rnams/_/bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu smon pa med 
[\[101a.3\]]pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/_g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste/_/khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'/_/bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing /_/srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad/_/lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/_thar pa'i chos la stobs 
[\[101a.4\]]ldan pas/_/bdud kyi zhags pa yongs bcad cing /_/khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la/_/bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do/_/lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/_lus med 'chi ba med tshul du/_/lus 'di gang gis mthong gyur pa/_/de dag sangs 
[\[101a.5\]]rgyas spyod yul dga'/_/'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs/_/lha'i bu lus nges par sems pas gsol pa/_mi gtsang rul ba rnag zag pa/_/lus 'di mi bzad nges bsams te/_/yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas/_/rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/
[\[101a.6\]]lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/_lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te/_/lus la dran pa rnam dpyad cing /_/lus kyi sdug bsngal rnams grol nas/_/des pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/_/sbrul gyi pags pa rnying 
[\[101a.7\]]bzhin du/_/rnag can lus 'di spangs nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku bo che/_/sku mi mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/_mi gtsang dri nga rnag zag cing /_/rul ba'i lus la rtag smad de/_/mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas/_/
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa/_gang dag rul ba'i lus skyo zhing /_/rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams/_/chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras/_/de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur/_/lha'i bu lus kyis 
[\[101b.2\]]skrag pas gsol pa/_'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar/_/gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa/_/de dag lus las 'das pa ste/_/rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/_lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/_/ye shes 
[\[101b.3\]]gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag_/srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs/_/lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang bral bas gsol pa/_lus kyi 'du shes 'dod chags bral/_/chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas/_/kun 
[\[101b.4\]]sbyor kun las 'das pa ste/_/rnam 'grel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa/_/khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen/_/khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing /_/mkhas pa byang 
[\[101b.5\]]chub mngon 'tshang rgya/_/lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/_srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong /_/mya ngan 'das pa 'jigs med mthong /_/khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa bgyid/_/lha'i bu srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/_
[\[101b.6\]]gang gis srid pa rnam spangs shing /_/'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba/_/bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/_/mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa/_/mi yi dam pa khyod kyi sras/_/srid par khrid pa rab bsal te/_/khyod kyi 
[\[101b.7\]]bslab la bslabs pa dag_/stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes/_/lha'i bu srid pa las rgal bas gsol pa/_/srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yi/_/'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la/_/grangs kyis rgyun tu bgrang ba yi/_/grangs ni 'jig rten 'di na med/_/lha'i bu srid 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/_srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste/_/gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa/_/de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod/_/srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/_/lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol pa/_srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu 
[\[102a.2\]]grol/_/rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal/_/srid pa mthar 'byin sangs rgyas te/_/srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol pa/_srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing /_/srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs/_/brten pa srid pa mthar 'byin 
[\[102a.3\]]pa/_/khyod la do zla ma mchis so/_/lha'i bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/_srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi ba/_/mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'/_/srid pa phyir 'byin thams cad mkhyen/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/_/lha'i bu srid pa'i tha ma'i 
[\[102a.4\]]lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs nas/_/srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa/_/gang gis srid pa len 'gyur ba'i/_/khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ba mthong /_/lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te/_/srid pa'i 
[\[102a.5\]]rgyu yang de bzhin no/_/zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'/_/mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol du 'gro bas gsol pa/_srid pa'i pha rol rgal ba ste/_/srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal/_/rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas/_/skye bo gzhan ni 
[\[102a.6\]]sgrol ba mdzad//_//bam po bcu pa/_lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/_tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/_/sems ma mchis shing rtsol ma mchis/_/bsam gtan mdzad pa che khyod kyis/_/tshor ba chu bur lta bur mkhyen/_/lha'i bu 
[\[102a.7\]]tshor ba ston pas gsol pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par/_/tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/rmi lam sdug gu'i dga' 'dra ba/_/de la so so'i skye bo chags/_/lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/_shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na/_/tshor ba 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]'gro bar ma song zhing /_/'ong ba med la dngos med par/_/de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/_tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po/_/rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs/_/zab mo blta dka'i tshig de yang /_/khyod kyis sems can 
[\[102b.2\]]rnams la bstan/_/lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa/_tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam/_/don dam nyid du mi dmigs te/_/khyod kyis sems can der btul bas/_/'gro ba the tshom ma mchis gyur/_/lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/_tshor ba'i phung 
[\[102b.3\]]po mkhas pa po/_/mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa/_/de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs/_/lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/_tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/_/rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i/_/
[\[102b.4\]]mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis/_/tshor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs/_/lha'i bu tshor ba las rgal bas gsol pa/_rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod/_/rgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las rgal/_/'dam la rgal cing sdig med pa/_/byang chub mchog 'di sangs 
[\[102b.5\]]rgyas gyur/_/lha'i bu tshor ba las byung gis gsol pa/_rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du/_/tshor ba rnams ni 'byung mkhyen nas/_/tshor ba'i phung po rab rgal te/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu tshor ba rig pas gsol pa/_mi rnams 
[\[102b.6\]]dag la gang 'ching ba'i/_/tshor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/_/nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba/_/de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa/_khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pham/_/bdud rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste/_/
[\[102b.7\]]sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par/_/thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/_ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis/_/sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin/_/sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/_/de phyir khyod la 'jig rten 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mchod/_/lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin/_/gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i/_/sems de khyod kyis yang dag brtags/_/de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/_/lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul 
[\[103a.2\]]la spyod pas gsol pa/_sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/_/rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na/_/ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du/_/byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs/_/lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/_/dul gyur las su rung ba yi/_/sems 
[\[103a.3\]]kyi rang bzhin rtog med pa/_/gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/_/mtshan nyid brtan pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/_gang gis sems la sems med shes/_/mkhas pa sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing /_/bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa/_/de dag 'dir 
[\[103a.4\]]ni dpa' zhes bgyi/_/lha'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa/_gang dag sems la sems med shes/_/de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te/_/dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la/_/skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags/_/lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/_
[\[103a.5\]]gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa/_/sems can de dag zhi rab zhi/_/bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas/_/de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi/_/lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa/_mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing /_/bsnyen par dka' dang dpa' ba dang /_/khyod kyi bstan 
[\[103a.6\]]la gang mos pa/_/de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur/_/lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/_sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing /_/yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa/_/de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos nas/_/zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur/_/lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas 
[\[103a.7\]]pas gsol pa/_gang gi yid ni chos nyid la/_/rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa/_/de dag mi dbang sras po ste/_/zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags/_/lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su/_/'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams/_/chos 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]nyid la ni gang sems pa/_/de dag spyod yul ma yin med/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la nges par byung gis gsol pa/_mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste/_/'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag_/mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags/_/lha'i 
[\[103b.2\]]bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_/chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni/_/chos kyi dbyings zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i/_/ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/_/chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[103b.3\]]gang zhugs pa/_/de dag ye shes bsam yas te/_/sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med/_/sems can bsam la de dag mkhas/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/_gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig_/chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams/_/de dag spobs 
[\[103b.4\]]pa'i stobs bskyed pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab thob par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/_gang dag de dag gnas pa yi/_/'jigs pa med pa thob med pas/_/de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs/_/de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung /_/lha'i 
[\[103b.5\]]bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/_khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste/_/chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/_/lag mthil skyu ra ra bzhag bzhin/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par ston/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/_chos rnams rang bzhin 
[\[103b.6\]]med gzigs pas/_/khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhugs/_/mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te/_/bzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i/_/chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de/_/bar
