[\[103b.7\]]snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la rton pas gsol pa/_gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas/_/skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa/_/de yi sgo nas chos dbyings ston/_/de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis/_/lha'i bu chos 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]kyi dbyings la brtson pas gsol pa/_mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/_/lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/_dpa' bo khyod 
[\[104a.2\]]kyis skye bo 'di/_/chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzad/_/chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas/_/'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs/_/lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol pa/_gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'gro ba kun/_/'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/_/chos dbyings rnam 
[\[104a.3\]]par mkhyen pa yi/_/'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol pa/_mi mchog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te/_/rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po/_/gang la spyod pa de lags so/_/lha'i bu 
[\[104a.4\]]gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/_chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te/_/thams cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i lam/_/de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang /_/mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags/_/lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/_khyod ni chos dbyings 
[\[104a.5\]]mngon par mkhyen/_/mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gis gsol pa/_rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras/_/gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes/_/gsal 
[\[104a.6\]]bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams/_/rang byung nyid du nges par byung /_/lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/_chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i/_/skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs/_/rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas/_/de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/_/lha'i bu gnas 
[\[104a.7\]]med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba/_/de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos/_/bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang /_/de dag rmongs par yod mi nus/_/lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa/_gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa/_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs/_/bye bas byang chub mi skyod ces/_/mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'/_/lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni/_/chos nyid la ni rab gnas te/_/sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni/_/
[\[104b.2\]]ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin/_/lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po/_/chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i/_/bdud kyi las ni gnas med de/_/gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma 
[\[104b.3\]]yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/_gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa/_/byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/_/rang gis de ni thugs chud nas/_/sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang /_/las 'dra 
[\[104b.4\]]'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i/_/rgyu de khyod kyis thugs su chud/_/las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa/_chags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni/_/las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen/_/gang gis rgyu yis bgyis de yang /_/gang zag mchog gis 
[\[104b.5\]]thugs su chud/_/lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na/_/mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba/_/de yi rgyu dang len pa dang /_/gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol pa/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[104b.6\]]'jig rten 'di dag gi_/sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las/_/gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams/_/kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i/_/las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te/_/gnas dang 
[\[104b.7\]]skye ba'ang ma mchis so/_/de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog_/lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/_las dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas/_/dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang /_/ji ltar de yi len pa yang /_/khyod kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod/_/lha'i bu stobs 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/_rgyu dang las dang len pa dang /_/rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas/_/rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen/_/de phyir rgyal ba mnyam pa med/_/lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa/_rgyu dang las dang len pa dang /_/gnas dang rkyen 
[\[105a.2\]]dang rgyu rnams dang /_/rnam smin so so yang dag rig_/thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs la dga' bas gsol pa/_rgyu dang las dang len pa dang /_/gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/_/khyod nyid rang gis mngon mkhyen te/_/rang bzhin med par bstan par 
[\[105a.3\]]mdzad/_/lha'i bu stobs kyis rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/_rgyu dang las dang len pa dang /_/gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams/_/'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste/_/rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/_rgyu dang rkyen dang las 
[\[105a.4\]]rnams dang /_/rnam par smin pa sten pa rnams/_/de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes/_/seng ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/_'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis/_/khams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa/_/de dag rkang gnyis gtso 
[\[105a.5\]]bos mkhyen/_/de bas khyod ni do zla med/_/lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing /_/gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang /_/de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba/_/de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'phags kyis 
[\[105a.6\]]gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing /_/ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/_/sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/_/phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra/_/lha'i bu stobs la spyod pas gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing /_/bshes gnyen ci 'dra rnyed 
[\[105a.7\]]gyur nas/_/'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur pa/_/de dag bla na med pas mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/_stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs mkhyen cing /_/'dren pa de ni khams dang ni/_/'du 'dzi bshes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams/_/de dag mi mchog khyod kyis 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]mkhyen/_/lha'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/_khams de dang ni len pa dang /_/bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa/_/de la khyod kyi mkhyen pa des/_/de phyir the tshom yong mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa/_sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i/_/
[\[105b.2\]]'khor ba de dang khams de dang /_/spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams/_/mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol pa/_ye shes gang gis khams de ni/_/'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi/_/mkhyen de mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes/_/bla mchog 
[\[105b.3\]]mnga' bas yang dag bstan/_/lha'i bu khams nas nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis na/_/'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas/_/de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen/_/khyod la do zla ma mchis so/_/lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/_
[\[105b.4\]]khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/_/yon tan ji snyed bskyed pa dang /_/rnam par smin dang 'bras bu dag_/de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyid cing /_/'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa/_/
[\[105b.5\]]de yang khyod kyis thogs med mkhyen/_/de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod/_/lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis pas/_/'gro ba ci 'dra mchi ba yi/_/sems can rnams kyi lam dag kyang /_/ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/
[\[105b.6\]]lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/_sems can log pa nyid nges shing /_/mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa/_/phung po gsum po de dag la/_/khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug_/lha'i bu lam gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/_sems can yang dag nyid nges te/_/
[\[105b.7\]]ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa/_/de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod/_/rtogs pa thogs pa med par 'jug_/lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/_ma nges phung por gyur pa la/_/gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams/_/de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te/_/de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang /_/mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/_/kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/_/lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa/_sangs 
[\[106a.2\]]rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med/_/ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med/_/don dam nyid du bstan to zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos la stobs gnas pas/_/des na de la 'jigs 
[\[106a.3\]]med de/_/rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras/_/ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'phrul/_/lha'i bu chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/_kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang /_/de dag rab tu bstan mchis kyang /_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang /_/brda yang dmigs su 
[\[106a.4\]]ma mchis so/_/lha'i bu ye shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/_brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan/_/mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis/_/khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs/_/lha'i bu lam la brtson pas gsol pa/_
[\[106a.5\]]nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams/_/gzhan gyi rgyud mchi'i gnas ma mchis/_/log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror/_/drang srong chen po khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/_khams gang la ni bsten bgyis te/_/gang rnams ci 'drar mos 
[\[106a.6\]]'gyur zhing /_/'dod chags khams la sdug bsngal ba/_/de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu mi sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/_ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/_/'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung /_/de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/_/
[\[106a.7\]]de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/_/lha'i bu byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/_ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/_/zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung /_/de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/_/de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/_/lha'i bu rkyen 'dis nges par byung 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]gis gsol pa/_ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na/_/gti mug khams ni rab tu byung /_/de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/_/de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs/_/lha'i bu gtong bas nges par byung gis gsol pa/_'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag_/ser sna 
[\[106b.2\]]mngon par 'phel 'gyur te/_/de la mos pa nges 'byung ba/_/de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/_sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na/_/'thun pa'i khams ni rab tu 'byung /_/de la 
[\[106b.3\]]mos pa 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de dag 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen/_/lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/_/'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/_/ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang /_/mos pa de mthar phyin pa dag_/khyod kyis ma lus rab tu 
[\[106b.4\]]mkhyen/_/lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa/_'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis/_/gang gi rgyus byung nan tan dang /_/mos pa de las gyur pa yang /_/smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol pa/_sems 
[\[106b.5\]]can gang gis khams gang la/_/bsten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi/_/rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/des na khyod ni dga' bar mdzad/_/lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/_sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang /_/gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang /_/dmigs pa dang ni 
[\[106b.6\]]zhing rnams dang /_/dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol pa/_'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang /_/sred pa mngon par 'jug pa dang /_/srid pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i don/_/de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen/_/lha'i 
[\[106b.7\]]lha'i bu dbang po'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_dbang po nyam chung rnam dag ni/_/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal/_/srid pa rnam par gzhig pa yang /_/rkang gnyis dam pas bsten pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/_dbang po 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]rtul po dur khrod bsten/_/rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas/_/sred dang bcas pa khyod la lta/_/lha'i bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/_'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang /_/zhi dang shes dang mi shes 
[\[107a.2\]]dang /_/srid pa zhi dang dbang po rnams/_/rnam par gzigs na sngon ma dmigs/_/lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas gsol pa/_zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/_/gnod sems med dang dben pa dag_/dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe/_/khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa 
[\[107a.3\]]gzigs/_/lha'i bu dbang po la brtson pas gsol pa/_zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsung /_/sems can shes pa rjes su skye/_/zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid/_/de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas gsol pa/_gnod sems 
[\[107a.4\]]med dang byams pa dang /_/zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid ma gzigs/_/dag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te/_/des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags/_/lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/_log par rnam par rtog pa dang /_/log par nye bar ston pa yang /_/nyon mongs dam 
[\[107a.5\]]phyir kun sbyor te/_/bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs/_/lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste/_/bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur/_/de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu 
[\[107a.6\]]ye shes 'dod chags chad pas gsol pa/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams/_/rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te/_/de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs/_/lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_sems can gang gi shes pa gang /_/
[\[107a.7\]]ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang /_/snod du gang rung ji snyed pa/_/de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa/_/nyon mongs spang phyir shes gang gis/_/shes pa de la rtog bgyid pa/_/de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/de 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]bas khyod la mngon par dga'/_/lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa/_yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang /_/spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang /_/nyon mongs snyon mongs rnam dag pa/_/thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs/_/lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis 
[\[107b.2\]]gsol pa/_dbang po rno rtul 'bring dag dang /_/gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang /_/bcings dang thar dang zad dang shes/_/g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_dbang po rab 'bring rtul bo dang /_/nyon mongs ye shes 
[\[107b.3\]]tshor ba dang /_/gdul dang gdul bar bgyid pa dag_/khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs/_/lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/_sems can rnams kyi bsam gtan dang /_/rnam thar kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldang ba 
[\[107b.4\]]dang /_/rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi shugs kyis gsol pa/_zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsten te/_/chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/_/rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen/_/des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi go cas 
[\[107b.5\]]gsol pa/_chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin gang /_/chos gang gis ni brjod bgyis pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud/_/des na dus gsum chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/_log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs/_/rnam pa bzhi 
[\[107b.6\]]ni skye bar 'gyur/_/las las skyes par de dag mkhyen/_/des na khyod la do zla med/_/lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/_nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi/_/gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang /_/bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/des na khyod 
[\[107b.7\]]la do zla med/_/lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/_bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang /_/snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag_/ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/_
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang /_/snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin/_/bag yod pa las byung ba ste/_/de la khyod kyis ye shes 'jug_/lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol pa/_dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/bsam gtan la 
[\[108a.2\]]sogs de dag dang /_/ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug_/de ni rlung ltar chags pa med/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/_bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe/_/srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres/_/des na 
[\[108a.3\]]khyod la do zla med/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/_bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing /_/'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na/_/des na khyod ni dpa' bo lags/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtogs pas 
[\[108a.4\]]gsol pa/_sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag_/blo mchog gsungs tshe gsol pas na/_/spobs pa sna tshogs rab mnga' bar/_/rnam par 'dren pa des nges byung /_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/_sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe/_/tshul 
[\[108a.5\]]rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa/_/'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs/_/des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol pa/_sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la/_/dpa' bos sngan chad spyod mdzad pas/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[108a.6\]]du nges par yang /_/sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa/_/de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/_/
[\[108a.7\]]lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa/_bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pas/_/chos kun sems can med pa zhes/_/chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen/_/'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsung /_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la sems pas gsol pa/_
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par/_/rnam par 'dren pa spyod mdzad pas/_/des na 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la dpyad pas gsol pa/_gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas/_/las dang rgyu rnams dpyad 
[\[108b.2\]]pas na/_/khams dang dbang po mos pa dang /_/bsam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/_khyod kyi sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas/_/stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po/_/dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel/_/
[\[108b.3\]]des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/_dpa' bo sems can thams cad kyi/_/sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang /_/dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams/_/mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod 
[\[108b.4\]]pa la so sor rtog pas gsol pa/_thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi/_/sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing /_/khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na/_/de phyir sems can gso ba mdzad/_/lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su/_/
[\[108b.5\]]sngon gyi mtha' la brtag bgyis kyang /_/khyod kyi dgongs pa chags mi mnga'/_/des na mgon la bdag mos lags/_/lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/_bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam bgyis kyang /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo'i 
[\[108b.6\]]yon tan gyi/_/pha rol phyin nus 'ga' ma mchis/_/lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi_/skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa/_/shi 'pho skye bar 'gyur ba dag_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs/_/
[\[108b.7\]]lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/_rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig_/bgyis shing rgyud drug mchir 'gyur ba/_/de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen/_/des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyi/_/lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]pas gsol pa/_khams gang gis ni sems can gang /_/bsgos par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i/_/bag chags las dang sems can dag_/khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen/_/lha'i bu 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/_bshes gnyen 
[\[109a.2\]]ci 'dra bsten bgyi shing /_/las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas/_/'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba/_/thub pa khyod kyis de yang mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dgos pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_las de yi ni bgyi ba gang /_/dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/gang 
[\[109a.3\]]gi slad du las bgyis pa/_/de yang ma lus rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/_dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang /_/las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te/_/de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul lags/_/
[\[109a.4\]]lha'i bu dngos po rig pas gsol pa/_sems can rnams kyis bsam mkhas pa/_/dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang /_/de ni ji ltar grub pa yi/_/las de khyod kyis mngon par mkhyen/_/lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_shes pa gang gis dngos po de/_/
[\[109a.5\]]brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen/_/de la ji ltar chags gyur pa'ang /_/thub pa khyod kyis shin tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu mngon par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_chags pa gang gis las de rnams/_/nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i/_/nyon mongs de dag 
[\[109a.6\]]yang dag mkhyen/_/de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon/_/lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/_'gro ba gang du las gang gis/_/mchis shing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas/_/'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba/_/de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dmigs pa la 
[\[109a.7\]]mkhas pas gsol pa/_'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi/_/gang gis las rnams smin 'gyur ba'i/_/dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te/_/de la khyod kyi blo gros 'jug_/lha'i bu bag chags la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis/_/sngan 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang /_/de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi/_/bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi/_/rnying dang gsar dang slad ma dang /_/las rnams gsum po khyod kyis 
[\[109b.2\]]mkhyen/_/de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul/_/lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_chung zhing rnam smin che ba dang /_/che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang /_/chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung /_/de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs/_/lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_tshe 
[\[109b.3\]]'di'i las rnams gang lags dang /_/skye ba'i las rnams gang lags dang /_/lan grangs gzhan gyi gang lags pa/_/de dag spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_tshe 'di la ni bgyis pa yi/_/las kyi rnam smin mi 
[\[109b.4\]]gang dag_/myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la/_/so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen/_/lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_gang gis las gang bsags gyur te/_/skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa/_/gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed/_/shes 
[\[109b.5\]]rab chen pos de nyid mkhyen/_/lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_las gang bskal pa bye ba yi/_/phyi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing /_/dus gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba/_/de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen/_/lha'i bu yongs 
[\[109b.6\]]su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa/_/yongs su smin par ma gyur na/_/de srid 'bras bu mi 'byin pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen/_/lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba 
[\[109b.7\]]la rtog pas gsol pa/_las gang dang ni ldan pas na/_/sems can 'di ni skyer 'gyur ba/_/pham pa med pas de mkhyen te/_/yongs su brtags nas rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/_las ni ji ltar 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]yongs smin na/_/'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen/_/de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug_/de dag stong par rnam par mkhyen/_/lha'i bu yongs su smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pas las kyi rnams/_lci dang 
[\[110a.2\]]yang ba rab tu mkhyen/_/sems can bsam pa thugs su chud/_/de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla/_/lha'i bu lci yang la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_las gang gis ni sems can rnams/_/ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_/lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs/_/de shes 
[\[110a.3\]]mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_sems can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing /_/las kyi lci dang yang ba dag_/dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs/_/lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa 
[\[110a.4\]]la dpyod pas gsol ba/_sems can spyod pa dpyad mdzad cing /_/las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan/_/phor bu'i chu dang gang gA'i chu/_/lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin/_/lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa/_slob dang mi slob rnam par smin/_/rkang 
[\[110a.5\]]gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing /_/kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas/_/las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan/_/lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas spyan gyis khams gsum na/_/las kyi 'bras bu rten pa yi/_/byis pa 
[\[110a.6\]]dag dang mkhas pa gzigs/_/phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i bu las zad par byed pas gsol pa/_'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod/_/sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho dang /_/skye ba kun la ye shes 'jug_/mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyag kyang 
[\[110a.7\]]'tshal/_/lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/_'chi 'pho ba dang skye dang las/_/'gro dang de bzhin sems can dang /_/rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa/_/'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]pa/_ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhig_/shin tu bsil ba'i chu 'thungs bzhin/_/rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad/_/lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa dang bral bas gsol pa/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/yongs 
[\[110b.2\]]su rtog las skyes pa ste/_/rmi lam dga' bar rtse ba bzhin/_/smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/_/yongs su rtog pa rab zhi bas/_/nyon mongs zad par rab bstan te/_/rmi lam na ni sprin med ltar/_/mi 
[\[110b.3\]]mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/_/rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/_/de bzhin zag pa rnam 'byung bar/_/zag pa 'byung la mkhas pa po/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis gsol pa/_
[\[110b.4\]]rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/_/de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste/_/nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol pa/_ji ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na/_/bu zhig byung la shi 'phos na/_/dga' dang 
[\[110b.5\]]sdug bsngal tshor 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa/_rmi lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin/_/khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs/_/de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan/_/thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/
[\[110b.6\]]lha'i bu blo gros nges par brtags kyis gsol pa/_chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni/_/ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang /_/bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs/_/'gro ba ji bzhin tshim par mdzad/_/lha'i bu ye shes yid kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 
[\[110b.7\]]ston pa/_/thos na yid ni dgar 'gyur te/_/rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin/_/de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/_me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin/_/'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na/_/bsam 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'/_/lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa/_thub pa pi bang sgra 'dra ba'i/_/khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na/_/lha bu rnams kyang the tshom bor/_/rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu 
[\[111a.2\]]sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag_/byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na/_/mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur/_/sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu sprul pa la sems pas gsol pa/_ji ltar rmi lam sgyu mthong ba/_/de ltar khyod kyis 
[\[111a.3\]]'gro ba gzigs/_/mgon po'i bstan pa de thos na/_/bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so/_/lha'i bu sgyu ma las nges par byung gis gsol pa/_sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu sprul kyang /_/sgyu ma lags par 'tshal bas na/_/de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis/_/de bzhin khyod kyis 
[\[111a.4\]]'gro ba gzigs/_/lha'i bu rtog pa'i rjes su rtog pas gsol pa/_ji ltar brtson pas rmi lam na/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs brtags pa bzhin/_/de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa 'joms kyis 
[\[111a.5\]]gsol pa/_kun rtog 'dod chags rgyu lags te/_/'dod chags dngos pos bskyed ma lags/_/rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags byung /_/de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa/_ri sul dag na sgra byung ba/_/brag ca sems 
[\[111a.6\]]can sgra ma lags/_/de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs/_/de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te/_/sgra ni brag ca 'dra ba lags/_/'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan/_/byis pa mang po rab tu 
[\[111a.7\]]btsud/_/lha'i bu nan tan la mkhas pas gsol pa/_/chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang /_/byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags/_/nan tan chos las shes par bgyi/_/de la bdag ni the tshom chad/_/lha'i bu don gyi rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/_chos don yang dag 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]gang lags pa/_/de ni sus kyang ma rtogs shing /_/sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur/_/de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/_/lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa/_zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang /_/bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa/_/thub 
[\[111b.2\]]pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/_/lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang /_/zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang /_/dag dang bshad dang nye du dang /_/ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags/_/lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_khams gsum 
[\[111b.3\]]rnams la ma chags te/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/_/bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas/_/zhi ba'i sems la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa/_thub pa khyod kyi thugs yid ni/_/gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing /_/'dod dang 
[\[111b.4\]]mya ngan 'das pa la/_/gnas pa ma mchis bar snang 'dra/_/lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa/_'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs/_/gzugs dang gzugs med gnyi gar min/_/'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur pa/_/sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu sred pa 
[\[111b.5\]]phyung bas gsol pa/_'byung ba dag dang 'jig pa la/_/khyod kyi sred pa yang dag chad/_/khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'/_/rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu sred pa zil gyis gnon gyis gsol pa/_'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas/_/khyu mchog 
[\[111b.6\]]dam pa spyod mdzad cing /_/sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa/_/thugs brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu sred pa dang bral bas gsol pa/_kun tu sbyor dang bral ba ste/_/yang srid bas pas zhi gyur pa/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems/_/dus dang bral 
[\[111b.7\]]la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa/_/ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen/_/bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis/_/yang dag gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu nga dam las rgal bas 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]gsol pa/_'dod pa'i 'dam las rgal ba ste/_/srid pa'i 'dam las de bzhin rgal/_/gzigs pa mi mnga' len mi mnga'/_/yang srid zad la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/_zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs/_/re ba 
[\[112a.2\]]spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs/_/sangs rgyas sgrib pa rnam spangs pa/_/don rtogs khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu re ba spangs pas gsol pa/_don dang don ma lags pa spangs/_/chags pa mi mnga' nges rtogs pa/_/bdud kyi zhags las rnam 'das pa/_/len 
[\[112a.3\]]med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/_bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi/_/lam gang nyon mongs rims med pa/_/sgrib pa med par gzigs pa po/_/dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang gzigs/_/lha'i bu grags pa thob pas gsol pa/_
[\[112a.4\]]'dren pa 'jig rten rnam grags pa/_/khyod kyi mkhyen la brtson pa rnams/_/ji skad bstan bzhin rab rtog na/_/nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/_chos rnams kun la nges pas na/_/sngo ba gang yang yong ma gzigs/_/ye 
[\[112a.5\]]shes rgya mtsho mi bsnyengs par/_/seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/_'jigs pa kun las yang dag rgal/_/zug rngu thams cad kun tu bton/_/bsnyengs pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'/_/thams cad zil gnon phyag 
[\[112a.6\]]kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/_/lha rnams dang ni dri za dang /_/bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis/_/khyod kyi chos la rgal mi nus/_/de bas khyod la bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu seng ge'i rtsal gyis gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad yongs 
[\[112a.7\]]mkhyen pas/_/sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'/_/bdag la chos kyis su rgol zhes/_/bde gshegs khyod la dogs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu skrag med kyis gsol pa/_seng ge ri sul gnas pa ni/_/'jigs pa ma mchis skrag ma mchis/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]yongs btul te/_/spa bkong nags na nga ro sgrog_/de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang /_mu stegs can rnams yongs skrag ste/_/lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na/_/mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang sgrog_/lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/_'jig rten 
[\[112b.2\]]rnam 'dren 'jig rten na/_/sangs rgyas nyid la sngo bgyid pa/_/'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/_/des na rgyal ba bdag gi skyabs/_/lha'i bu seng ge blo gros kyis gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/_/chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/_/khyod 'dra 
[\[112b.3\]]'jig rten ma mchis te/_/cis mi bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu rjes su 'thun par skyes kyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni/_/khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis/_/lha'i bu mdzod 
[\[112b.4\]]'dzin gyis gsol pa/_/seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te/_/khyod kyi chos kyi mdzod bzung bas/_/srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/_/byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/_/lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su 'thun gyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas rjes 'thun brtul zhugs can/_/dpa' 
[\[112b.5\]]chen de dag thob chen thob/_/byang chub mchog tu sems btud cing /_/gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur/_/lha'i bu rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa/_khyod kyi bstan pa sus thos te/_/byang chub mchog tu sems btud pa/_/de dag 'jig rten sems can che/_/gang 
[\[112b.6\]]zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur/_/lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/_'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas/_/srog chags bye ba stong dag gis/_/byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/_/lha'i bu sems rgyud yongs su dag pas gsol pa/_
[\[112b.7\]]yun ring dus nas mi dbang gis/_/sangs rgyas bslab la legs bslabs pas/_/de slad khyod ni thugs rgyud dag_/mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/_/lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/_zag pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad de/_/dam bcas pa 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]la mngon bzhugs na/_/rgol ba 'di ni yong ma mchis/_/lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa/_khyod kyi gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i/_/lha dang lha bu mi dag ni/_/'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/_/des na thub pa stobs dang ldan/_/lha'i bu zag pa zad pa 
[\[113a.2\]]la mkhas pas gsol pa/_dge sbyong dam pa'i zag pa ni/_/ma lus yongs su bas pa ste/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha/_/lha'i bu rtag tu brtson pas gsol pa/_khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes/_/mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba/_/rnam pa 
[\[113a.3\]]kun tu mi dmigs te/_/des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa/_'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste/_/gti mug bag chags bcas pa zhi/_/nyes spyod las kyang zhi bas na/_/sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol 
[\[113a.4\]]pa/_rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang /_/bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i tshe/_/de la khyod kyi mkhyen kun 'jug_/des na khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/_'dren pa gang la bslabs pa yi/_/rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te/_/thams cad 
[\[113a.5\]]mkhyen pa de slad du/_/nyon mongs thams cad ma lus pas/_/lha'i bu rnal 'byor blo gros kyis gsol pa/_'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi blo/_/rnal 'byor las ni nyams ma mchis/_/des na khyod kyi nyon mongs kun/_/bag chags bcas par yongs su bsal/_/lha'i bu zhi ba rig pas gsol pa/_
[\[113a.6\]]nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur nas/_/bag chags ma lus yongs su bsal/_/bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang /_/cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu zad pa la rtog pas gsol pa/_thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod/_/nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas/_/'jig rten 
[\[113a.7\]]sgron ma khyod la ni/_/mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so/_/lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa/_khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/_/khyod la skyon dri yong ma mchis/_/de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen/_/lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub/_/lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]gsol pa/_zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na/_/skye ba'ang skye ba ma lags te/_/thub pa khyod skye tha ma pa/_/des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu tshad srung gis gsol pa/_dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs/_/sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur/_/mya ngan 'khri shing rnam par bskams/_/gdung ba 
[\[113b.2\]]med la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu shing btags bton gyis gsol pa/_thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod/_/ma rig shing btags rnams kyang bsal/_/sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs/_/de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa/_srid pa'i 
[\[113b.3\]]mtsho las yang dag rgal/_/rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas/_/khyod kyis snang ba yang dag phyung /_/'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub/_/lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa/_/nyon mongs thams cad rab tu bshig_/bag chags rdul tsam 
[\[113b.4\]]yong mi mnga'/_/mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_khyod kyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal/_/chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis 
[\[113b.5\]]gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas so/_/thub pa chos rnams kun mkhyen pa/_/sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen/_/ye shes mtsho la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/_khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa/_/seng ge nga ro rnam sgrog 
[\[113b.6\]]kyang /_/rgyal sras de dag chog med cing /_/sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyis skom/_/lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos rnams don gnyer bar/_/khyod kyi sras rnams sems bskyed cing /_/khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas/_/mkhas pa de 
[\[113b.7\]]dag byang chub tshol/_/lha'i bu chos kyi skom gyis gsol pa/_khyod kyis mi 'jigs thos gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir/_/srog chags bye ba skom gyur te/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu rtsom//_//
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bam po bcu gcig pa/_lha'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing /_/'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i/_/gsung pa'i mchog gyur khyod mthong nas/_/brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub tshol/_/lha'i bu 
[\[114a.2\]]chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/_thub pa zab cing blta dka' ba'i/_/chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa/_/khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas/_/de dag bla med byang chub tshol/_/lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa/_khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas/_/khyod kyi sras po dpa' des pa/_/
[\[114a.3\]]lus dang srog la mi lta bar/_/byang chub don du gnyer ba bgyid/_/lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_/khyod kyi dam chos 'di thos nas/_/gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par/_/brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub 
[\[114a.4\]]tshol/_/lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa/_mi dbang khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/theg pa gnyis po spang bgyis shing /_/lam gzhan du ni mi mchi bar/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol/_/lha'i bu nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/_/seng ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pa/_/rgyal 
[\[114a.5\]]ba'i sras kyis thos gyur na/_/byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing /_/de dag rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu spobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol pa/_grags chen khyod kyis gsung brjod pa'i/_/spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi sras/_/kun kyang 
[\[114a.6\]]dga' ba rab tu bskyed/_/lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/_'jigs med khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pa/_/ma smad sras kyis thos gyur na/_/de dag spobs pa nam du yang /_/sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog_/lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa/_'jigs med 
[\[114a.7\]]khyod kyis gsung bsgrags pas/_/stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams/_/rtag tu rab tu dga' 'gyur cing /_/ma smad de dag byang chub tshol/_/lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa/_khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos gyur nas/_/rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sras/_/dga' zhing 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]zhum pa ma mchis par/_/byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid/_/lha'i bu thogs med yid kyis gsol pa/_khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na/_/sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste/_/de dag yid ni nam du yang /_/byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis/_/lha'i bu chos la bar 
[\[114b.2\]]chad med la mkhas pas gsol pa/_chos rnams gang la bsten bgyis kyang /_/dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing /_/de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i/_/gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_dkar po'i phyogs la spyod 
[\[114b.3\]]pa la/_/bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen/_/des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/_dge ba kun nas nyon mongs pa/_/nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te/_/khyod kyi thugs ni des mi 
[\[114b.4\]]gos/_/gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen/_/lha'i bu rig pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_nag po'i chos ni nam du yang /_/dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par/_/rigs par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs/_/des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla/_/lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge 
[\[114b.5\]]ba rig pas gsol pa/_chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres par/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen/_/kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na/_/dkar po'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu lam la mkhas pas gsol pa/_kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la/_/dkar 
[\[114b.6\]]po'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste/_/de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la/_/bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs/_/lha'i bu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/_nag po'i phyogs la sten bgyid na/_/thar par 'dod pa mang po yi/_/bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs/_/des na rgyal khyod 
[\[114b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen/_/lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/_sems grol bgyi bar gang 'tshal bas/_/kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs/_/de khyod 'jig rten mchod rten lags/_/lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol pa/_
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid cing /_/kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na/_/dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus/_/de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/lha'i bu sdig mthong gis gsol pa/_sdig pa rnams la bsten byas kyang /_/dge ba mi 'grib gang smra ba/_/
[\[115a.2\]]de ni thar chos skal med ces/_/rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsungs/_/lha'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa/_chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug 'dul 'dod pas/_/thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba/_/de lta bur ni nan tan bgyi/_/lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag 
[\[115a.3\]]pas gsol pa/_dag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa/_/mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa/_/de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min/_/de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs/_/lha'i bu thar pa la brtson gyis gsol pa/_/nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos/_/rgyal ba yis ni gang 
[\[115a.4\]]bstan pa/_/de bsten nyon mongs mi zad ces/_/khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/_/lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs pas gsol pa/_chos gang nyon mongs gang gi rnams/_/zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la/_/yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces/_/rgol ba 'di ni yong mi 
[\[115a.5\]]dmigs/_/lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/_rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la/_/gang gi don du chos bstan pa/_/de brtson bgyis pas mi 'thob ces/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa/_'dod chags spang phyir 
[\[115a.6\]]mi sdug pa/_/bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na/_/'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes/_/khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis/_/lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/_shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas/_/zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa/_/de bsgrubs sel 
[\[115a.7\]]bar mi 'gyur zhes/_/dgra 'joms khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa/_shes rab gti mug spang ba'i phyir/_/gsungs pa de la bsten bgyis kyang /_/gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu rnam par 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/_rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni/_/dbugs dbyung rngub pa dran gsungs pa/_/de la brtson bgyis ma zhi zhes/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa/_nga'o snyam pa spang slad du/_/stong nyid khyod 
[\[115b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal te/_/des ni de zhi mi 'gyur zhes/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis gsol pa/_nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du/_/mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs/_/bsten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma 
[\[115b.3\]]mchis/_/lha'i bu sems rgyun rnam par dag pas gsol pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa yis/_/nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces/_/'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis/_/lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/_phyogs gang 
[\[115b.4\]]gnyen po'i rnam pa dang /_/nyon mongs lam dang lam 'jug la/_/'jigs pa med par rgol ba ni/_/thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu tha snyad shin tu shes pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang /_/zad dang ma zad tha snyad tsam/_/'jigs pa ma mchis rgol 
[\[115b.5\]]bgyid pa/_/thub pa de ni ming tsam mo/_/lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa/_mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas/_/khyod kyi sku yi phrin las 'jug_/thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na/_/des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen/_/lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes 
[\[115b.6\]]pas gsol pa/_sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/_/dpa' bo khyod sku'i phrin las ni/_/mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu lus kyi las shin tu nges pas gsol pa/_sku yi phrin las rab nges par/_/lus can kun la 
[\[115b.7\]]sman slad du/_/'jig rten sgron ma khyod mdzad de/_/des na khyod ni gang zag mchog_/lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa/_sems can kun la sman slad du/_/'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/_/sku yi phrin las dag pa dang /_/legs par yongs 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]su brtags dang ldan/_/lha'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/_shin tu mnyam par bzhag sku dang /_/sku yi phrin las rnam dag dang /_/ldan par sems can bde don du/_/gang zag mchog ni spyod par mdzad/_/lha'i bu tshig grub 
[\[116a.2\]]kyis gsol pa/_snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang /_/rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i gsung /_/mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing /_/mgon po khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/_/lha'i bu dus su smra pas gsol pa/_dus su don dang ldan pa dang /_/don med yongs su spangs pa'i 
[\[116a.3\]]gsung /_/gsung bar 'os dang blang 'os pa/_/'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba mdzad/_/lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/_dbyen du 'gyur ba yongs spangs te/_/'dum par gyur dang yid 'ong ba/_/dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin/_/sngon chad khyod kyis gsung du brjod/_/
[\[116a.4\]]lha'i bu mi slu bas gsol pa/_srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni/_/srid pa rnams su [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma gsungs/_/de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun/_/'jig rten dag na thogs ma mchis/_/lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/_'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang /_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[116a.5\]]rnams btsal slad du/_/thub pa'i gsung la bstod pa ni/_/yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu 'thun lags/_/lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' las nges par byung gis gsol pa/_mi mchog khyod kyis bden pa yis/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te/_/chos kyi yang dag rang 
[\[116a.6\]]bzhin yang /_/rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu yang dag pa la rtul bas gsol pa/_'dus byas dag gi chos kyi rnams/_/yang dag ji bzhin blta ba dang /_/chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang /_/mi yi dbang pos rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol 
[\[116a.7\]]pa/_ye shes yongs su dag pa yis/_/bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi_/tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis/_/lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/_mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las/_/ji snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni/_/de dag 'gro la 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]thugs rjes 'jug_/'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_'gro la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/_/gang la khyod ni spyod mdzad pa/_/de la thugs ni dul bar byung /_/'gro phan khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha'i bu thabs la mkhas pas 
[\[116b.2\]]gsol pa/_'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyad nas/_/rnam 'dren thugs kyi phrin las 'jug_/thub pa ye shes sna tshogs ni/_/mkhyen bzhin kun tu rab tu 'jug_/lha'i bu yid rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas sa dang yid kyi las/_/sems can thugs rjes gzigs 
[\[116b.3\]]pas 'byung /_/sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs/_/rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/_sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang /_/gang gis gang la sngon spyad pa/_/sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/
[\[116b.4\]]lha'i bu 'das pa la rtog pas gsol pa/_byang chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cing /_/gang du khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/_/sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brtags nas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/_/gang du 
[\[116b.5\]]khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/_/sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang /_/khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/_sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yi/_/ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba/_/sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la/_/rnam 
[\[116b.6\]]par 'dren pa khyod kyis zhus/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges par byung gis gsol pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu/_/grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/_/ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis/_/zhus shing bsgom pa mdzad par gyur/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas 
[\[116b.7\]]gsol pa/_'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang /_/bkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag_/gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston/_/sems can long ba rnams kyang 'grel/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul pas gsol pa/_gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal/_/rtse zhing rab tu 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dga' ba bgyis/_/gnod pa mi bzad bgyis pa dag_/gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung bas gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa/_/khyod kyi ye shes 'das dus kyi/_/las dang bsam 
[\[117a.2\]]gtan snyoms 'jug dang /_/'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/_/lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/_'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_/skye dang las kyi rnam smin la/_/thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so/_/lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod 
[\[117a.3\]]yul gyis gsol pa/_brten pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi/_/mkhyen pa phyi dus sems can gyi/_/bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu dang /_/'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis/_/lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis gsol pa/_khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang /_/dus gsum kun la 
[\[117a.4\]]mkhas khyod kyi/_/ye shes mchog ni mi chags te/_/srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen/_/lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/_las dang sems can 'gro ba dang /_/rnam par smin pa myong ba dag_/de dag thams cad ming tsam du/_/rkang gnyis dam pa bstan pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la 
[\[117a.5\]]yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/_dpa' bo khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/da ltar byung la thogs ma mchis/_/grangs med sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/_/'jig rten mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/_/lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la rnam par dpyod pas gsol pa/_mi yi dbang pos rnam dpyad nas/_/byis pa'i blo gros 
[\[117a.6\]]rmongs bgyid pa/_/dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par/_/nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs/_/lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing /_/ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te/_/dngos po thams cad dngos med par/_/rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/
[\[117a.7\]]lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul bas gsol pa/_'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams/_/ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par/_/skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad/_/lha'i bu chags med yid kyis gsol pa/_dus gsum sems can thams cad la/_/snying po mchis par 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ma bstan te/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang /_/brag ca lta bur khyod kyis bstan/_/lha'i bu dus gsum dpog gis gsol pa/_'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/dus gsum po dag kun du yang /_/sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas na/_/khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par 
[\[117b.2\]]byed kyis gsol pa/_gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis/_/byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa/_/de dus tshun chad mos pa la/_/bri bar gyur par yong mi gda'/_/lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/_'jig rten sgrol ma'i mos pa ni/_/bar du rgyun chad mi 'gyur te/_/rtag par khyod kyi mos pa 
[\[117b.3\]]des/_/khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che/_/lha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/_chab las pad ma ji bzhin du/_/khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags/_/'jig rten dag gis mi gos te/_/pad ma chab kyis ji bzhin no/_/lha'i bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gsol pa/_
[\[117b.4\]]'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni/_/chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod pa ste/_/gnyis med gnyis su bgyid ma mchis/_/smad pa med pa khyod kyis gzigs/_/lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/_gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis/_/byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur/_/mdzad 
[\[117b.5\]]pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/_/brtson 'grus btang ba yong ma mdzad/_/lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/_dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni/_/thams cad kun gyi rjes su 'jug_/mdzad pa mdzad kyang mgon po khyod/_/dgongs pa bri ba yong ma mchis/_/lha'i bu sems mnyam par 
[\[117b.6\]]bzhag pas gsol pa/_mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag ste/_/sems can rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen/_/'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni/_/sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/_/lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/_'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyi/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i mtha' 
[\[117b.7\]]ma ni/_/bskal pa bye bar brjod bgyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod/_/lha'i bu rnam par grol ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/_rnam par grol dang ma grol ba/_/gang slad khyod kyis ma brnyes pas/_/mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni/_/rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'/_/
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol pa/_thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas/_/ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na/_/rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni/_/yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu sngon gyi srid pa rnam par dpyod kyis gsol pa/_mar me mdzad pa 
[\[118a.2\]]tshun chad du/_/dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyi/_/spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste/_/des na sangs rgyas legs zhes bstod/_/lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/_srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du/_/bde gshegs khyod la chags mi mnga'/_/chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas 
[\[118a.3\]]na/_/rang bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'/_/lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni/_/rnam pa kun du bsnyel mi mnga'/_/mgon po'i dgongs pa nyer gzhag pas/_/thub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra/_/lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/_'jig 
[\[118a.4\]]rten sgron ma khyod la ni/_/mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi mnga'/_/ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/_/srog chags kun gyis shes par dka'/_/lha'i bu ye shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/_bde bar gshegs pa khyod la ni/_/ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste/_/mi 
[\[118a.5\]]yi dbang po'i sangs rgyas chos/_/ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab/_/lha'i bu thams cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/_skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la ni/_/'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ma pham pa/_/khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/_/lha'i bu snying po 
[\[118a.6\]]blangs pas gsol pa/_sems can snying po bla na med/_/chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam brnyes pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas gtsang ma pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe gzhan 
[\[118a.7\]]mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu drug khris lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_klu dang /_grul bum dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_phreng ldan glang po can dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dag gis mchod pa yang mthong /_lung bstan pa yang thos/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa yang thos nas 
[\[118b.2\]]ngo mtshar thob par gyur te chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa 'di thos nas 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas yid gnyis su gyur/_nem nur dang /_the tshom za bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas 
[\[118b.3\]]bdag cag ni kun du rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/_khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar gyur cing 'di ltar sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas chos 'di la nem nur dang the tshom du gyur te/_sems dang bar yang ma gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa 
[\[118b.4\]]mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas bdag cag gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher gau ta 
[\[118b.5\]]ma khyod kyi legs par gsungs pa 'tshal zhing yi rangs bar gyur ba mthong ste/_des na bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to/_/kye gau ta ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la ji ltar chos thams cad de bzhin 
[\[118b.6\]]gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tshom cher 'tshal lo/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod ni ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtogs nas mun pa med par gyur te/_stan 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do snyam ste/_bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod 
[\[118b.7\]]la de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag de'i phyir khyed nyid la dris/_khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig_/dge 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]sbyong gau ta ma legs so zhes gsol te/_kun tu rgyu de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag khyed kyis ji ltar mngal du 'jug pa shes sam/_de dag gis gsol pa/_kye gau ta 
[\[119a.2\]]ma bdag cag gis bstan bcos las thos na gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/_gang 'di pha dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa dang /_chags par yang gyur pa dang /_chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas 'dod chags kyang byung ba de'i tshe 
[\[119a.3\]]mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_pha dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/_
[\[119a.4\]]kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/de pha'i sems las byung ngam/_/kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/pha'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/_kye gau ta ma ma lags so/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_pha'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma 
[\[119a.5\]]de ni ma lags so/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_pha'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_pha'i kun tu rtog pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma de ni ma lags so/_/kun 
[\[119a.6\]]tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_mngal na gnas pa de lha las shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_mngal na gnas pa de mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[119a.7\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/_mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa'am/_gzugs med pa zhig ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di la 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ji snyam du sems/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/_kye gau ta ma ma 'tshal to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[119b.2\]]stsal to/_/kun tu rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab cing phra ste/_mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/_brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la/_blta dka' zhing shes par dka' bas de ni khyed yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/_gzhan du mos pa/_gzhan 
[\[119b.3\]]du dad pa/_gzhan du brtson pa/_gzhan du lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus mod kyi/_kun tu rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/_kun tu rgyu dag 
[\[119b.4\]]'di lta ste/_dper na mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na tshe 'di nyid la mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[119b.5\]]kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig nyams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/_des kyang chos zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag khyed kyang yun ring po nas gzhan du bltas pa/_sngon log pa'i gdams 
[\[119b.6\]]ngag gis bslus pa/_chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes pa/_thar pa ma yin pa la thar par 'du shes pa/_'byung ba ma yin pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa/_chud zos pa rnams kyis chud gzan pa yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste/_dper na long ba'i dmigs bu long bas byas na/_
[\[119b.7\]]gang 'di bkri ba dang /_khrid pa de gnyi ga yang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du dge slong ngam/_bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]yin par bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang /_'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba dang /_'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba mthong ba yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang /_mu 
[\[120a.2\]]stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag cag ni mu stegs byed pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/_de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing gang rjes su ston pa de ni log par rjes su ston par 'gyur/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni 
[\[120a.3\]]log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/_gang 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par 'byin par 'gyur/_'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni log par ston par 'gyur/_mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang sgrol ba de ni log par sgrol bar 
[\[120a.4\]]'gyur te/_de dag ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste/_dper na ba lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par ba lang bsgral na/_de'i ba lang de dag gis pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram ma rnyed nas 'khyil te/_de nyid du tshul ma yin par 
[\[120a.5\]]sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ba lang rdzi de rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed par khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag 
[\[120a.6\]]nga ni ston pa nyid yin la ston par khas 'che bas nga gang rjes su ston pa de yang dag par rjes su ston pa yin/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su khas 'che bas/_nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa 
[\[120a.7\]]yin/_'byung ba la mkhas pa nyid yin la 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/_'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la 'byung ba ston par khas 'che bas nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/_mu stegs byed pa yin la mu 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]stegs byed par khas 'che bas nga gang sgrol ba de yang dag par sgrol ba yin te/_ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni rjes su ston/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes nas ni khong du chud par byed/_'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/_yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/_mu stegs 
[\[120b.2\]]rab tu shes nas ni sgrol te/_gang sgrol ba de yang mu stegs bde bas rab tu sgrol ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_kun tu rgyu dag khyed kyang thar par 'dod pa yin la/_nga yang ston pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te/_yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa/_'byung ba phun sum 
[\[120b.3\]]tshogs pa 'byung ba mthong ba/_yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te mos pa skyed la dran pa nye bar zhog ste/_yid 'dun par gyis la ma thob pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang /_sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_sngon ma song ba'i phyogs su 
[\[120b.4\]]'gro bar bya ba dang /_sngon ma 'grogs pa'i lam grogs dang 'grogs par bya ba dang /_sngon ma btsal ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang /_sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir/_brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsoms shig_/kun tu rgyu dag chos gsum mngon du gyur pas mngal du 'jug 
[\[120b.5\]]ces gang smras pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la ngas bshad do/_kun tu rgyu dag de la ma zhes gang smras pa de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsungs so/_/pha zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags 
[\[120b.6\]]pa'i rgyur gsungs so/_/dri za zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_mer mer po zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang gzhi'o/_/ma'i mngal zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i gzhi ste/_'di ltar 
[\[120b.7\]]ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang /_'phel ba dang /_rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po la gnas na rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dag skye zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ma'i mngal na 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang /_'phel ba dang /_rgyas par 'gyur te/_'phel nas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/btsas nas rnam par 'phel lo/_/'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur te/_'gro ba gang dang gang nas shi 'phos nas de dang der skyes nas de dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[121a.2\]]spyod pa de dag de spyod par 'gyur te/_de dag kyang mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/_glen pas ni ma yin no/_/yun ring po nas 'grogs 'grogs pas shes par bya ba yin gyis yun thung dus ma yin no/_/yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/_mi brtson pas ma yin no/_/
[\[121a.3\]]kun tu rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_skad sha sha po yin/_skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/_skad brtag dgos pa yin/_skad che ba yin/_skad lhang lhang po yin/_rtag tu dngangs pa 
[\[121a.4\]]yin/_rtag tu 'dar ba yin/_rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/_rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/_ri rgyug par mthong ba yin/_me mdag 'bar bar mthong ba yin/_lcags zangs kyi nang du btso ba mthong ba yin lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong ba yin/_srin po 
[\[121a.5\]]dag gis bdag 'phang bar mthong ba yin/_bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/_khyi dag gis bdag dbang bar mthong ba yin/_khyi dag gis bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/_bdag nyid glang po che dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/_phyogs bzhir 
[\[121a.6\]]bros nas phyogs mi shes pa yin/_sems can kun la yid mi rton pa yin no/_/kun tu rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di 
[\[121a.7\]]dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_rmugs shing gnyid che ba yin/_le lo che ba yin/_mang du za ba yin/_sa la 'drud pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa med pa yin/_mi gsal bar smra ba yin/_glen pa la dga' ba yin/_mun pa la dga' ba yin/_'dam rdzab la dga' ba yin/_
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]yang dang yang sos rtsa gcod pa yin/_rgyun du rkang pa'i mthe bos sa rko ba yin/_yang dang yang mgo la sbrang ma 'du ba yin/_yang dang yang nam mkha' la sos 'debs pa yin/_kun tu bskums te nyal ba yin/_sa la nyal ba yin/_mi gtsang bas mi 'dog pa yin/_yang 
[\[121b.2\]]dang yang nam mkha' la mnom pa yin/_yang dang yang ma smin par za ba yin/_gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du byed de g.yo byed pa yin/_bab bab tu spyod pa yin/_rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/_rmi lam na bdag nags su song ste rtswa za bar rmi ba yin/_sbrul gdug 
[\[121b.3\]]pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/_bdag nyid ri khrod du zhugs par mthong ba yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/_de dag ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par brjod kyang 
[\[121b.4\]]zad par mi nus so/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_skra ser ba yin/_mig wa'i mig lta bu yin/_rtag par bkres pa yin/_rtag tu skom pa yin/_ser sna che ba yin/_'dod chen che ba dang /_
[\[121b.5\]]'thob pa mi rnyed pa yin/_gzhan gyi la re ba yin/_khro ba yin/_mig dmar ba yin/_bza' ba thams cad la sred pa yin/_bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/_dngos po kun la yang de brku ba'i sems yod pa yin/_dngos po 
[\[121b.6\]]ngan pa rnams la yang dga' ba yin/_'thob pa la mos pa yin/_zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/_gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/_gzhan gyi longs spyod la sred pa skyed pa yin/_gzhan gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag la bdag gi snyam du 
[\[121b.7\]]sems pa yin/_zas gtor na sems mi dga' ba yin/_tshong 'dus kyi srang dag nas kyang shing thog len pa yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags kyi bye brag ni de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas par shes par bya'o/_/kun tu rgyu dag 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_khengs pa yin/_'thab krol che ba yin/_'khon du 'dzin pa yin/_nga rgyal che ba yin/_lus che ba yin/_mig che ba yin/_mig dkar ba yin/_mche 
[\[122a.2\]]ba snang ba yin/_mthu dang ldan pa yin/_thab mo'i blo can yin/_dbyen la dga' ba yin/_bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/_so snang ba yin/_'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes can yin/_mtshon cha rno ba yin/_tshig na ba yin/_bad ga gzengs stod 
[\[122a.3\]]pa can yin/_mi shes pa'i stobs can yin/_nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/_
[\[122a.4\]]'di lta ste/_ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/_'phags pa dang sten pa yin/_'phags pa ma yin pa la smod pa yin/_dge ba byed pa yin/_mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/_grags pa 'dod pa yin/_snyan pa 'dod pa yin/_bzo la dga' ba yin/_shes pa la dga' ba yin/_nyon 
[\[122a.5\]]mongs pa chung ba yin/_khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/_rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/_byas pa gzo ba yin/_mdza' bo la gdung ba yin/_yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/_bye brag shes pa yin/_byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtog pa yin/_tshig gi mthu 
[\[122a.6\]]yod pa yin/_gros gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/_'dum par bya ba dang /_'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin/_pho nya nus pa yin/_skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mngon par shes pa yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag de dag la 
[\[122a.7\]]sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la lha las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_mdzes pa yin/_gtsang sbra che ba yin/_phreng ba la dga' ba yin/_spos la dga' ba yin/_bdug pa la dga' ba yin/_glu 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/_byug pa la dga' ba yin/_'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/_rol mo'i sgra thams cad la dga' ba yin/_glu thams cad la dga' ba yin/_skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/_khang pa dang /_khang pa 
[\[122b.2\]]brtsegs pa dang /_khyim dang /_longs spyod rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/_de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/_rgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin/_'jam par smra ba yin/_dga' ba la mkhas pa yin/_rgyan la dga' ba yin/_che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/_'gro ba'i ngang 
[\[122b.3\]]tshul can yin/_lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i ngang tshul can yin/_chags pa'i mtshan ma dang mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/_phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/_kun tu rgyu dag mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas/_mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o/_/
[\[122b.4\]]kun tu rgyu dag de la mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams bsten par bya/_
[\[122b.5\]]bsnyen par bya/_bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/_/de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe zhe sdang la yongs su bsten pas des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las des sems can dmyal bar skyes te/_de'i phyir sems can dmyal 
[\[122b.6\]]bar gnas pa rnyed nas sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang du skyes te/_spyod pa'i rtags 'di dag thos nas bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /_des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i 
[\[122b.7\]]bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/_de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa ston to/_/byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/_/des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la nyal 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]spong bar 'gyur te/_de byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe/_gti mug la yongs su bsten pas des gti 
[\[123a.2\]]mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas/_de las des dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skyes te/_de'i phyir de dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas de dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te/_mi'i nang du skyes kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[123a.3\]]kyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/_des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /_des dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal 
[\[123a.4\]]bar bya ste/_/de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ston to/_/des kyang de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te/_des de gti mug de ni rang bzhin med pa'o zhes bya 
[\[123a.5\]]bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/_des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir 
[\[123a.6\]]gyur ba'i tshe ser sna la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas des der ser sna dang ldan pa chags pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas de las byas pa dang /_bsags pa dang /_zin par byas pa dang /_rdzogs par byas pa dang /_blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig 
[\[123a.7\]]rten du skyes te/_de gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur bas de gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/_des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni gshin rje'i 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /_des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/_de las dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag ser sna spang ba'i phyir gtong ba ston to/_/des kyang de'i ser sna'i 
[\[123b.2\]]bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_kun tu rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis 
[\[123b.3\]]sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la nga rgyal la yang yongs su bsten pas de nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i las byas pa dang /_bsags pa dang /_zin par byas pa dang /_rdzogs par byas pa dang /_blangs pa des lha ma yin du skyes te/_lha ma yin gyi nang na 
[\[123b.4\]]gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas de lha ma yin nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/_des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing /_des spyod pa de dag 
[\[123b.5\]]las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/_de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga rgyal spang ba dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams ston to/_/des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la stong pa nyid 
[\[123b.6\]]ston te/_des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong ba dang /_bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ji ltar bya ba 'byung ba rnams tshogs pa las byung ba'i tshul ston te/_des de'i nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la chos rnams kyi 
[\[123b.7\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/_des de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas de las de byas pa dang /_bsags pa dang /_zin par byas pa dang /_rdzogs par byas pa dang /_blangs pas mir skyes te/_de mi'i nang na gnas pa des mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang mi'i spyod pa 
[\[124a.2\]]de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/_de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des mi'i spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/_de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag 
[\[124a.3\]]pa'i 'du shes ston to/_/des kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te/_des de 'khor ba la mi dga' zhing mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de 
[\[124a.4\]]la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston te/_de thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de la thabs mkhas pa yang ston to/_/des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag shin tu bzung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur 
[\[124a.5\]]ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang /_sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas de las de byas pa dang /_bsags pa dang /_zin par 
[\[124a.6\]]byas pa dang /_rdzogs par byas ba dang /_blangs pas lha'i nang du skyes te/_de lha'i nang na gnas pa de lha'i spyod pa can du gyur pas de lha las shi 'phos te/_mi'i nang du skyes kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/_des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o 
[\[124a.7\]]zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/_de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ston cing mi gnas pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]do/_/mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa smod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sbyin pa bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims la dmod cing mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/des de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa bag la 
[\[124b.2\]]nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la thabs la mkhas pa yang ston to/_/de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung 
[\[124b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/kun tu rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan par bya'o/_/thos nas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ste/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs
