[\[222b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pas rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa med kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmigs pa kho nar zad do/_/glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'gyur ba med par rtag tu gnas pas 'di lta ste/_ming dang 
[\[223a.2\]]gzugs kyang stor bar mi 'gyur la/_phan tshun 'gal ba yang med/_skye ba yang med/_'byung ba yang med do/_/glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar chos ston pas khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/ngas khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na khyed kyis kyang de 
[\[223a.3\]]bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/glang po che'i lag ston pa chen pos slob pa rnams la gang bya ba'i rigs pa de dag ngas ma lus par byas zin pas khyed kyis ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs nas chos rnams las ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o/_/
[\[223a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na su zhig lam ston par 'gyur/_lam ston pa med pa'i 
[\[223a.5\]]phyir dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos nub par gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas 'di yang sems can thams cad yongs su ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o zhes mchi na de la ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[223a.6\]]glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri ba yod na de la 'di skad du lan gdab par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la/_rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus las gzhes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 
[\[223a.7\]]gyur kyang da dung phan pa mdzad pa yin no/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcod par mdzad pa yin te/_sangs 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyi chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 
[\[223b.2\]]spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du gsung ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams 
[\[223b.3\]]cad yongs su tshol ba legs par thugs su chud pa lags te/_chos thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i slad du sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi phrin las mkhyen pa sngon du gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[223b.4\]]spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mdzad cing ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du gsung bar gyur ba ni shin du ngo mtshar che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glang po che'i lag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_glang po che'i lag khyod kyis ji skad smras 
[\[223b.5\]]pa bzhin du nga ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smras par gyur ba yin no/_/glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la 
[\[223b.6\]]phan 'dogs pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde ba la 'god pa dang /_thams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu byon nas da dung ma rgal ba dag yongs 
[\[223b.7\]]su zlos shes zer ba la/_de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig slu ba med cing bya ba byas pa'i drin gzo ba yin zhes zer ba la de ni 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/_sems can gang la la zhig nga la bya ba cung zad cig byas pa'i dngos po de yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/glang po che'i lag nga ni dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[224a.2\]]sems bskyed pa tshun chad bar nam yang sems la ldog cing gyur ba yang med la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dran yang ngas chos de bstan pas nga'i 'khor rnams las sems rtse gcig tu nyan thos dang /_
[\[224a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba dag gzung ba'i phyir 'dun par gyur ba kho nar zad do/_/glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i tshe shes rab gsal zhing rno la mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas chos zab 
[\[224a.4\]]mo'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang /_'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_lam bsgoms par gyur to/_/de dag thams cad nga'i thad du 'ongs 
[\[224a.5\]]pa dang ngas chos bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing sems la rang dbang thob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par gyur pas rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas grong dang /_grong khyer 
[\[224a.6\]]dang /_grong rdal dag tu zhugs te bsod snyoms bslangs nas nga la rim gro byas so/_/nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gis 'di dag gi mchod pa blang ba'i mi rigs so snyam du sems par gyur to/_/drang srong 
[\[224a.7\]]de dag ngas rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang ngas thob par ma gyur pas chos de thob par byas shing mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to/_/glang po che'i lag ngas nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas chos de 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]mngon du byas pa'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te mngon du lus bstan nas nga la 'di skad du kye ye shes 'di la mngon par zhen par ma byed cig_/khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med dpag 
[\[224b.2\]]tu med pa rnams yongs su zlo bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/glang po che'i lag ngas de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas lam bsgom pa btang bas sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du dben par 'dug pa'i tshe dga' bas lus kun du khyab par gyur to/_/glang 
[\[224b.3\]]po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang 'thob par 'gyur la/_bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub 
[\[224b.4\]]sems dpa' ni bdag nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas gzhan dag kyang sems bskyed par skul ba yin/_theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par 
[\[224b.5\]]bya ba yin gyi/_gzhan gyis thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems pa yin/_sems can nyes par spyod pa dag la dus dus su rjes su 'doms shing sems bzang pos gtam dag smras nas de dag gi dge ba yongs su srung bar byed pa yin/_bdag nyid rtag par rab 
[\[224b.6\]]tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing gzhan dag la bstan nas ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/_glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/_bdag 
[\[224b.7\]]nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' brtan sems kyis/_/bla med theg la rab gnas shing /_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas/_/theg pa de la 'god par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyad spyod tshe/_/rtag par phrag dog khong khro med/_/nan tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas/_/dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/
[\[225a.2\]]sems can sdig spyod mthong gyur na/_/dus su rjes su 'doms par byed/_/rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan/_/khong khro dag ni med pa yin/_/rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas/_/sems can rnams la spel bar byed/_/ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar/_/chos 
[\[225a.3\]]kyis thams cad tshim par byed/_/chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur bas/_/the tshom sems ni ma skyed ces/_/lha rnams kyis ni go bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpas de thos nas/_/nan tan brtson 'grus skyed par 
[\[225a.4\]]byed/_/dngos po 'di ni nges bden pas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas nges 'grub sems/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/_/brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang /_/dran pa dang ni shes rab dag_/bdag nyid rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs 
[\[225a.5\]]pa rnams/_/'jig rten du ni byung gyur na/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/_/'di 'dra'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/_/gang zag chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang /_/thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing /_/lam ldan 
[\[225a.6\]]yin par rig par 'gyur/_/bstan bcos gtsug lag tshig dang don/_/tshig 'bru tshigs bcad rtsis dang grangs/_/de dag thams cad legs rtogs pas/_/sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/dbang po rno zhing shes rab ldan/_/bya ba stobs la mi ltos 
[\[225a.7\]]par/_/thabs dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gis/_/thams cad yongs su grub par nus/_/dgra rnams rab tu gdul ba yang /_/lus kyi zho sha mi ltos par/_/shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis/_/rang gi sems ni 'dul bar byed/_/sems can rab 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]tu brtse ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten du ni skyes pas na/_/rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang /_/ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur/_/lha rnams kun kyang smra bas na/_/de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig_/ci phyir de ltar rig ce na/_/
[\[225b.2\]]bdag sems shes zhes sems phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas na/_/der song chos ni rab zhus nas/_/sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs/_/sangs rgyas zhus lan gsungs pas na/_/the tshom dag ni chad par 'gyur/_/
[\[225b.3\]]sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas/_/thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur bar lung ston pas/_/de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de/_/sems ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[225b.4\]]shin tu phangs pa'i nor rnams dang /_/phyi nang kun la chags med pas/_/de phyir dga' ba chen po yis/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'grub par shes/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/_/bzod pa gya nom thob pas na/_/de 
[\[225b.5\]]phyir dga' ba chen po yis/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'grub par shes/_/chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing /_/chos brtan mi rung rig pas na/_/de 'dra'i shes rab thob gyur nas/_/lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur/_/de yi 
[\[225b.6\]]sems ni nang mi gnas/_/phyi rol na yang mi gnas te/_/'du shes thams cad 'das pas na/_/de phyir bzod pa bla med thob/_/yun ring byams dang snying rje yis/_/sems can kun la sems pas na/_/de phyir bsod nams de yi dbang /_/
[\[225b.7\]]sangs rgyas tshad med mthong bar 'gyur/_/de yi lus ni thams cad kun/_/sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med/_/de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas ni/_/chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/_/su zhig rjes 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]su slob mi byed/_/rab brtan dam chos gang gnas pa/_/'di 'dra'i yon tan thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir lam ni gnyer ba dag_/rtag par nan tan chos gnyer bya/_/chos kyis bdag gi khe btsal nas/_/byang chub la 
[\[226a.2\]]ni phan gdags bya/_/brgal ba'i lan gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus na byang 
[\[226a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang po de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_nga ni yun ring po 
[\[226a.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_chos gnyer chos ni 
[\[226a.5\]]gang thob pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas lam gzhi yin/_/rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa/_/chos ma yin pa spong bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu yang dag lam spyod pa/_/log pa'i lam ni spong bar byed/_/sangs rgyas chos la rtag bsten pa/_/de ni 
[\[226a.6\]]lam la bsten par 'gyur/_/des na mi khom rnams spangs nas/_/khom ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/khom ldan gnas ni thob gyur na/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za/_/gnas gnyis su ni mchog tu btsun/_/kha dog gzugs ni 
[\[226a.7\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_/g.yog 'khor dag ni phun tshogs shing /_/thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni/_/tshul khrims bzod pa'i phyogs la gnas/_/brtson 'grus phyogs la rab gnas shing /_/bsam gtan 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]shes rab 'phel bar byed/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/_/gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/yon tan kun gyi mchog gyur pas/_/don rig 'jigs pa ci yang med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad 
[\[226b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de/_bdag cag ni sngon dang dang po nas le lo can du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob 
[\[226b.3\]]par 'gyur bar mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pa na/_'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par byung bar gyur pa lags so snyam sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs stod cing /_spro ba 
[\[226b.4\]]bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lags so/_/de'i slad du zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi ched du rtag par 
[\[226b.5\]]de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad de/_de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang ma mchis na/_sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po 
[\[226b.6\]]chen po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de lta bu tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs 
[\[226b.7\]]ma mchis pa dag spyad pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/_sems can 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs su bzla bar bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[227a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang /_bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[227a.3\]]pa yin pas/_sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang /_dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa/_shin tu dka' ba/_tshad med/_dpag tu med/_grangs med 
[\[227a.4\]]pa dang ldan par gyur ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin du bcas 
[\[227a.5\]]pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do//_//tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong 
[\[227a.6\]]phrag brgya pa las gang pos zhus pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//_//[{D62}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa ste/_yul 'khor skyong gis zhus 
[\[227a.7\]]pa/_/bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rASh+T+ra pA la pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//_//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad 
[\[227b.2\]]kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_bzod pa thob pa/_bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_spobs pa 
[\[227b.3\]]mtha' yas pa thob pa/_mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa nas/_yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[227b.4\]]dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_kun tu mig dang /_kun tu lta ba dang /_kun tu 'od zer dang /_kun tu 'od dang /_blo gros mchog dang /_blo gros 'phel dang /_blo gros mtha' yas dang /_blo gros rgya chen dang /_blo gros mi 
[\[227b.5\]]zad pa dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_'gro ba 'dzin dang /_rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa drug 
[\[227b.6\]]cu dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_lha'i bu mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang /_lha yi dbang 
[\[227b.7\]]po thams cad dang /_klu yi dbang po thams cad dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /_dri za'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad dang /_'khor de nyid 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las ni mngon par 'phags/_nyi ma ltar 'jig 
[\[228a.2\]]rten thams cad la ni snang /_zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba ni mdzad/_tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/_brgya byin ltar sku ni bsnyen par dka'/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/_seng ge ltar 
[\[228a.3\]]chos thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni sgrogs/_me'i phung po chen po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/_lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu 'bar zhing stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[228a.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/_don shin tu rnam par nges pa/_chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du byon pa/_'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pas sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs 
[\[228a.5\]]kyis chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[228a.6\]]dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du brlag par mdzad nas shin tu lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ste/_
[\[228a.7\]]dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi'am ci/_klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rgyas sras/_/'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis/_/zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar gsal/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa/_/lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur/_/thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te/_/'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 
[\[228b.2\]]'gyed par mdzad/_/tshangs pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de/_/tshangs pa'i mdun na gnas te mngon mdzes ltar/_/bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa/_/sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal/_/brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du/_/gnas nas 
[\[228b.3\]]gzi brjid yangs pas mdzes pa ltar/_/mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug_/thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal/_/gling bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa/_/'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzes pa ltar/_/'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa rab mdzad cing /_/thugs 
[\[228b.4\]]rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes/_/mkha' la nyi ma lam me thal le ba/_/nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar/_/nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal/_/dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar/_/shin tu rnam dag 
[\[228b.5\]]'gro ba kun la gsal/_/rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes/_/ji ltar ri bo'i zom la me 'bar ba/_/mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar/_/gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni/_/drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal//_
[\[228b.6\]]seng ge ri sul brten pa'i sgra sgrog cing /_/sa la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar/_/mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing /_/pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad/_/nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar/_/nor bu thams cad zil mnan 
[\[228b.7\]]lam me ltar/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_/'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lam mer bzhugs/_/'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur/_/bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang /_/yon tan 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/mi yi dpa' bo 'gro la lam me ba/_/mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong /_/gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel/_/rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig 
[\[229a.2\]]rten sgron/_/grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' la/_/bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dir thob des/_/'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad 
[\[229a.3\]]pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/_mig gnyis mi 'dzums par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lta/_chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod/_zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang /_mthong bar dka' ba dang /_khong du chud par dka' ba dang /_brtag par mi nus pa dang 
[\[229a.4\]]rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_phra ba la ni 'jug_/sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/_sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa 
[\[229a.5\]]dang mnyam pa la ni yang dag par lta/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 
[\[229a.6\]]gnas med pa nam mkha' spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/_chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rtag pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_
[\[229a.7\]]ther zug pa la ni 'jug_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'jug_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug pa med pa ni rjes su dran par 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]byed/_chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/_de zla ba gsum 
[\[229b.2\]]'das nas chos gos byas te/_chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_bya 
[\[229b.3\]]rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig 
[\[229b.4\]]tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la 
[\[229b.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byam kun tu yang /_/'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung /_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing /_/yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi/_/bde gshegs tshul dang 
[\[229b.6\]]'thun pas mchod bgyis te/_/thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas/_/de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng rjod cing /_/yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi/_/byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na/_/khyod kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas 
[\[229b.7\]]su/_/sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad/_/'dren pa khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/_/bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs/_/shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs/_/des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang dang 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mngon shes mchog la mkhas/_/dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs/_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs/_/mnyam med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen/_/spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang /_/
[\[230a.2\]]tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba/_/de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong /_/gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang /_/gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las/_/'gro bas legs par bgyis dang nongs 
[\[230a.3\]]bgyis mkhyen/_/'gro la phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang /_/da ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang /_/gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin/_/bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen/_/dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[230a.4\]]dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang /_/drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad/_/rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang /_/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang /_/der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba/_/de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas 
[\[230a.5\]]mkhyen/_/dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi/_/ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug_/chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'/_/phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho khyod la/_/khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis ga la lhag_/skar ma rnams kyis nam 
[\[230a.6\]]mkhar spras pa ltar/_/mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa/_/mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi/_/lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid/_/tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams/_/khyod kyi spyan snga 
[\[230a.7\]]de dag mdzes ma lags/_/khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'/_/dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil par gnas/_/lhun po'i rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags/_/bsod nams rgya chen byung ba lam mer bzhugs/_/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing /_/khyod 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes/_/'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa/_/spyan ni ud pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi/_/zla nya dri med mkha' la ji lta ba/_/rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste/_/lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba/_/zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi yi 
[\[230b.2\]]mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngang pa rma bya [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal gyi stabs/_/glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis/_/sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa/_/stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum la mdzes/_/sen 
[\[230b.3\]]mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras/_/bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha dang rig cing sleb/_/sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas/_/sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/_/zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i/_/mi rnams 
[\[230b.4\]]gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi/_/chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po/_/chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba/_/chos kyi spyad pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa/_/'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog_/tshul khrims gzhu dang shes 
[\[230b.5\]]rab thabs kyi mnga'/_/de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa/_/nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par 'gyur/_/rgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol/_/grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grel/_/bde gshegs gang gi zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba/_/bde ba 
[\[230b.6\]]rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston/_/gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing /_/'bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/_/gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de/_/thugs rjes brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/_/chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal/_/
[\[230b.7\]]thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas/_/bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags des/_/'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya shog_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du 
[\[231a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad 
[\[231a.3\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/yul 'khor skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[231a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur/_gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob/_myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/_spobs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob/_snang ba 'thob/_thams 
[\[231a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_yid gnyis spong ba dang /_som nyi spong ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa 'thob/_sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /_ldem 
[\[231a.6\]]po dag yang dag pa dang /_sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob pa dang /_zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang /_chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe 
[\[231a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa/_/yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang /_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa/_/mi mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa/_/khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags/_/byang chub spyod mchog dri med deng bdag gsungs/_/gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi/_/ye shes mi zad ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis skye bo'i dogs 
[\[231b.2\]]pa gcod 'gyur ba/_/shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag_/'khor bar bskal ba bye ba mang por ni/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang /_/skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cing /_/de dag don dge ston par 'gyur ba dang /_/dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 
[\[231b.3\]]'khor dang /_/tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang /_/sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang /_/byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol/_/bdud 'joms mdzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba bo/_/sred pa skems pa rnam grol reg mdzad pas/_/chos kyi tshul yang bskyud par 
[\[231b.4\]]mi 'gyur bar/_/sems can rin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol/_/gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum tshogs/_/snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa/_/bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul legs 
[\[231b.5\]]par bstan du gsol/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa/_/chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis/_/gtso bo bdud rtsi'i ro yis tshim par mdzod/_/byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis/_/chos 
[\[231b.6\]]la 'dun pa bzlog pa mi rigs te/_/'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags/_/rin chen dam pa bsgrag pa'i dus la bab/_/thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis/_/bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen/_/rgyal ba co 'dri ma lags don du gnyer/_/spyod pa dam 
[\[231b.7\]]pa legs par bshad du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yul 'khor skyong khyod legs so/_/yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_yul 'khor skyong 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/_/yul 
[\[232a.2\]]'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_/tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yul 'khor skyong 
[\[232a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob [(]po/[,]bo/[) ]/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /_stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_
[\[232a.4\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa/_/byang chub lam 
[\[232a.5\]]las mi ldog yid ldan pa/_/g.yo med tha ba med cing sgyu med pa/_/ye shes mtha' yas ldan la de dag yod/_/skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba/_/sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/_/srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba sgrol ba'i phyir/_/de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag 
[\[232a.6\]]sbyor/_/des pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/_/bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lta/_/'di dag thams cad bdag gis dgrol lo zhes/_/gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o/_/stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud/_/bdag yod ma yin sems can yod 
[\[232a.7\]]ma yin/_/'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la/_/byis pa mi mkhas 'di la rnam par rmongs/_/mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig smras pa/_/de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas/_/dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzungs thob pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang /_/chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/_yul 
[\[232b.2\]]'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba/_/gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis 
[\[232b.3\]]ni rtag tu thob/_/nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel/_/de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin/_/byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/_/de dag 'dren pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston/_/
[\[232b.4\]]de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la sten pa ma yin te/_/tshig byed bdag nyid me ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong /_/dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas/_/de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung /_/de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid 
[\[232b.5\]]dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[232b.6\]]'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong rjes su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 
[\[232b.7\]]'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]byed pa'i chos so/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun du de dag mthong /_/byang chub dam pa mchog tshol tshe na sems can 
[\[233a.2\]]dgrol ba'i phyir/_dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod/_/'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyang nyan/_/thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor/_/dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can 
[\[233a.3\]]med pa dang /_/'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyi de mi skyed/_/de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med/_/slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa mthong na sems ni rab tu dga'/_/grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang /_/thams cad gtong zhing de yi 
[\[233a.4\]]sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med/_/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang /_bkur 
[\[233a.5\]]sti la blta bar mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[233a.6\]]'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta/_/yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul/_/de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed/_bse 
[\[233a.7\]]ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri ma bral/_/de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma thob yid zhum med/_/'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs/_/sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gnas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin/_/lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te/_/bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor/_lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo 
[\[233b.2\]]ba med/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[233b.3\]]kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par 
[\[233b.4\]]byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 
[\[233b.5\]]'di skad ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing /_/tshul khrims dri med nor bur rin chen 'dra ba srung /_/de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems/_/tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor/_/de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas 
[\[233b.6\]]par byed/_/de dag bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med/_/gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang brtsig pa 'dra bar mthong /_/'di la skyes bu bud med bdag gi med par mthong /_/'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med/_/bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas 
[\[233b.7\]]rab tu sbyor/_thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed/_bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer/_/skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis gzir gyur pa/_/'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i brtson ra 'dir bltas nas/_/zhi ba dam pa mchog gi 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]chos kyi gru sbyar te/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed/_/'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyams pas skyabs mgon dang /_/dpung gnyen byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis/_/bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol 
[\[234a.2\]]zhes/_/de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab/_/yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bde 'gro thob ste/_de yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang /_bla ma la sri zhu byed de/_
[\[234a.3\]]de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsten pa dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/_de yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang /_spobs pa thob ste/_de yang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag ni cang 
[\[234a.4\]]shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o/_/'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par byed/_de dag rtag tu khor mor rnyed pa don gnyer min/_/chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin/_/zab mo'i chos la 
[\[234a.5\]]mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral/_/rtag tu khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed/_/de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor/_/bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya cher byed/_/grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba 
[\[234a.6\]]gtso bor 'gyur/_/lha mi rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tu sems can 'dzud/_/dge ba bcu po dag la'ang yang dag sbyor bar byed/_/sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas de dag dgar 'gyur te/_/de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye bar gyur/_/
[\[234a.7\]]de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas/_/sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_khong khro 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su spangs te dgon par gnas pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang /_nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing 
[\[234b.2\]]chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi tshol ba ste/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[234b.3\]]'dod pa na/_/tha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med/_/de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin/_/g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing spros sems med/_/khyim gyi blo gros ya nga mya ngan rtsa/_/skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba/_/spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas/_/thar 
[\[234b.4\]]pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed/_/dgon pa bas mtha'i rnams pa bstan pas na/_/shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rton zhing /_/lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la/_/seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal/_/byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba na/_/ngan ngon tsam gyis 
[\[234b.5\]]chog par 'dzin byed cing /_/rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni/_/'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no/_/dper na bse ltar gcig bu gnas byed cing /_/seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa yod ma yin/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton/_/de ni mchod pas khengs 
[\[234b.6\]]par 'gyur ba med/_/g.yang sar ltung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/_/rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bad par byed/_/gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na/_/bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur/_/mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na/_/'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab 
[\[234b.7\]]bstan tshig smra zhing /_/sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog sems med/_/rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos/_/'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog_/yangs pa'i blo can zhi dang dul la dga'/_/de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi'i ro yis 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]mgu/_/ci nas byang chub lam ni sgrub byed cing /_/de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong /_/gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na/_/yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bltas nas/_/gang zhig don du gnyer de 
[\[235a.2\]]dgar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig byang chub 'di la ma mos pa/_/blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang skyed/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /_yul 'khor 
[\[235a.3\]]skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la sten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /_yul 'khor skyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang /_yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[235a.4\]]rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la/_/de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin/_/de dag byas 
[\[235a.5\]]pa mi gzo g.yon can te/_/rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs/_/rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste/_/de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'/_/kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas kyang /_/'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smra/_/de dag phan tshun sdang bar 
[\[235a.6\]]sems pa ste/_/glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin/_/de dag zhing gi las dang tshong la dga'/_/de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring /_/phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i/_/dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba/_/de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang /_/phrag 
[\[235a.7\]]dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed/_/byang chub lam las rtag par shin du ring /_/'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring /_/'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni/_/de dag 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 
[\[235b.2\]]'khor skyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 
[\[235b.3\]]de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ma dad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems/_/de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro/_/bzod ldan rtag brtson dge 
[\[235b.4\]]slong mthong nas ni/_/gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshe dbyug pa rdeg_/pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrag dog skye/_/de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin/_/glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can/_/su la 'khrul yod gang la gleng bya snyam/_/de dag nga yi bstan pa 'di las ring /_/
[\[235b.5\]]de dag yon tan dngang zhing ngan song gzhol/_/de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni/_/ngan song shin tu mi bzad 'bar bar 'gro/_/de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang /_/chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'di thos nas/_/rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor/_/ngan 'gror 
[\[235b.6\]]skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/_/bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/_/da ltar dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la/_/gal te thar 'dod bag med spong bar gyis/_/yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas 
[\[235b.7\]]bsten par mi bya ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang /_yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba ste/_yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba'o/_/de nas 
[\[236a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing /_/gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa/_/de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel/_/dper na mkha' las zla ba yar ngo bzhin/_/dmigs 
[\[236a.3\]]par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang /_/bdag dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag_/de dag dug phyis bzhin du rtag tu spong /_/gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer/_/gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos/_/'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thung spong ba/_/de dag dper na ngan 
[\[236a.4\]]skyugs rdzab bzhin spong /_/gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/_/zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags/_/rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa/_/de dag rnams dang 'dris par mi bya ste/_/de dag me yi 'obs bzhin spang bar bya/_/gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar 
[\[236a.5\]]bya ba dang /_/'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang /_/de ltar sems can don yang byed 'dod pa/_/des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya/_/gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod/_/de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang /_/grags dang mtshang 'dru phrag dog nga spangs 
[\[236a.6\]]te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/_/yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[236a.7\]]sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /_yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang /_yul 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]'khor skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang /_/bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[236b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin gyur zhing /_/'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba/_/de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na/_/des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed/_ya nga bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol/_/
[\[236b.3\]]shes pa ma dag rtag tu 'dun cing 'dod/_/gang zhig rtag tu nga rgyal khengs gyur la/_/bla ma 'phags pa'i skye bo mi 'dud cing /_/sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min la/_/chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/_/bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos/_/sdig pa'i blo can 
[\[236b.4\]]ngan song gsum phyogs pa/_/de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/_/dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/_/gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing /_/mi yi 
[\[236b.5\]]dpa' bo sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa/_/de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te/_/byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya//_//bam po gnyis pa/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol 
[\[236b.6\]]la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis bsgom pa la sbyor ba dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /_kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_ye shes dang bral ba dang /_bag med pa la sten par 
[\[236b.7\]]byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang /_phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/_yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing /_/rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom/_/ltar gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te/_/glang po lus ring 'dam du song ba bzhin/_/khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang ldan pa dang /_/
[\[237a.2\]]gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems/_/ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa/_/mi rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'di dag dang /_/skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pa/_/brnyas par byed dang rlom sems 
[\[237a.3\]]bor nas ni/_/byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod byas te/_/bde ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas/_/sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang /_/brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/pha rol phyin drug sa 
[\[237a.4\]]dang yon tan dang /_/stobs dang dbang po dag dang shis la sbyor/_/yon tan kun dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas/_/rga ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab sngon spyad tshe/_/sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du/_/sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag 
[\[237a.5\]]tu spyad/_/gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur/_/bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' ste/_/byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par sbyangs/_/brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur/_/skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o/_/srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyams 
[\[237a.6\]]pas/_/sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni/_/sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed/_/'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs/_/bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing /_/rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug_/phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor sa dang /_/grong khyer nor dang 'bru 
[\[237a.7\]]rnams mang po btang /_/me tog 'bras bu chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i/_/nags su thub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur/_/ka ling rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad/_/de tshe nga ni ldang ba'i yid ma gyur/_/nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i/_/thub pas bla ma rgas pa gso ba na/_/
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]mi yi dbang pos sra ba'i mdas bsnun kyang /_/yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur/_/legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yang sa nas/_/lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs par gyur/_/ngas ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir/_/lus dang srog la bltas par ma gyur to/_/stag mo 
[\[237b.2\]]bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir/_/lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas/_/nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyi/_/skyes chen brtson 'grus brten pa legs shes bsgrags/_/gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na/_/sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe/_/rin chen ched 
[\[237b.3\]]du rgya mtsho bskams nas ni/_/nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas/_/rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes byar gyur te/_/rjod pa grags shing nga ni spyod pa'i tshe/_/nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya/_/bsad par byas pa myur du thar bar byas/_/dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong 
[\[237b.4\]]nas/_/nga yis phangs pa'i lus ni btang byas te/_/nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas/_/de tshe nga ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur/_/nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_/skyabs su 'ongs pa'i phug ron mthong nas ni/_/rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te/_/rang lus ngas 
[\[237b.5\]]btang 'jigs pas phongs ma btang /_/rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe/_/sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni/_/mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang /_/srog btang nas ni de dag gzhan la byin/_/'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na/_/rgyal bu mche ba 
[\[237b.6\]]bzang zhes bya gyur tshe/_/chung ma ma dri khyo las mi 'phyo ba/_/bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang /_/gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes byar gyur tshe/_/nga sngon lo ni stong du tshad bar yang /_/bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas/_/nor dang dpal yang sngan chad ngas btang ngo /_/rgyal 
[\[237b.7\]]bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe/_/nga yis rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten mdun/_/mchog tu gus pas lus la me btang ste/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas/_/nga ni rgyal po zla 'od gyur pa'i tshe/_/mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni/_/de yis nga yi mgo bo 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bslangs pa na/_/de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin/_/nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes byar gyur tshe/_/grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo/_/thams cad du yang rgya che sman gyi rnams/_/de dag sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go_/srid pa rnams la spyod pa gang 
[\[238a.2\]]gi tshe/_/nga sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa na/_/bud med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis/_/lus brgyan stong dag ngas ni btang ba byas/_/gang tshe nga sngon mi yi rgyal po ni/_/rin chen gtsug phud gyur tshe me tog dang /_/spos mchog rnams dang gser gyis brgyan pa yi/_/
[\[238a.3\]]cod pan dpal ldan dam pa ngas btang ngo /_/nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur pa'i tshe/_/shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang /_/pad ma'i 'dab mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i/_/lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo /_/ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na/_/snying rje med cing 
[\[238a.4\]]mi bzad rab gtum pa'i/_/srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas/_/rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur/_/gang tshe mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes byar gyur pa na/_/byis pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/_/srin mo dag la na chung 'du shes pa/_/tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar 
[\[238a.5\]]bar byas/_/gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyur pa na/_/lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa'i/_/bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa la ni rab tu byung /_/sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na/_/dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi/_/rgyal 
[\[238a.6\]]por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na/_/sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang /_/rgyal po ud pal mig ces byar gyur tshe/_/pad ma sngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig_/yid du 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa/_/'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas/_/sman pa'i rgyal po skra 'drar gyur 
[\[238a.7\]]pa'i tshe/_/sdug dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni/_/bud med cha byad gzugs la blo nyams pa/_/ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar bar byas/_/sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa ni/_/nad kyis btab pa'i nad pa'i mi mthong nas/_/nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te/_/mi 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas/_/rgyal po me tog bzang zhes byar gyur tshe/_/nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni/_/nad kyis ring par gyur la rkang byin te/_/ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo /_/rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe/_/rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad 
[\[238b.2\]]ngas btang zhing /_/phangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste/_/phongs par gyur pa'i mi ni thar bar byas/_/rgyal po phyogs kyi tog du gyur pa'i tshe/_/byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/_/'khor lo'i mtshan can pad ma lta bu yi/_/lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin/_/
[\[238b.3\]]rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe/_/snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod do/_/skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi/_/gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas/_/rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan gyur tshe/_/'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla/_/dga' zhing mgu ba'i 
[\[238b.4\]]yid kyis bcad nas ni/_/rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no/_/bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byar gyur tshe/_/bud med bkres skom nyam thag ngas mthong nas/_/gser ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi/_/nu ma snying du sdug pa gnyi ga btang /_/rgyal po dpal grags zhes byar 
[\[238b.5\]]gyur pa na/_/shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang /_/rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bzhon/_/gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma gtang /_/rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral/_/rin chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung /_/'on 
[\[238b.6\]]kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do/_/srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe/_/srog sbur dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur dogs nas/_/lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang ba byas/_/de tshe nga yi sems ni g.yo ba med/_/spyad pa spyod tshe bya sreg gyur pa na/_/rgan la bsnyen bkur bya 
[\[238b.7\]]bar rtag dga' ste/_/nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'/_/nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med/_/skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni/_/snying rje bskyed pa byas nas lus btang ste/_/gdol ba'i mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni/_/spre'ur gyur ngas ni mi de ma 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]btang ngo /_/rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni/_/glang po bla ma rgan dran lus bskams te/_/shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos/_/de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur/_/bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur/_/nga yis zhag bdun bar du bsrungs pa'i 
[\[239a.2\]]mi/_/de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang /_/ngas ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med/_/kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur/_/byang chub mchod rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol/_/dug dang bcas pa'i mda' yis bsnun kyang ni/_/mche ba dam pa byin gyi khros pa med/_/dum bu'i gling du 
[\[239a.3\]]nags tshal spyod yul ba/_/sreg pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas gyur tshe/_/mthong ba tsam gyis me ni zhi gyur nas/_/lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gyur tshe gang gA'i rlabs shugs kyis/_/khyer ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa/_/de yis 
[\[239a.4\]]gsod pa nga gan khrid de 'ongs/_/'on kyang de la nga ni yid ma khros/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus su son ste mgon med pa/_/tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas nas/_/bkres pa de dag rnams kyis bsad gyur tshe/_/ru sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan/_/nga ni byang chub spyad 
[\[239a.5\]]pa spyod pa na/_/sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe/_/sems can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste/_/srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur/_/srog chags des par gang tshe gyur pa na/_/nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su/_/lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur 
[\[239a.6\]]byas te/_/sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe/_/mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rjer ldan/_/mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de/_/de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas/_/dung dang ba mo lta bu'i 
[\[239a.7\]]rta rgyal du/_/nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe/_/srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams/_/nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral/_/'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe/_/'dab chags kun [{]lar [}]ni nga gyur tshe/_/'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]bud med dbang du nga ni song ma gyur/_/gel ba'i nags gnas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe/_/legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan/_/thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres phongs pa/_/de yi ched du ngas ni lus kyang btang /_/sdong po me tog 'bras rgyas ne tso'i tshe/_/sdong po skams 
[\[239b.2\]]kyang ngas ni de ma btang /_/de tshe brgya byin byas gzos nga mthong nas/_/sdong po de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas/_/nga ni spra yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/_/mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom ste/_/spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas/_/rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas 
[\[239b.3\]]bton to/_/nga sngon ne tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir/_/sA lu blangs tshe mi yis bzung nas ni/_/ne tso ci phyir nga yi sA lu len/_/lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam/_/ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol/_/bdag ni rku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/_/pha ma rgan rgon 
[\[239b.4\]]gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir/_/de la snying rjes bdag gis sA lu blangs/_/gang tshe thog mas sa bon 'debs pa'i tshe/_/'gro ba kun la cha shas sbyin no zhes/_/de skad tshig smras de ni bdag thos te/_/des na bdag ni rku bar gzhar mi 'gyur/_/ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar 
[\[239b.5\]]khyer/_/srid zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na'ang dkon/_/khyod ni mi yi nang 'dir dud 'gro yin/_/legs so khyod ni dul zhing yang dag bsdams/_/byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na/_/sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams/_/spyad pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang /_/nga yi 
[\[239b.6\]]yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med/_/nang gi dag gam 'on te phyir yang rung /_/nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med/_/tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang /_/bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyad do/_/sha dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag_/de dag rang gi 
[\[239b.7\]]lus las sbyin pa byas/_/bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe/_/ngas ni de tshe lus ni skams par byas/_/gang la sbyar na rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi/_/sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/_/sbyangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te/_/sngon spyod tshe na nga ni rtag tu 'jug_/spyod pa'i 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]tshe na nga yis gang bsten pa/_/brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang /_/spyod pa 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams/_/tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni/_/bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur/_/de dag zas dang 'khrig pa 
[\[240a.2\]]lhur len cing /_/rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang /_/bstan pa sun 'byin byed cing yon tan nyams/_/zhi ba'i chos ni thos par gyur pa na/_/'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes zer/_/nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor 
[\[240a.3\]]gyur/_/mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin/_/de yis 'di ni rnam pa ji ltar yang /_/sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas/_/pha rol las kyang rgan par gyur de yi/_/bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chung /_/des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyi/_/'di la ma 'jug 
[\[240a.4\]]'di ni nor ba yin/_/gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang /_/rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa/_/tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la/_/gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/_/gal te theg pa chen po yod na ni/_/'di la bdag dang sems can 
[\[240a.5\]]shing skyes med/_/gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa/_/de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas/_/rang gi blo yis rang bzor byed pa ste/_/dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni/_/tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 
[\[240a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang /_/khwa ltar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing /_/phrag dog nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi/_/dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung /_/lag pa dang ni rkang pa rdob byed cing /_/chos gos grwa rnams kyang ni skyog par byed/_/
[\[240a.7\]]chos gos thogs shing chad dang rgyags myos nas/_/grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu/_/de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni/_/khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed/_/bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas/_/de dag rtag tu phrin yig khyer bar byed/_/de dag ba 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]lang rta dang bong bu dang /_/de dag phyugs dang bran pho bran mo srel/_/zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la/_/brtson yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin/_/de dag 'phags min tshig kyang mi smra med/_/bya ba ma yin pa yang gang yang med/_/de dag rnams la mchod rten nor 
[\[240b.2\]]dang ni/_/dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag nor de mtshungs/_/dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni/_/de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed de/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa slu ba zhugs nas ni/_/bud med 'jigs byed mi bzad rab ces rjod/_/rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa 
[\[240b.3\]]ltar/_/khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de ltar min/_/khyim pa mtshungs par de dag chung ma dang /_/bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par 'gyur/_/gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang /_/lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur ba/_/de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing /_/nyon 
[\[240b.4\]]mongs dbang 'gro rtag tu 'phags pa min/_/'dod pa 'di dag bsten bya ma yin te/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dmyal bar ltung byed ces/_/de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing /_/de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min/_/ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba/_/de dag slob ma tshogs kyang 
[\[240b.5\]]rab ma dul/_/kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la/_/de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed/_/bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te/_/de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin/_/'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas/_/rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang 
[\[240b.6\]]bskor/_/de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni/_/bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed kyi/_/slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni/_/rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra/_/de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang /_/lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug_/rtag tu 
[\[240b.7\]]'phags min mi dag kha cig kyang /_/'ongs zhing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur/_/lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams/_/de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson/_/de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min/_/de dag spangs pa dur khrod shing dang mtshungs/_/de dag so 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]sor thar dang bslab pa dang /_/'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur/_/de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste/_/lcags kyo btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra/_/de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni/_/sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/_/
[\[241a.2\]]nyon mongs me yis rtag tu rab gdungs la/_/de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/_/de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang /_/bslabs dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni/_/rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te/_/de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar 
[\[241a.3\]]'gyur/_/de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing /_/rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'/_/nye du gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste/_/de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed/_/bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/_/rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las 
[\[241a.4\]]la brtson/_/gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/_/de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma dul ba/_/nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/_/bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/_/dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes 'thun pa/_/gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/_/
[\[241a.5\]]gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/_/chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la mngon brtson pa/_/dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/_/de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do/_/'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste/_/'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa'i yin/_/'di ni nga yi dga' bar 
[\[241a.6\]]byed pa'i yin/_/khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song /_/'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/_/mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/_/'di na rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/_/'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song /_/de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/_/nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin 
[\[241a.7\]]te/_/de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur zhing /_/'tshog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur/_/phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag_/kun tu smad par byas par gyur nas ni/_/de dag nga yi tshig ni dran gyur te/_/bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe gnas/_/kyi 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]hud rnyed pas zil gnon yon tan sdang /_/dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag_/ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur/_/phyis dus tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dag_/rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/_/de dag 
[\[241b.2\]]grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams/_/spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par gyur/_/'byed dang zur zer thab mo dga' ba dang /_/yon tan nyams la rtag tu bsti stang byed/_/de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te/_/de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur/_/
[\[241b.3\]]'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba/_/'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang /_/rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas subs pa dang /_/pad ma'i rdzing bu yongs su skams pa dang /_/
[\[241b.4\]]rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar/_/phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos/_/rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tshe/_/dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba/_/de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin/_/spyod pa 'di la sten 
[\[241b.5\]]par dga' ba rnams/_/de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring /_/'di nas shi 'phos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gro ba dang /_/dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas/_/lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/_/mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/ci ste de yis 
[\[241b.6\]]mi yi lus rnyed kyang /_/rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag sten pa/_/long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur/_/lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[241b.7\]]zhig ya nga'i spyod pa sten pa ni/_/de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur te/_/de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni rtag tu sma 'bab par yang 'gyur/_/de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs/_/mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun/_/bkres dang skom 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs/_/yang na de ni rtag par rab tu brnyas/_/sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni/_/des pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod 'or la/_/legs par spyod la rtag tu bsten par gyis/_/'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re/_/
[\[242a.2\]]gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshogs dang /_/bslab dang sbyangs pa'i chos la dga' gyur pa/_/gnyen dang rnyed dang grags rjod spang byos la/_/de ltar rtag tu mngon par brtson par gyis/_/'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang /_/sdug pa 
[\[242a.3\]]kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing /_/'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtog la/_/pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/_/rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis/_/ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas par/_/de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams mi bya/_/gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste 
[\[242a.4\]]dang po'o//_//yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal cher la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/_g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/_mi shes pa 
[\[242a.5\]]dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la/_zang zing la dga' bar 'gyur zhing chags pa mang ba dang /_khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /_g.yo dang ldan pa dang /_bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_nye du lhur len par 'gyur/_phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas 
[\[242a.6\]]rnyed pa sgrub par 'gyur/_rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/_de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang /_dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes 
[\[242a.7\]]par 'gyur/_snyam du bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur/_ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/_snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/_gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang /_sbyor ba nyams pa dang /_mi shes pa dang /_le lo can dang /_phan tshun mi 'thun pa'i 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]chos bgro ba byed pa dang ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang /_rang dgar byed pa dang /_shar gnyer ba dam pa dang /_gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang /_rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang bgro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/_yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang /_chos 
[\[242b.2\]]mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/_mi rigs pa'i spyod pas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag la nyes pa bshags pa yang med par 'gyur na ye 
[\[242b.3\]]shes mngon par rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/_yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi smra na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig 
[\[242b.4\]]de dag la ni bde 'gro yang ring na byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /_mtha' khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang /_dbul ba'i khyim du skye ba dang /_rigs dma' 
[\[242b.5\]]bar skye ba dang /_mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang /_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /_nad mang ba dang /_ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/_yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul 'khor 
[\[242b.6\]]skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba la byang chub ces nga mi smra'o/_/tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa 
[\[242b.7\]]zhes nga mi smra'o/_/shes rab 'chal pa la the tshom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs thob pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/yang dag pa'i yon tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la bde 'gro 'thob ces nga mi smra'o/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/tshod 
[\[243a.2\]]mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o/_/yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de dag la smad pa ltar ston pa drug la de ltar nga mi smod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni gzhan smra la gzhan du byed 
[\[243a.3\]]pa'o/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can/_/ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che/_/nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon 
[\[243a.4\]]mongs bcas/_/de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring /_/chags pas zil gyis non na le lo 'phel/_/le los zil gyis non na dad pa nyams/_/dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams/_/tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur na bzang 'gro nyams/_/dbul por gyur pas rab 
[\[243a.5\]]tu byung gyur te/_/mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar gyur/_/de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas su/_/gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs/_/rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro/_/der song nas kyang gos dang nye du tshol/_/mngon shes rig dang spobs pa
