[\[243a.6\]]phun sum tshogs/_/bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin/_rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa/_/mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang /_/dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang /_/mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin/_/de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos/_/
[\[243a.7\]]bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams/_/g.yang sa chen po mi bzad ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas bskal ba bye bar thar pa med/_/gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na/_/de phyir lhas byin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob/_/rnam par 'thor rlung gis ni bya ltung ltar/_/chags pas kyang ni de ltar 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]mi rigs so/_/bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags/_/tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams/_/byang chub sems kyis ye shes gang ma thob/_/de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin/_/byang chub don gnyer sangs rgyas chos tshol ba/_/dper na thar pa de 
[\[243b.2\]]bzhin mi gnas so/_/de ni rnyong gis spre'u la dam byas ltar/_/nga rgyal zil non byang chub de 'dra'o/_/byang chub don du gnyer bas chos tshig phyir/_/nga yis rang gi phangs pa'i srog kyang btang /_/chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa/_/don med gyur nas bstan las ltung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[243b.3\]]ngas ni sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir/_/g.yang sa chen po me lce 'bar bar mchongs/_/de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa/_/thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan gnas/_/bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la/_/de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyed na/_/chos min 
[\[243b.4\]]'dod la byang chub ga la yod/_/dper na long ba lam gsal med dang mtshungs/_/yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_dpag tu med pa/_tshad med par gyur pa 
[\[243b.5\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don 
[\[243b.6\]]grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do/_/yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na grong khyer 
[\[243b.7\]]nyi khri dang /_khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do/_/yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/_lho byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rab 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]rim pa bdun dang /_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pas mdzes par byas pa yod do/_/de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes 
[\[244a.2\]]pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur te/_yul 'khor 
[\[244a.3\]]skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad yi rangs par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 
[\[244a.4\]]des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis 
[\[244a.5\]]shig_/mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/gzhon nu mi rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/_tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/_de'i tshe 
[\[244a.6\]]lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/gzhon nu bag med par ni gyur ta re/_/bag med dbang du song bar gyur ta re/_/bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing /_/bde gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang dmad/_/nges pa gang 
[\[244a.7\]]dag 'di na bag yod cing /_/legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang /_/sems can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan/_/de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang /_/'di ni da ltar dag dang gang ma byon/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dge ba rnams kyis 'phags/_/bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas/_/bza' dang btung dang gos dang kha zas dang /_/gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan/_/bskal pa bye bar de dag rnams kyis btang /_/byang chub dam pa 'di ni don du gnyer/_/rkang pa lag pa 
[\[244b.2\]]de bzhin rna dang sna/_/slong ba rnams la rab tu bgos byin na/_/byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas/_/de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur/_/rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang /_/nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te/_/'dus byas gar 
[\[244b.3\]]la lta dang sgyu ma 'dras/_/'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis/_/srog ni brtan pa med de rtag tu g.yo/_/'jim pa'i bum pa lta bur 'jig pa can/_/brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu ther zug min/_/gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yin/_/ngan 'gror ltung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni/_/
[\[244b.4\]]pha dang ma yang 'dzin par byed pa med/_/mi yis dge dang mi dge gang byas pa/_/de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni/_/don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/_/khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med/_/don med nyid 
[\[244b.5\]]du ngal ba bsten par gyur/_/da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chub zhi/_/mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/_/rkang dang sha dang pags pa de bskams kyang /_/de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/_/zhi ba'i chos thos 
[\[244b.6\]]pa yang shin tu dka'/_/bsgrim par byas te bdud kyi phyogs bsal na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/_/bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs bsten cig_/sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/_/de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed/_/lam 
[\[244b.7\]]gol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed/_/brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byos te/_/lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas/_/rdo rje lta bu snying gi bsam gtan par/_/sangs rgyas lam 'di nyid la gnas par gyis/_/sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa/_/kun kyang go 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]'phang dam pa bla med pa/_/tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul dgon par dga'/_/khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs/_/dgon par gnas la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/_/pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen/_/skye bo snying du sdug pa kun spongs la/_/lus dang srog la sred par 
[\[245a.2\]]ma byed par/_/bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de ni bzung ste/_lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/_nam yang rgod par ma gyur/_rtses par ma gyur/_
[\[245a.3\]]dga' ba byed par ma gyur/_yongs su spyad par ma gyur/_nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song /_nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/_nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/_rgyal srid dang /_nor dang /_khyim dang /_grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/_de 
[\[245a.4\]]ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig pur sems shing gnas par gyur to/_/nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /_sdug pa dang 'bral ba dang /_byis pa 'drid pa 
[\[245a.5\]]dang /_'khor ba la dga' ba ro bro ba med pa dang /_rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang /_srid pa la mngon par dga' bas chog mi shes pa dang /_so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi 'thun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyis bdag gis cang mi smra 
[\[245a.6\]]bar 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/_bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pu gnas par gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir sa phyogs shin tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces 
[\[245a.7\]]bya ba byas te/_lho dang byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bres pa/_mu tig gi dra ba dang /_rin po che'i srog shing dang /_bla re dang ldan pa rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/_/lam srang thams cad kyi sgor 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so/_/rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sprel to/_/rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/_/de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo 
[\[245b.2\]]sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/_gar mkhas pa/[ (]lang tso [,]lang tsho [)]dar la bab pa/_skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i 'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin 
[\[245b.3\]]mtshan du glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig_/sems can gang la yang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra shig ces bsgo'o/_/lam srang 
[\[245b.4\]]de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/_btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/_gos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mal dang /_rgyab rten dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_
[\[245b.5\]]gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul sil ma dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_ba lang dang /_nor dang /_rgyan thams cad byin zhing skye bo thams cad kyis 
[\[245b.6\]]yongs su spyod pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir khyim khor yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa rin po che sna bdun mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so/_/de'i nang du khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[245b.7\]]zhig byas te/_der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so/_/de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/_me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo /_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel lo/_/gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so/_/rdzing 
[\[246a.2\]]de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo/_/me tog ud pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so/_/khor yug tu rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to/_/dus thams cad pa'i me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[246a.3\]]bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so/_/rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed de/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbrel cing thams cad du yang shing ta la'i phreng ba bye bas sbrel to/_/de dag kyang rlung gis 
[\[246a.4\]]bskyod cing rlung gis bsgul na 'di lta ste dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/gzhon nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dra bas bkab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/_khri 
[\[246a.5\]]thams cad kyi steng du yang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to/_/gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur 
[\[246a.6\]]to/_/khri thams cad kyi drung du yang pog por nas a ga rus bdugs shing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do/_/gser gyi lda ldi bres so/_/gser gyi pad ma rab tu sbyangs so/_/mu tig dang nor bu'i dra bas bres so/_/nor bu rin po che'i 'od 
[\[246a.7\]]kyis snang bar byas so/_/rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu sbyangs so/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la yang ba dan brgya brgya sbyangs so/_/skyed mos tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/_de dag gi 'od 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khrung khrung dang /_khu byug dang /_rma bya dang /_ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_ku na la dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_shang shang 
[\[246b.2\]]te'u rnams 'khod do/_/de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrogs na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par 
[\[246b.3\]]gyur to/_/de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nas nyi shu lon pa'i skyed dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do/_/thams cad bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/_thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang /_'tshog 
[\[246b.4\]]chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to/_/pha ma gnyis kyis de la bu mo bye ba byin no/_/nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang /_grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang /_rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba 
[\[246b.5\]]mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa/_glu mkhas pa/_rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/_gar mkhas pa/_rgod mkhas pa/_skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/_drang ba/_gzhon pa/_mnyen pa/_yan lag 'jam pa/_gsong por smra 
[\[246b.6\]]ba/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_tshul mkhas pa/_sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/_ha cang yang mi ring ba/_ha cang yang mi thung ba/_ha cang yang mi skem pa/_ha cang yang mi sbom pa/_ha cang yang mi dkar ba/_ha cang yang mi sngo ba/_kha nas me tog ud pa la'i 
[\[246b.7\]]bsung 'byung ba/_lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/_lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/_shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas so/_/glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed do/_/de de'i tshe 'di lta ste dper na gsang bar bya ba'i mi yis gshed ma mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du rgyal bu 
[\[247a.2\]]gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/_/grong khyer de la yang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to/_/lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas thar bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_
[\[247a.3\]]bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtogs par nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur te/_de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang /_dri'i mtshan ma dang /_ro'i mtshan ma dang /_reg 
[\[247a.4\]]gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/_/de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha gzhon nu ni mi rol to/_/dgyes par mi mdzad do/_/dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu 
[\[247a.5\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to/_/des las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la 
[\[247a.6\]]ltos shing smros/_/nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel/_/su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myar nga la smros/_/de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya/_/khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa/_/lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig_/
[\[247a.7\]]'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smos/_/brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/_/pad ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa/_/lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos/_/mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses/_/ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]lus dman sems shing 'dug_/de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan/_/glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes/_/khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig_/pad ma rnyis pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman/_/me tog 'bras 
[\[247b.2\]]bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal/_/sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra/_/soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin/_/dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis/_/khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/_/ud 
[\[247b.3\]]pa la dang pad ma dag gi tshal gyis gang /_/pad ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan/_/de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed/_/dang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang /_/ka la ping ka shang shang te'u dang ku na la/_/yid 'ong sgra ldan gangs nye spos 
[\[247b.4\]]ngad ldang 'dra ba/_/thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur/_/gzhal med khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug_/gser dang bai dUr+yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra/_/rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba/_/gser dril g.yer ka ta la'i phreng ba 
[\[247b.5\]]sgra snyan pa/_/zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra sgrogs pa/_/khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che/_/bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/_/dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog_/mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir/_/
[\[247b.6\]]rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis bu khyod dga' mi byed/_/gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba/_/bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis/_/khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug_/skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci/_/'dus byas 
[\[247b.7\]]yid byung 'dod pa'i longs spyod don mi gnyer/_/yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa/_/'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/_/thar pa don gnyer pa la smras pa yab gson cig_/lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis/_/
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags/_/nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang sar ltung byed pa/_/sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung /_/mi mkhas byis pa skye bo de dag bud med dga'/_/bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching 
[\[248a.2\]]ba g.yang sa che/_/rtag tu 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad/_/sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bsten/_/bud med 'di dag lpags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam/_/bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer/_/khrag dang gcin dang 
[\[248a.3\]]mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag_/gsal ba dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi/_/glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi/_/dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid/_/kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis/_/ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo 
[\[248a.4\]]lta bur nyon mongs 'khol/_/shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na/_/dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags/_/mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te/_/srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur/_/sems 
[\[248a.5\]]ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus/_/srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod/_/'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su/_/'di na ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin/_/rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang /_/gnyen gyi skye bo 
[\[248a.6\]]chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min/_/bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste/_/sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod/_/mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung /_/srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung /_/'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste 
[\[248a.7\]]cir mi rung /_/rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/_/lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul/_/'jig rten phan pa snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi/_/rgyal po bag med spyod 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]la byang chub yod ma lags/_/rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khol ba/_/de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog_/'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi/_/skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur/_/khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 
[\[248b.2\]]'dra/_/zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs/_/rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra'i lus/_/chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'/_/rab tu gsal gnas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang /_/'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas/_/
[\[248b.3\]]rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang /_/gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang /_/zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir/_/bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du sbyar/_/stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas/_/
[\[248b.4\]]legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi/_/ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi/_/long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i 'khri shing bskam par bgyi/_/rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas/_/de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drar 
[\[248b.5\]]mthong 'gyur/_/byams dang snying brtse snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin/_/sems can bde 'brug lhag mthong glog gi phreng ba dang /_/byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis/_/'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi/_/rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 
[\[248b.6\]]'dir mchis te/_/bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis/_/byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi/_/gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis/_/rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas/_/blo dang ldan pa su zhig 
[\[248b.7\]]'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/_/mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g.yang sar ltung /_/byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur/_/'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun zlog pa/_/rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus/_/lhun po'i rtse nas 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yi/_/bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min/_/rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud/_/yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol/_/gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas 
[\[249a.2\]]mchi bar 'gyur/_/yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/_/bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang /_/grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus/_/dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na/_/bdag ni ri dang nags khrod 
[\[249a.3\]]mchis te gnas par bgyi/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[249a.4\]]ste/_'greng ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'dug pa ste/_rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so/_/khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing bar snang la 
[\[249a.5\]]'gro ba dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod cing 'gro ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[249a.6\]]pa/_lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje bskyed nas ni/_/gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi/_/su yi yon tan brjod cing bar snang 'di las bzhud/_/tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas lha de dag gis 
[\[249a.7\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam/_/don grub blo zhes bya ste skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs/_/de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog_/
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stobs bcu bsam gtan pa/_/bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa/_bdag ni rgyal ba lta 'tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra/_/de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig_/ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba/_/
[\[249b.2\]]byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri/_/de nas lha de dag gis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_de yi gtsug tor de yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin/_/dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/_/
[\[249b.3\]]de yi mdzod spu mkha' la nyi ltar lham me ba/_/nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing g.yas su 'khyil/_/spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ud pa la sngon po 'dra/_/mi dbang seng ge'i 'gram pa rang byung bim pa'i sgros/_/sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 
[\[249b.4\]]'gyed/_/stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems/_/de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag_/bzhi bcu mnyam zhing thags bzang rmad byung legs par grub/_/rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi/_/de yi ljags ni 
[\[249b.5\]]rab yangs rang gi zhal gdong khebs/_/rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don/_/shin tu tshim byed 'brel cing gya gyu med pa ste/_/tshangs dbyangs shin tu snyan pa sil snyan stong 'dra ba/_/yid gnyis 'joms pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa/_/rgyal 
[\[249b.6\]]ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa/_/yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag 'thun/_/chos kyi phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa/_/sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lha klu nyams dga' ba/_/mi ci ka la ping ka khu byug ngur pa dang /_/rma bya ngang pa sgra snyan ku 
[\[249b.7\]]na la yi sgra/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra/_/ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa/_/rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba/_/skul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba spyod pa dgar 'gyur ba/_/gzhan gyi spyod 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dang 'thun pa zhus na tshim byed pa/_/chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di/_/ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum/_/dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho/_/phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing 
[\[250a.2\]]zlum/_/rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog_/ba spu g.yas su 'khyil cing gyen du re re skyes/_/lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra/_/rang byung e n+ya'i byin pa glang po'i sna 'dra'i brla/_/zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo'i mtshan/_/glang 
[\[250a.3\]]po'i dbang po'i 'gros stobs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stobs/_/khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stobs can dbang po'i mchod sdong rgyas/_/mkha' las me tog char bab me tog gdugs su gyur/_/gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dag de yi rmad byung chos/_/rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug 
[\[250a.4\]]bsngal dang /_/grags dang ma grags de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis/_/pad ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med/_/mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags 
[\[250a.5\]]pa thos shing chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[250a.6\]]de ci 'dra ba dang /_de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang /_de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_ji ltar 'khor ba ya nga ba dang phrad pa dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i 
[\[250a.7\]]skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang /_ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang /_ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa dmad pa dang /_ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun nag rmongs pa 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dang /_ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang /_ji ltar sems gdul dka' ba dang /_ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang /_ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang /_ji ltar reg pa yongs su ma shes te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang /_
[\[250b.2\]]ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang /_ji ltar srid pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang /_ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung bar dka' ba dang /_ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa'i 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /_ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun gcad dka' ba dang /_ji ltar dga' ba 
[\[250b.3\]]rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang /_ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang /_ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi srung ba dang /_ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang /_ji ltar srid par mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan 
[\[250b.4\]]pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di mi nus te/_'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pa/_rmongs pa/_sems tha ba can/_bag med pa la dga' ba/_byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'khor ba la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[250b.5\]]skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par spyad par mi nus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i 
[\[250b.6\]]tshogs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis bdag khang steng 'di nas thur du mchong ngo /_/snyam mo/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su phyogs te/_khang pa de nas 
[\[250b.7\]]mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs she na/_de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la dgongs su gsol/_zhes kyang smras so/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/_'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la reg go_/'od de las kyang pad ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung bar gyur to/_/pad ma de las kyang 
[\[251a.2\]]'od zer brgya stong byung ste snang ba chen por gyur nas/_snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad ma de la 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[251a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang gzhon nu de sdong po 
[\[251a.4\]]bcad pa 'gyel ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs 
[\[251a.5\]]su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas ldongs/_/tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do/_/ji ltar bde gshegs bstan la gnas nas ni/_/bdag gis 'thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol/_/'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos pa 
[\[251a.6\]]ni/_/mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te/_/thos nas skyo ste bdag ni 'dir mchis na/_/mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu/_/lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig_/ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu deng gyur cig_/dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso 
[\[251a.7\]]mdzad thugs rje ldan/_/g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung shing /_/dbul por gyur pa bdag ni bsdu bar mdzod/_/mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng dgrol mdzod/_/som nyir bcas pa'i yid gnyis gcad du gsol/_/byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ston/_/chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol/_/mun pa bdag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol/_/rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol/_/sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug rngu phyung /_/khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag thar mdzod/_/srid par 
[\[251b.2\]]dmigs pa 'dzin pa gcad du gsol/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis/_/mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol/_/srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang thung /_/dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste/_/bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 
[\[251b.3\]]'grub/_/bdag gis dal ba don rnyed gcig nges gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur/_/ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad pa/_/'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston/_/
[\[251b.4\]]yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas/_rnam par thar 
[\[251b.5\]]pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/_/mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste/_de nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul te de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/_mngon par gtor to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 
[\[251b.6\]]bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/_/gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/_/
[\[251b.7\]]mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang /_/khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin/_/gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/_/kun da zla ba kha 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]ba dung ltar dkar/_/thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa/_/spyan mchog bzang po ud pal sngon po 'dra/_/rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/_/de yis rang gi zhal gyi 
[\[252a.2\]]gdong yang khebs/_/chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad/_/'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/_/bcu dang sum cu snyoms shig thags bzang ba/_/'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/_/
[\[252a.3\]]bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/_/'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag_/bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis zil du brlag_/e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med 
[\[252a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das/_/glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs/_/bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs/_/sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/_/bcom ldan khyod sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/_/khyod kyi lpags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 
[\[252a.5\]]'dra/_/'gro bas gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/_/khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/_/khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad/_/khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/_/sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/_/
[\[252a.6\]]mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/_/khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan/_/khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/_/mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni smra 
[\[252a.7\]]ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/_/khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs/_/khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/_/mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag_/pad ma chus ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la ping ka'i skad/_/srid gsum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang /_/bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med/_/chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra 
[\[252b.2\]]bar mkhyen/_/stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/_/ma shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur te/_/thugs rje thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis/_/de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/_/'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/_/skrag par 
[\[252b.3\]]gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/_/bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing /_/zla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/_/sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/_/rtag tu na ba'i 'gro rnams gzigs 
[\[252b.4\]]nas ni/_/thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/_/dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/_/'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/_/glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis/_/de la lam gyi dam pa ston par mdzad/_/
[\[252b.5\]]gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/_/'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/_/chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/_/'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog_/tshangs las lhag par 
[\[252b.6\]]mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/_/dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog_/sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad/_/bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis/_/yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung /_/de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya 
[\[252b.7\]]dag_/theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/_/khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/_/rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yi 'thob/_/mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/_/phyug cing nor che 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/_/mtshungs med khyod la dang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]pa bskyed pas ni/_/gling bzhi'i bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba mchog_/'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa/_/rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/_/tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten 
[\[253a.2\]]bdag po dang /_/yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang /_/gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/_/mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang /_/thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/_/
[\[253a.3\]]gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/_/'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las bzlog_/bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/_/bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral 'god pa/_/bsod nams gter khyod 
[\[253a.4\]]bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/_/bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te/_/byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur/_/gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/_/yongs su dag cing mdzes pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/dam pa'i zhing du 
[\[253a.5\]]lus dang ngag yid kyis/_/sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mchod mi yis 'di la sogs/_/yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur/_/mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter 'thob 'gyur/_/khyod kyi brjod 
[\[253a.6\]]dang grags pa rgya chen po/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i phreng ba ni/_/bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs/_/rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/_/mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan 
[\[253a.7\]]pa/_/bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dgyes pa/_/mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/_/dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te/_/dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs/_/yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas/_/bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa des/_/'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog_/yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam nangs pa dang /_rgyal po 'od zer ldan 
[\[253b.2\]]gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor du ngu ba'i sgra thos so/_/thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar rings pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed ci'i phyir du/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams 
[\[253b.3\]]kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bsgyel ba ltar sa la 'gyel te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan stong du yongs su btsal to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des rgyal 
[\[253b.4\]]po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo /_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon 
[\[253b.5\]]nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi cha ga la ba der song ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_
[\[253b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/_srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis/_/
[\[253b.7\]]sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur/_/skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/_/yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag_/lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam lags gser gyi kha dog 'dra/_/blta sdug gzugs mnga' thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang mdzad/_/sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam 
[\[254a.2\]]gyis mi khyab mdzad/_/des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /_/bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs/_/khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags/_/chu shel nor bu 
[\[254a.3\]]glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags/_/'gro ba'i don du yid du mchi ba'i gzugs kyang ston/_/chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags/_/rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gda'/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags/_/khyod ni dga' ldan 'ga' zhig na 
[\[254a.4\]]yang bzhugs par gda'/_/'chi 'pho mdzad cing rab dkar glang por gyur nas ni/_/dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad/_/thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs/_/bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bltam par ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste/_/sa 'ga' dag tu 
[\[254a.5\]]gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzad/_/nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lta/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyung /_/thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang /_/yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi 
[\[254a.6\]]ba brnyes gyur kyang /_/kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'/_/yab dang yum dang sras dang bud med rnams kyang btang /_/gnyan rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing ngu /_/sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lhas yongs bskor nas/_/nags gnas gnas gcig po nas 'byung bar gda' ba 
[\[254a.7\]]'ang mdzad/_/khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par mdzad nas yun ring yang /_/zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gda' ba ston par mdzad/_/sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang /_/khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad/_/rtag tu rtag lta 'du shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]nas/_/mya ngan 'da' zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsung /_/rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/_/khyod ni zhi ba bsil gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung /_/khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med/_/thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs/_/phyogs 
[\[254b.2\]]rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung /_/kun du spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can kun gyi bgyi ba sgyu ma ltar gda' yang /_/thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'am byon ma lags/_/sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon 
[\[254b.3\]]par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/_/lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod ni legs par gsung /_/bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/_/mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi/_/mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba/_/srid 
[\[254b.4\]]gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig_/bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams dam pa gang bsgrubs des/_/'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog_/yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des rgyal po 'od zer de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen 
[\[254b.5\]]nas ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to/_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[254b.6\]]ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis pha 
[\[254b.7\]]ma de gnyis dang grogs de dag dang bud med de dag la smras pa/_khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig_/de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo /_/yul 'khor skyong 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to/_/dge slong de 
[\[255a.2\]]dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chag sa bshams pa steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub pa/_me tog pad ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/_ras bcos 
[\[255a.3\]]bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/_dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang byin pa de phyi de nyin mi sbyin gyi nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so/_/de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur bdag la 
[\[255a.4\]]dga' ba ma byas/_sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so/_/bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/_rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te lus dang srog la yang mi lta na 
[\[255a.5\]]dngos po gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa de la de lan gnyis su ma zhus so/_/bar skabs der khrus ma byas mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus rkang ba ma bkrus ngal ba'i 'du 
[\[255a.6\]]shes ma bskyed do/_/zan za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhen pa byas so/_/gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la bzhen pa'i sa 
[\[255a.7\]]phyogs de nyid du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang /_spos thams cad dang /_rol mo'i sgra thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas rgyu rkyen thams cad bsogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bar du byas so/_/mchod rten de dag la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so/_/mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so/_/mchod rten re re la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo/_/mchod rten thams cad la yang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo/_/'dzam 
[\[255b.2\]]bu'i gling kho ra khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon pa bskrun to/_/mchod rten re re la yang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong nas mar me bus so/_/mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me bus so/_/spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[255b.3\]]tshul de lta bus lo bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang rtag tu cog bu ba ste nam yang glos ma phab bo/_/nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/_/des zang zing med pa'i sems

[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin 
[\[256a.2\]]pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to/_/grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug par gyur to/_/yul 
[\[256a.3\]]'khor skyong de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang /_bag yod pa'i spyod pas rgyal bu gzhon

[\[256a.5\]]rgyal gyis bcom pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang rab tu byung ba don med pa dang /_dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rmu rgod dang lus dang ngag dang sems mi drang ba dang ltas lta ba dang khas 'che ba nor ba dang rang gi dam bcas pa

[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]to/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med na/_/snying ni thob dang shes kyi khe la song /_/byang chub yon tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni/_/de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'/_/khwa 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral/_/shes kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song /_/nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro bar gzhol/_/

[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

[\[257b.1\]]dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu pa ste khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yagr-i ha pa ti u gra pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khyim bdag drag shul

[\[258a.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/khyim bdag de dag thams cad phal cher ni g.yog dang bcas te theg pa chen po la yang

[\[258b.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes sems can thams cad kyi don du khur chen po len pa dang /_'jug pa rlabs po che chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dpag tu ma mchis pa thos nas ye shes de yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon

[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]khyim bdag legs so legs so/_/khyod nga la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa'o/_/de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung bas ji ltar bslab pa'i yon tan yang dag par gzung zhing spyod pa mchog la

[\[259a.3\]]pas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/chos la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/de gsum la skyabs su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas la 
[\[259a.4\]]skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sems mngon par 'du byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[259a.5\]]yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu ni khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di 
[\[259a.6\]]la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la gus pa dang bcas shing ri mo byed pa dang bcas pa/_chos don du gnyer ba/_chos 'dod pa/_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/_chos la gzhol ba/_chos la 'bab pa/_chos la bab pa/_chos srung ba/_chos sbed cing gnas pa/_chos kyi grags pa dang /_
[\[259a.7\]]chos kyi spyod pa la gnas pa/_chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/_chos yongs su tshol ba/_chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa/_chos kyi sbyin pa'i mtshon cha dang ldan pa/_chos kyi bya ba byed pa de 'di lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lha 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la chos kyis chos kyi bgo bsha' bya'o snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/_khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su 
[\[259b.2\]]song ba yin zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba ni gal te dge slong rgyun tu zhugs pa'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_dgra bcom pa'am/_so so'i skye bo'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_
[\[259b.3\]]theg pa chen po ba dag mthong na de de la gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas shing ldang bar brtson pa/_bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa yin te/_de yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pas 'di ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[259b.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du dran pa rab tu 'thob ste/_de de dag la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pa yin gyi de dag la mi dga' bar ni mi byed de/_de ltar na khyim bdag byang chub 
[\[259b.5\]]sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /_dam bcas pa mi 'jig pa dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su mi gtong ba 
[\[259b.6\]]dang /_theg pa gzhan la mi dmigs pa ste/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos smra ba'i gang 
[\[259b.7\]]zag rnams la brten cing bsnyen te bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byas nas chos nyan pa dang /_chos thos pa dang /_tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams gzhan dag la yang ston cing yang dag par rab tu 'chad pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song 
[\[260a.2\]]ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa ba yang dag par skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa dang /_gang zang zing gis sdud par byed pa de dag chos kyis bsdu ba la sbyor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rton gyi nyan 
[\[260a.3\]]thos kyi dge 'dun la rton pa ma yin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi yon tan yang yongs su tshol la/_de'i rnam par grol ba la mos pa yang ma yin pa ste/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[260a.4\]]sems dpa' khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/chos thos nas chos rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthong nas byang chub kyi sems rjes su 
[\[260a.5\]]dran pa ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par smon cing sbyin pa sbyin pa ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/sbyin pa de bla na med 
[\[260a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams byed cing skyes bu ngan pa'i las rnams mi byed do/_/khyim bdag skyes bu dam pa'i las yin 
[\[260a.7\]]gyi skyes bu ngan pa'i las ma yin pa rnams gang zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos kyis longs spyod tshol gyi chos ma yin pas mi tshol lo/_/'thun pas tshol gyi mi 'thun pas ma yin no/_/yang dag pas 'tsho ba yin gyi log pas 'tsho ba ma yin te/_de chos kyis longs 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]spyod thob pa de dag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed de/_mi rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom pa mang zhing snying po len to/_/'di lta ste/_pha ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yang dag par longs spyod dang mdza' 
[\[260b.2\]]bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur sti dang /_gang du yang chos la 'dzud pas gtong ba 'phel bar byed do/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi phung po lnga'i khur khyer bas khur blangs pa 
[\[260b.3\]]bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'dor bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba/_bdag bde ba la mi chags pa/_sems can thams cad bde ba thob par 
[\[260b.4\]]byed pa/_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pas de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas mi snyems pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_
[\[260b.5\]]brjod pa'i sgra'i snyan pa med pa la yi mi chad pa dang /_shin du brtags te las byed pa dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa kun tu srung ba dang /_log par sgrub pa la yid mi mos pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i blos 'byung ba mthong ba dang /_shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu'i sems med de/_ji ltar dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[260b.6\]]byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi bya ba byed pa dang /_rang gi bya ba yongs su 'dor ba dang /_gzhan la byas pa la lan tu phan 'dogs par mi re ba dang /_gnod pa byas pa la sha mi ldon pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba dang /_legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang /_dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang 
[\[260b.7\]]dag par bged pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa rnams la nga rgyal bcag pa dang /_'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs par dbugs 'byin pa dang /_mya ngan gyis nyam thag pa rnams la mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba dang /_mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang /_
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]bla ma rnams la gus pa dang /_mang du thos pa rnams la sten pa dang /_mkhas pa rnams la kun 'dri ba dang /_lta ba drang ba dang /_g.yo med par spyod pa dang /_sgyu med pa dang /_bcos ma med par sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_dge ba gang yin zhes tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /_
[\[261a.2\]]mang du thos pa la chog mi shes par byed pa dang /_brtsams pa rnams la yi dam brtan pa dang /_'phags pa'i skye bo dag 'grogs pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /_mdza' ba brtan pa dang /_mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[261a.3\]]chos thams cad la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston pa dang /_thos pa'i don rjes su sgom pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba thams cad la mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_lus la mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /_srog la zil pa'i thigs pa ltar 'du shes 
[\[261a.4\]]pa dang /_longs spyod la sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu lta bur 'du shes pa dang /_bu dang chung ma la sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'du shes pa dang /_zhing dang khyim gyi las kyi mtha' dang gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa la phongs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang /_yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[261a.5\]]rnam par 'jig par 'du shes pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams la sems can dmyal ba'i srungs mar 'du shes pa dang /_nyin dang mtshan du bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ces yongs su 'jal bar 'du shes 
[\[261a.6\]]pa dang /_snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang /_snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang /_snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no/_/de la snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/_gang gzhan gyi 
[\[261a.7\]]bya'o cog bya bar spro ba dang /_bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyor ba dang /_'dud pa'i las byed pa ste/_'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]pa gang zhe na/_gang sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su mi nyams la gong du yang rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ste/_'di ni snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/_gang ser 
[\[261b.2\]]sna'i sems tshar gcod cing gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing sbyin pa yang dag par 'ged pa ste/_'di ni snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o/_/khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang 'di lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa'i las 'di dag 
[\[261b.3\]]byed kyi/_skyes bu ngan pa'i las ni ma yin no/_/de ltar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/_rigs par smra ba yin/_chos smra ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dam bcas pa yang mi nyams yongs su mi 
[\[261b.4\]]nyams pa yin no/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung nas des srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste/_dbyug pa dor ba dang /_mtshon cha dor ba dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_
[\[261b.5\]]snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_srog chags 'byung po thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin can dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_rtag tu byams pa la gnas par bya'o/_/des ma byin par len pa spang bar bya ste/_bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[261b.6\]]longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_chags sems dang brnab sems med pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa med pa dang /_tha na rtswa dang lo ma tsam yang ma byin par mi blang bar bya'o/_/des 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang bar bya ste/_rang gi chung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[261b.7\]]gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pa med pa dang /_ma chags pa'i mig gis blta ba dang /_yid byung ba'i yid dang /_'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du ma chags pa yid la byed pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de gang gi tshe rang gi chung ma la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang nyon 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas na des rang gi chung ma la mi sdug par rjes su blta ba dang /_skrag pa'i yid kyis 'dod pa bsten par bya'i/_zhen pas zin bzhin du ni ma yin pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi gtsang bar 'du shes pas 
[\[262a.2\]]des ci nas bdag gis yid kyis dgu la yang 'dod pa la spyod par mi bya na/_mtshan gnyis sprad pa 'am/_yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos te/_bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/des [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spang bar bya ste/_bden par smra ba dang /_yang dag par smra ba dang /_ji skad smras 
[\[262a.3\]]pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /_mi slu ba dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/_ji ltar mthong pa dang /_thos pa smra ba dang /_chos rjes su srung bar gyur pa des lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra bar mi bya'o/_/des 'bru'i chang dang sbyar 
[\[262a.4\]]ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spang bar bya ste/_de ra ro ba med pa dang /_myos pa med pa dang /_'khrul pa med pa dang /_tshig ma 'chal pa dang /_mi 'phyar ba dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_mi g.yeng ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/_de nam bdog pa 
[\[262a.5\]]thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la skom sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam na des gzhan dag la chang yang sbyin te/_'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu na pa'i dus yin te/_gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyis bdag 
[\[262a.6\]]gis 'di ltar bya ste/_gang dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas gang 'di 'khrul pa med pa'i spyod pa la de dang de dag dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub 
[\[262a.7\]]sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyod pa yin no/_/khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gzhan dag la chang byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin no/_/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga bzung ba'i 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag kyang shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/gang du yang des phra ma mi bya zhing bye ba rnams kyi bsdums bya'o/_/des ngag rtsub po yang mi smra bar bya zhing des ngag 'jam por smra ba dang /_tshig 
[\[262b.2\]]mnyen pa dang /_gsong por smra bar bya'o/_/tshig kyal pa yang smra bar mi bya zhing /_dus su smra ba dang /_yang dag par smra ba dang /_don smra ba dang /_chos smra ba dang /_rigs pa smra ba dang /_'dul ba sa ba dang /_lan legs par 'debs pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed par bya'o/_/nges brnab sems su 
[\[262b.3\]]mi bya zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bsam par bya'o/_/gnod sems su mi bya zhing rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/des yang dag par blta bar bya zhing log pa phyin ci log tu lta ba thams cad dang bral bar bya'o/_/lhar sangs rgyas la bsam pa rjes su song zhing lha gzhan mi 
[\[262b.4\]]'dzin par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa der des sems can rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod par bya ste/_gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dad pa la gzud par bya/_sems can gang 
[\[262b.5\]]dag mi gus shing phar mi 'dzin pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro mi byed pa/_tshul dang mi ldan zhing mtshams las 'das pa de dag bla ma la gus pa dang /_chos spyod pa la gzud par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag thos pa nyung ba de dag 
[\[262b.6\]]mang du thos pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ser sna can rnams ni gtong ba la/_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims la/_gnod sems can rnams ni bzod pa dang des pa la/_le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la/_brjed [(]ngas [,]nges [)]pa rnams ni dran pa dang shes bzhin la/_'chal ba'i shes rab 
[\[262b.7\]]can rnams ni shes rab la gzud par bya'o/_/sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can nad pa rnams la sman sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bya'o/_/skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]dpung gnyen bya'o/_/des ljongs dang ljongs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang ji ltar 'thun par sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar mi 'gro ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum 
[\[263a.2\]]nas lan bdun gyi bar du rjes su bstan pas sems can rnams yon tan dag la bkod pa las yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur na khyim bdag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des sems can de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_des thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha sra ba yang 
[\[263a.3\]]bgo zhing tshig 'di skad ces ji srid du sems can gdul dka' ba dmu rgod de dag yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni de dag gi phyir go cha bgos te/_
[\[263a.4\]]sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_g.yo med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_sgyu med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te/_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag gis go cha ma bgos kyis/_ci nas bdag gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyis 
[\[263a.5\]]bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang /_dad pa thob par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ltar bsgrub bo/_/de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo/_/khyim bdag gal te grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs der 
[\[263a.6\]]ma bskul tam/_dran par ma byas te sems can rnams ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no/_/khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na 
[\[263a.7\]]sman pa mkhas pa zhig gnas pa des tha na sems can 'ga' zhig gi dug zhi bar ma nus te 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na sman pa de skye bo mang pos smad par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag de bzhin du grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]des de'i phyogs su tha na sems can 'ga' tsam la yang ma bskul tam dran par ma byas te ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no/_/khyim bdag de bas na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ci nas grong ngam/_grong khyer 
[\[263b.2\]]ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa des bdag gis sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ltar bsgrub bo/_/de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam pa'i go cha de lta bu bgo bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[263b.3\]]sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/des 'di ltar so sor bslab par bya ste/_khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'joms par byed pa/_'byung ba sun 'byin pa/_dge ba'i sdong po 'gyel bar byed pa ste/_de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/khyim 
[\[263b.4\]]na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi gnas/_byis pa so so'i skye bo ma dul ba ma sbas pa rnams kyi gnas/_mi dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi gnas/_skye bo ngan pa 'dus pa yin te/_de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/khyim na 
[\[263b.5\]]gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi chos thams cad kyi gnas zhes brjod pa'o/_/'di ni sngon goms par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni der gnas nas bya ba'i mi rigs pa byed pa'o/_/der gnas nas pha ma 
[\[263b.6\]]dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la gus par mi 'gyur ba yin te/_de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i 'khri shing la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/
[\[263b.7\]]khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_ngan du brjod pa dang /_ngan du bya ba'i tshig gi lam rnams 'du ba ste/_de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa mi 'dzugs pa'o/_/dge ba'i 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rtsa ba byas pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/mkhas pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyis smad pa'o/_/'di la gnas pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la gnas pa ni 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o/_/zhe sdang dang /_'jigs pa dang /_
[\[264a.2\]]gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste/_de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun mi srung ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'dor ba'o/_/shes rab kyi phung po la mi 'jug pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i phung po mi 'thob pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po mi skyed pa ste/_de'i 
[\[264a.3\]]phyir khyim zhes bya'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni pha dang /_ma dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /_g.yog yongs su 'dzin pa la sred pa yin no/_/khyim na gnas pa 'di ni rgya 
[\[264a.4\]]mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni me la shing ltar chog mi shes pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni thug pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlung mar ltar thug pa med par rnam par rtog pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'jig pas bye ma'i grong khyer ltar 'jig pa'o/_khyim na gnas pa ni kha zas bzang po dug dang 
[\[264a.5\]]'dres pa ltar 'dres pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mi mdza' ba bzhin du 'thun pa ma yin pas rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i chos sgrub pa la bar chad byed pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni phan tshun rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig gnod par sems 
[\[264a.6\]]pas rtag tu mi 'thun pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la sbyor bas gnod pa mang ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni las kyi mtha' thug pa med pas rtag tu brtson pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni yun ring po nas bsags pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can gyi 
[\[264a.7\]]phyir mi rtag pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni dngos po kun du tshol zhing yongs su srung bas sdug bsngal ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni dgra ltar mi mdza' bas rtag tu bag tsha ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni phyin ci log gis zin pas bag med pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rang gi dpyod pas rnam par bsgrubs te/_
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas gar mkhan gyi tshon dang 'dra'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar rgud cing 'gyur ba'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni skye bo glo bur du 'dus pas rtag tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir sgyu ma la lta ba dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 
[\[264b.2\]]kyang mthar rgud par 'gyur bas rmi lam dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni myur du 'bral bas zil pa'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni ro bro ba chung ngu yongs su 'jal bas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_
[\[264b.3\]]ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyis yongs su gzir bas tsher ma'i dra ba dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni mi dge ba la rnam par rtog pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir kha khab tsam gyi srog chags dang mtshungs so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig 'drid pas srog rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni 
[\[264b.4\]]sems rnyog pa can du byed pas rtag tu 'khrug pa'o/_/khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_bgo skal la spyod pas rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir thun mong ba'o/_khyim na gnas pa ni nyes dmigs mang bas ro bro ba chung ba'o/_/khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264b.5\]]khyim pa khyim na gnas pas khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_nges pa mang du bya'o/_/des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_gang byin pa de ni bdag gi yin 
[\[264b.6\]]no/_/khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/gang byin pa de ni snying po can no/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni snying po med pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni gzhan du bde ba'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni da ltar byung ba na bde ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/gang khyim na 
[\[264b.7\]]bzhag pa de ni bsrung bar bya ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni sred pa zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni sred pa rnam par 'phel ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni bdag gi ba med pa'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi ba dang bcas pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/_/gang 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdud kyi phyogs nye bar ston 
[\[265a.2\]]pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni zad mi shes pa'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni bde ba'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni kun tu bsrung dgos pas sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na yod pa de ni nyon 
[\[265a.3\]]mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen por mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni skyes bu dam pa'i las so/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i las so/_/gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[265a.4\]]kyis bsngags pa'o/_/gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/_/khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas snying po blang bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par 
[\[265a.5\]]bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang /_tshe rjes nas longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar 'du shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston par 'du shes pa ste/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/_/
[\[265a.6\]]khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_ser sna tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba'i 'du shes te/_khyim 
[\[265a.7\]]bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya ba'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bdud tshar gcad pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i 'du shes te/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum
