[\[285a.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgya stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/khyim bdag de dag thams cad las phal cher 
[\[285a.5\]]ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dga' la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_brgya 
[\[285a.6\]]stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu'i zung bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can rnams la stsal to/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa ji ltar 
[\[285a.7\]]bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas pa yang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu bar 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa lags/_
[\[285b.2\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/_lnga 
[\[285b.3\]]gang zhe na/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi lta bar dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pas rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan 
[\[285b.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa tshangs par spyod cing gtsang ma yin te/_yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa mi skyed na mtshan gnyis sprod pa'am/_yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[285b.5\]]sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang dag pa skyon med pa la mi reg cing khyim stong par zhugs nas thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim 
[\[285b.6\]]na gnas pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa la brtson pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par 'byung bar brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa dag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[285b.7\]]cing gzhan yang yang dag pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed pa ste/_khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la bslab bo/_/chos mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la yang 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de nas 
[\[286a.2\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung ba 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser 
[\[286a.3\]]po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od kyis snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags 
[\[286a.4\]]te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas 
[\[286a.5\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa 
[\[286a.6\]]mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[286a.7\]]mchod pa byas te chos bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyim bdag 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]drag shul can 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsti stang dang /_mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[286b.2\]]rtag tu yang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag rgyu 
[\[286b.3\]]gang dang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la dga' bar byed/_drag shul can gyis smras pa/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul la ni rdul cung zad kyang med do/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag bde ba la mi re ba yin no/_/btsun pa kun 
[\[286b.4\]]dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod de/_sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun 
[\[286b.5\]]dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas bskal pa bzang po 'di la sems can rab tu mang po yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/_rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa brgya stong du mar yang de 
[\[286b.6\]]ltar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di la yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong la yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[286b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di drag shul 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa sgrub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo 
[\[287a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_chos mang po rab tu 'thob ste/_brtson 'grus zhan pas bskal pa brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de lta ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo de 
[\[287a.3\]]bas na bdag kyang 'di la brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_gzhan yang brtson 'grus la gzud par 'dod pa dang /_bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang /_gzhan yang yon tan gyi chos mnyam 
[\[287a.4\]]pa nyid thams cad la dgod par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_kun chub par bya/_bklag par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang yang rgya cher 
[\[287a.5\]]yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi 
[\[287a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral lo/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_'dzin tam/_klog pa dang mi 'bral ba de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[287a.7\]]thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]pas yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang ba yang 'bogs te/_chos 
[\[287b.2\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_kun chub par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang ba tsam yang ri mor byas te slob dpon la phul nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par 
[\[287b.3\]]bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las so sor byas te mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/_de bzhin du da ltar byung 
[\[287b.4\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing /_gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[287b.5\]]dpa' rnams kyi bran dang /_slob mar khas blangs te bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'dzin/_mi 'chang /_mi klog_/kun chub par mi byed/_'jug par mi byed cing sgrub pa 'di la mi gnas na/_kun dga' bo byang chub 
[\[287b.6\]]sems dpa' des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing kun chub par byed la dam pa'i chos 
[\[287b.7\]]yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing sgrub pa 'di la yang gnas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/gus pa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[288a.2\]]bo dang /_khyim bdag drag shul can dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[288a.3\]]bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so//_rgya gar 
[\[288a.4\]]gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
